The target or a creature who can reach the knife can use an action to make a {@dc 18} Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check to try to dislodge the knife, freeing the pinned target and ending the {@condition restrained} condition on a success.

reaction.name: Resonate Rune
entries: When the giant is hit by a melee attack, each creature within 10 feet of them must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 10 feet away from the giant.

trait.name: Alchemical Ingredients
entries: After the basilisk dies, a creature can make a {@dc 12} Wisdom ({@skill Medicine}) check using an herbalism kit and the basilisk's gullet, destroying the gullet in the process. On a success, the creature creates three doses of a salve. One dose of this salve can be applied to a {@condition petrified} creature as an action, and 1 minute after the salve is applied, the {@condition petrified} condition ends for that creature.

trait.name: Toxic Ichor
entries: A creature who deals piercing or slashing damage to the basilisk while within 5 feet of them takes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) poison damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The basilisk uses Petrifying Eye Beams and makes one Bite attack or uses Poison Fumes, if available.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage plus 5 ({@damage 2d4}) poison damage.

action.name: Petrifying Eye Beams
entries: The basilisk targets one or two creatures they can see within 30 feet of them. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition restrained} as they magically begin to turn to stone. Until the end of the {@condition restrained} creature's next turn, they or an ally within 5 feet of them can use an action to cut the encroaching stone from the {@condition restrained} creature's body using a weapon that deals slashing damage. When they do, the {@condition restrained} creature takes 13 ({@damage 2d12}) slashing damage, which can't be reduced in any way, and they are no longer {@condition restrained}.

A creature {@condition restrained} in this way must repeat the saving throw at the end of their turn. On a successful save, the effect ends. On a failed save, this creature is {@condition petrified} until freed by a {@psionic cure ailment|TalPsi} power of 4th order or higher, a {@spell greater restoration} spell, or a similar supernatural effect.

action.name: Poison Fumes {@recharge 4}
entries: The basilisk exhales poisonous fumes in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in this area must make a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 4d4}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Poison Splash
entries: When the basilisk takes piercing or slashing damage, their wound spews poison. Each creature within 10 feet of the basilisk must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Bite)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 plus PB} piercing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Poison Spittle (2 Ferocity)
entries: The basilisk makes a signature attack. On a hit, the attack deals an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} damage, and a different creature the basilisk chooses within 5 feet of them takes PB poison damage.

action.name: 3rd Level: Poison Gaze (5 Ferocity)
entries: The basilisk chooses up to three creatures they can see within 15 feet of them. Each creature must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of the basilisk's next turn.

action.name: 5th Level: Lesser Petrifying Eye Beams (8 Ferocity)
entries: The basilisk targets one creature they can see within 30 feet of them. The target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition restrained} as they magically begin to turn to stone. A creature {@condition restrained} in this way must repeat the saving throw at the end of their turn. On a successful save, the effect ends. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition petrified} for 1 hour or until freed by a {@psionic cure ailment|TalPsi} power, {@spell lesser restoration} spell, or similar supernatural effect.

reaction.name: Heavy Glare
entries: When a creature who can see the basilisk is hit by an attack by the basilisk's caregiver, the basilisk forces that creature to make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target can't make opportunity attacks and has their speed reduced by 10 feet until the start of their next turn.

trait.name: Exceptional Smell
entries: The bear has a +10 bonus to Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell, and they can smell creatures even through dirt, snow, and water.

trait.name: Natural Camouflage
entries: The bear has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made in their native terrain.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bear makes one Bite attack and one Claw attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, they are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}). Until this grapple ends, the bear can't use their Bite attack on another target.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) slashing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, they are knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Powerful Swipe {@recharge}
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d12 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, they are shoved up to 10 feet away and knocked {@condition prone}. If the target hits a solid surface, they take an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) bludgeoning damage.

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Exceptional Smell
entries: The bear's proficiency bonus is doubled for Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell, and they can smell creatures even through dirt, snow, and water.

trait.name: Familiar Territory
entries: The bear has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) and Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) checks made in their native terrain (as determined by you and the GM).

action.name: Signature Attack (Bite or Claw)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 plus PB} piercing damage (Bite) or slashing damage (Claw).

action.name: 1st Level: Tenacious Strike (2 Ferocity)
entries: The bear makes a signature attack. On a hit, the attack deals an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} damage. On a miss, the bear deals PB slashing damage to the target and gains 2 ferocity.

action.name: 3rd Level: Pummel (5 Ferocity)
entries: The bear makes a signature attack. On a hit, the target is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 10 plus PB}). While {@condition grappled} in this way, the bear's attacks (including the triggering attack) deal an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} damage, the target is {@condition restrained} if they are Large or smaller, and the bear can't make a signature attack against another target.

action.name: 5th Level: Clawing Frenzy (8 Ferocity)
entries: The bear makes a signature Claw attack against PB creatures of their choice within 5 feet of them. At the end of their turn, the bear gains 1 ferocity for every attack that missed.

bonus.name: Hunt by Scent
entries: The bear detects the location of each living creature within 10 × PB feet of them, unless the creature is hiding their scent by supernatural means.

trait.name: Exceptional Vision
entries: The bird has a +10 bonus to Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The bird doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when they fly out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: High-Speed Dive (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If the bird descends at least 30 feet on their turn, they can take the Dash action as a bonus action. When they do, they have advantage on the next attack they make before the end of their turn.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) slashing damage. If the target is a Tiny creature, they are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}). If the target is a Small or larger creature, the bird attaches to them. While attached, the bird's Beak attacks against that target are made with advantage, and the bird can't attack another target. The target or a creature who can reach them can attempt to detach the bird as an action by making a {@dc 12} Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check. On a failed check, the attached target takes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) slashing damage. On a successful check, the attached target takes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) slashing damage and is no longer attached. The bird can detach by spending 5 feet of their movement.

bonus.name: Spot
entries: The bird makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

hp.special: 6 + six times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Keen Sight
entries: The hawk has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

action.name: Signature Attack (Beak)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 plus PB} piercing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Distracting Attack (2 Ferocity)
entries: The hawk makes a signature attack. On a hit, the next attack made against the target before the start of the hawk's next turn has advantage.

action.name: 3rd Level: Swooping Attack (5 Ferocity)
entries: The hawk moves up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks. During or after this move, they can make a signature attack against one target. On a hit, the target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength saving throw or drop one item they are holding.

action.name: 5th Level: Storm of Talons (8 Ferocity)
entries: The hawk moves up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks, then they can dive onto one creature within 5 feet of them. The target must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage PBd10} slashing damage and is {@condition blinded} until the end of the hawk's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition blinded}.

reaction.name: Swoop In (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: When the hawk's caregiver is hit with an attack while the hawk is within 30 feet of them, the hawk moves up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks. If the hawk ends this movement within 5 feet of the caregiver, the hawk becomes the target of the triggering attack instead, and the attack deals half as much damage.

hp.special: Seven times their level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Blood Curse)
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d4 plus PB} necrotic damage, and the target is {@condition poisoned} until the end of the seneschal's next turn. Beginning at 7th level, the seneschal can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Coagulate (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the seneschal empowers the blood of up to PB creatures within 30 feet of them. Each target can expend 1 Hit Die, rolling it and regaining hit points equal to twice the result plus their Constitution modifier.

action.name: 5th Level: Blood Puppet (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the seneschal chooses a creature they can see within 60 feet of them. The target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Wisdom saving throw or move up to their speed in a direction of the seneschal's choice. During this movement, the seneschal can force them to make one attack against a creature of the seneschal's choice (no action required).

action.name: 7th Level: Blood Bondage (1/Day)
entries: As an action, the seneschal arrests the hearts of up to PB creatures within 30 feet of them. Each target must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes {@damage PBd6} necrotic damage and is {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition paralyzed}.

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The ooze can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the ooze remains motionless, they are indistinguishable from a pool of blood.

action.name: Pseudopod
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature who isn't a Construct or an Undead, they must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or the ooze melds into the target's body.
While inside a creature, the ooze has total cover against attacks and other effects originating outside that host.

If the host creature takes 5 damage or more on a single turn from a source other than the ooze, the ooze must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or exit the host, entering the nearest unoccupied space of the ooze's choice. A {@psionic cure ailment|TalPsi} power, {@spell protection from poison} spell, or {@spell lesser restoration} spell cast on the host also forces the ooze out. By spending 5 feet of their movement, the ooze can voluntarily leave the host's body.

action.name: Crimson Feast (Inside Host Only)
entries: The ooze consumes their host creature's bodily fluids. The host must make a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the host takes 5 ({@damage 2d4}) necrotic damage and is {@condition poisoned} until the end of their next turn. On a successful save, the host takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition poisoned}.

hp.special: 6 + six times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The ooze can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

action.name: Signature Attack (Pseudopod)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 plus PB} bludgeoning damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Distracting Attack (2 Ferocity)
entries: The ooze makes a signature attack. On a hit, the attack deals its normal effects, and the next attack made against the target before the start of the ooze's next turn has advantage.

action.name: 3rd Level: Clever Goop (5 Ferocity)
entries: The ooze takes the Hide action and makes a signature attack (in either order). If the attack hits a Large or smaller creature, the target is knocked {@condition prone}. While the ooze is hidden in this way, they can approach a creature or move where they're clearly visible without automatically giving away their position.

action.name: 5th Level: Crimson Feast (8 Ferocity)
entries: The ooze attempts to enter the body of a creature they can see within 5 feet of them who isn't a Construct or an Undead. The target must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the ooze melds into the target, who takes {@damage PBd6} necrotic damage, becomes the ooze's host, and is {@condition poisoned} until the ooze exits the host.
While melded, the ooze has total cover against attacks and other effects originating outside the host, and they can't take any action except to exit the host as a bonus action.

At the start of each of the ooze's turns, the host must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the host takes {@damage PBd6} necrotic damage and remains melded. On a successful save, the host takes half as much damage and the ooze exits the host. If the host dies or is subject to a {@psionic cure ailment|TalPsi} power, a protection from poison or {@spell lesser restoration} spell, or a similar supernatural effect, the ooze exits the host.
When the ooze exits the host, they enter an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the host.

bonus.name: Parasitic Symbiosis
entries: If the ooze's caregiver is within 5 feet of them, the ooze moves inside their caregiver. While inside their caregiver, the ooze has total cover against attacks and other effects originating outside the caregiver. The ooze can exit the caregiver by using another bonus action, entering an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the caregiver.

bonus.name: Quick Cure (1/Day)
entries: While inside their caregiver (see Parasitic Symbiosis), the ooze cleanses their caregiver's blood, ending the {@condition paralyzed} and {@condition poisoned} conditions on the caregiver.

monster.name: Blood-Starved Vampire
languages: the languages they knew in life

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the vampire takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the vampire takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

trait.name: Radiant Weakening
entries: The vampire has disadvantage on saving throws against effects that deal radiant damage.

action.name: Feeding Frenzy (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 piercing damage plus 3 necrotic damage. If two or more vampires joined the attack, the target's hit point maximum is reduced by a number equal to the necrotic damage dealt. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest or is targeted by a {@psionic cure ailment|TalPsi} power, a {@spell lesser restoration} spell, or a similar supernatural effect. The target dies if this attack reduces their hit point maximum to 0.

monster.name: Bloodlord Varrox

trait.name: Infernal Ichor
entries: When Varrox dies, his corpse unleashes a spray of burning orange ichor. Each creature within 5 feet of him takes 5 fire damage.

trait.name: Infernal Sacrifice (3/Day)
entries: When Varrox fails a saving throw, he can call on Hell to succeed instead. When he does, each ally within 60 feet of him takes 5 necrotic damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Varrox makes three attacks using Soulsword, Death Skulls, or both.

action.name: Soulsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, they can't regain hit points until the start of Varrox's next turn.

action.name: Death Skulls
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) fire damage, and Varrox can teleport to an unoccupied space he can see within 5 feet of the target.

bonus.name: Advance and Attack
entries: Varrox barks orders at one ally within 60 feet of him who can hear him. That ally can use their reaction to move up to their speed and make a weapon attack.

reaction.name: An Army from Blood
entries: When a non-minion hobgoblin who Varrox can see within 60 feet of him takes damage, Varrox magically summons three hobgoblin recruits who appear in unoccupied spaces nearest to the damaged hobgoblin.

legendaryHeader: Varrox has three villain actions. He can take each action once during an encounter after an enemy's turn. He can take these actions in any order but can use only one per round.

legendary.name: Action 1: Uncanny Leadership
entries: Varrox chooses up to six non-minion allies within 60 feet of him who can see or hear him. Varrox and each chosen creature gain 10 temporary hit points and can move up to their speed.

legendary.name: Action 2: Hellish Transport
entries: Varrox and each ally within 60 feet of him can teleport up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space they can see.

legendary.name: Action 3: I Am Fire and Death
entries: Each enemy within 20 feet of Varrox must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 11 ({@damage 2d10}) fire damage plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. After the explosion, a shroud of black flame covers Varrox for 1 minute. For the duration, each time another creature hits Varrox with an attack while within 5 feet of him or touches him, that creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) necrotic damage.

monster.name: Bog Body
languages: understands the languages they knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Acidic Blood
entries: A creature who deals piercing or slashing damage to the bog body while within 5 feet of them takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) acid damage.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, they are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}). Until this grapple ends, the bog body can't make a Slam attack against another target.

action.name: Sling Mud
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 30 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) acid damage.

action.name: Submerge
entries: If the bog body is in swampy terrain, they can submerge themself beneath the water and mud. While submerged, the bog body is heavily obscured.

If the bog body is grappling a target when they submerge, the target submerges with them. While submerged, the target is heavily obscured, {@condition restrained}, and unable to breathe, and takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) acid damage at the start of each of their turns.
A bog body can resurface as a bonus action. When they do so, a target they have {@condition grappled} also resurfaces.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Utility)
headerEntries: In addition to any other spells in this stat block, the bonestalker can cast the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 16}):

trait.name: Bones of the Lost
entries: The bonestalker starts with 5 ({@dice 2d4}) skulls, which they can destroy to fuel their actions and reactions.
Choose or roll a {@dice d4} to determine each skull's creature type: 1, Beast; 2, Fey; 3, Humanoid; 4, Monstrosity.

trait.name: Skull Resistance
entries: While the bonestalker possesses at least one skull, they have advantage on saving throws against powers, spells, and other supernatural effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bonestalker makes two Touch of the Felled or two Scream of the Forsaken attacks, and they can use Grief of the Bygone.

action.name: Touch of the Felled
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) necrotic damage. The bonestalker can destroy a Humanoid or Monstrosity skull to deal an extra 10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage to the target.

action.name: Scream of the Forsaken
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 8} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) psychic damage.

The bonestalker can destroy a Fey skull to force the target to make a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition frightened} of the bonestalker until the start of the bonestalker's next turn.

action.name: Grief of the Bygone
entries: The bonestalker destroys two skulls of any type, creating a 15-foot-radius sphere of magical darkness centered on a point they can see within 60 feet of them.
The darkness spreads around corners and lasts for 1 minute.

A creature with darkvision can't see through this darkness, and mundane light can't illuminate it. The bonestalker is unaffected by the darkness and has advantage on attack rolls against creatures in the darkness.Any creature who starts their turn in the darkness must make a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Power from the Conquered
entries: When the bonestalker is hit by an attack, they can destroy a Beast skull to become {@condition invisible} until the end of their next turn.

trait.name: Boog Rampage
entries: If Boog sees another Abomination reduced to 0 hit points, Boog rampages for 1 minute. While rampaging, Boog's melee attacks deal an extra 2 damage.

trait.name: Boog Charge
entries: If Boog moves at least 10 feet straight toward a Medium or smaller creature and then hits them with a Gore attack on the same turn, the target is impaled on Boog's horn and is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). While {@condition grappled} in this way, the target is {@condition restrained} and takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage at the start of each of their turns, and Boog can't make a Gore attack against another target.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Boog makes two Slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage or 12 ({@dice 1d10 + 7}) if rampaging.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage or 10 ({@dice 1d6 + 7}) if rampaging.

action.name: Boog's Ball
entries: Boog throws a 3-inch-radius magic ball at a point they can see within 60 feet of them. If that point is 30 feet or less from Boog, the ball grows to a 5-foot radius. If that point is more than 30 feet from Boog, the ball grows to a 10-foot radius. Each creature in the ball's area when it reaches that point must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) bludgeoning damage. After the ball reaches that point, it shrinks back to its 3-inch radius and teleports into the hand Boog used to throw it.

monster.name: Bredbeddle
senses: blindsight 60 ft. (blind beyond this radius in true form)

trait.name: Headless (True Form Only)
entries: The bredbeddle can't be {@condition blinded} or {@condition deafened}.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If the bredbeddle dies, they return to life in {@dice 1d6} months with all their hit points. If their body was destroyed, it reforms in an unoccupied space nearest to where they died. Only a {@spell wish} spell or finding and destroying the bredbeddle's true head can prevent this trait from functioning.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bredbeddle makes two Executioner's Axe attacks.

action.name: Executioner's Axe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d10 + 7}) slashing damage.

action.name: Beheading Strike {@recharge 5}
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 15 ft., one Large or smaller Giant or Humanoid with a head. {@h}40 ({@damage 6d10 + 7}) slashing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the bredbeddle cuts off the target's head, which lands at the target's feet. A creature beheaded in this way remains alive unless reduced to 0 hit points, but they are {@condition blinded} and {@condition deafened}, and they can't speak. A creature can use an action to place a beheaded creature's head back on their neck, reattaching the head and ending the effect. A beheaded creature dies if they are separated from their head for more than 24 hours.

bonus.name: Get a Head
entries: The bredbeddle picks up a severed Giant or Humanoid head within 15 feet of them and places it on the bredbeddle's neck. The bredbeddle then polymorphs into that Giant or Humanoid creature. While polymorphed, the bredbeddle's statistics change as follows:

items: They can speak.
They lose their Headless trait.
Their size changes to match the creature whose head they bear.
They can see normally, and they gain any special senses the creature's head had.
Any equipment they are wearing or carrying temporarily changes to match their size, but the equipment's statistics do not change.

entries: The bredbeddle reverts to their true form if they die, if their head is removed, or after 24 hours. When they revert, the head falls off and can't be reattached to the bredbeddle.
A creature who can reach the bredbeddle can use an action to make a {@dc 18} Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check, removing the head from the bredbeddle on a success.

bonus.name: Toss Head (Polymorphed Form Only)
entries: The bredbeddle removes their head, reverting to their true form, and throws the head at a creature they can see within 60 feet of them.
The head lands in the target's space, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw or take 18 ({@damage 2d10 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Utility)
headerEntries: In addition to any other spells in this stat block, the channeler can cast the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}):

trait.name: Bugbear's Inspiration
entries: Allied Humanoids within 15 feet of the channeler who can see or hear them have advantage on Wisdom and Charisma saving throws.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The channeler makes two Channeling Staff attacks.

action.name: Channeling Staff
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) lightning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, the channeler can move them up to 10 feet horizontally.

action.name: Vine Eruption (3/Day; 4th-Level Spell)
entries: The channeler attempts to use primal magic to overload a creature they can see within 60 feet of them. The target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw as thorny vines erupt from their body and attempt to envelop them. On a failed save, the target takes 27 ({@damage 5d10}) piercing damage and is {@condition restrained} until the vines are destroyed. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition restrained}. A creature {@condition restrained} in this way takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) piercing damage at the start of each of their turns. The vines have AC 15, 10 hit points, and immunity to psychic damage.

action.name: Ball Lightning (1/Day; 7th-Level Spell; Concentration)
entries: The channeler creates a 20-foot-radius sphere of electricity centered on a point they can see within 120 feet of them. The sphere lasts for 1 minute. When an enemy starts their turn in that area, they must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or take 27 ({@damage 6d8}) lightning damage. As a bonus action, the channeler can move the sphere up to 20 feet.

reaction.name: Shared Shield (2/Day; 2nd-Level Spell)
entries: When a creature the channeler can see within 30 feet of them is hit with an attack, the channeler can create a barrier of magical force around that target. Until the start of the channeler's next turn, the target gains a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack.

trait.name: Commander's Inspiration
entries: Allied Humanoids within 30 feet of the commander who can see or hear them have advantage on Wisdom and Charisma saving throws and gain a +1 bonus to weapon attack and damage rolls.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The commander makes two Greatsword or two Longbow attacks.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage, and one ally within 30 feet of the target who can see the commander has advantage on their next melee attack roll made against the target before the start of the commander's next turn.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Bark Orders {@recharge}
entries: Each ally within 60 feet of the commander who can hear and understand them can use a reaction to move up to their speed and make a weapon attack.

reaction.name: Bolstering Pride
entries: When another creature within 60 feet of the commander who can hear and understand them makes a saving throw, the commander can give that creature advantage on the saving throw.

trait.name: Bugbear's Inspiration
entries: Allied Humanoids within 15 feet of the predator who can see or hear them have advantage on Wisdom and Charisma saving throws.

trait.name: Dirty Fighting
entries: When the predator hits a creature with a melee weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, the target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the end of their next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The predator makes two Curved Dagger or two Longbow attacks. If both attacks hit the same target, the predator has advantage on their next attack roll made against the target before the end of the predator's next turn.

action.name: Curved Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Go for the Eyes (1/Day)
entries: Each ally within 30 feet of the predator who can hear and understand them gains the predator's Dirty Fighting trait until the start of the predator's next turn.

bonus.name: Guerilla Training
entries: The predator takes the Dash or Hide action.

trait.name: Bodyblock
entries: When a Medium or smaller enemy is within 5 feet of three or more regulars who aren't {@condition prone} or {@condition incapacitated}, that enemy can't see beyond a range of 15 feet.

trait.name: Bugbear's Encouragement
entries: Allied Humanoids within 5 feet of the regular who can see or hear them gain a cumulative +1 bonus to Wisdom saving throws.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the regular takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the regular takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

action.name: Bullyclub (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Bugbear's Inspiration
entries: Allied Humanoids within 15 feet of the roughneck who can see or hear them have advantage on Wisdom and Charisma saving throws.

action.name: Multiattack (Battle Fury Only)
entries: The roughneck makes two Handaxe attacks.

action.name: Handaxe
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Bugbear Battle Cry (1/Day)
entries: Each ally within 15 feet of the roughneck who can hear and understand them gains advantage on attack rolls until the start of the roughneck's next turn.

bonus.name: Battle Fury (1/Day)
entries: The roughneck enters a furious state that lasts for 1 minute. While in this state, the roughneck can take the Multiattack action on their turn, and they have resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from mundane attacks.

hp.special: Eight times their level (number of d10 Hit Dice equal to their level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Spiked Bow)
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 2d6 plus PB} piercing damage. Beginning at 7th level, the warden can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Halting Shot (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the warden makes a signature attack. On a hit, the target's speed is reduced to 0 until the end of their next turn.

action.name: 5th Level: Presence of Inspiration (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the warden inspires each ally within 30 feet of them who can hear them, granting them advantage on attack rolls until the start of the warden's next turn.

action.name: 7th Level: Enraged Barrage (1/Day)
entries: As an action, the warden makes a signature attack. Each ally within 30 feet of them who can see them can use a reaction to make a weapon attack, cast a cantrip with a casting time of 1 action, or manifest a 1st-order power with a manifestation time of 1 action.

trait.name: Forest Defense
entries: When Caithas is in forest terrain and is targeted by a ranged attack by an attacker he can see, the attack has disadvantage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Caithas makes three Scimitar or three Scaled Longbow attacks.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Scaled Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 11} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 1d8 + 8}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature who hasn't attacked Caithas since the end of his last turn, he has advantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Manifestation {@recharge 5}
entries: Caithas calls on his connection with Qazyldrath, and the dragon manifests in Caithas's space and exhales dark energy in a 30-foot line that is 5 feet wide. Each creature in that line must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) acid damage plus 18 ({@damage 4d8}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Additionally, that area is filled with magical darkness for 1 minute. A creature with darkvision can't see through this darkness, and supernatural light can't illuminate it. The manifestation of Qazyldrath then disappears.

bonus.name: Gaze of the Decay (1/Day)
entries: Caithas chooses a creature he can see within 60 feet of him, magically marking them for 24 hours. While Caithas and the marked creature are on the same plane of existence, he always knows the distance and direction to them. Additionally, a marked creature can't hide from him, and if the marked creature becomes {@condition invisible}, they gain no benefit from that condition against Caithas.

trait.name: Beast of Burden
entries: The camel is considered to be one size larger for the purpose of determining their carrying capacity.

trait.name: Desert Dweller
entries: The camel ignores difficult terrain created by dirt or sand. They can tolerate temperatures as high as 120° Fahrenheit.

trait.name: Metabolic Reserves
entries: The camel can go without water for up to 7 days, and without food for up to 90 days.

trait.name: Stubborn
entries: The camel has advantage on saving throws made to avoid or end the {@condition charmed}, {@condition frightened}, or {@condition prone} condition on themself.

action.name: Kick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

bonus.name: Bilious Spit {@recharge 5}
entries: The camel vomits bile onto a creature they can see within 10 feet of them. The target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). If the target fails the save by 5 or more, they are also {@condition blinded} while {@condition poisoned} in this way.

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Beast of Burden
entries: The camel is considered to be one size larger for the purpose of determining their carrying capacity.

trait.name: Desert Dweller
entries: The camel ignores difficult terrain created by dirt or sand. They can tolerate temperatures as high as 120° Fahrenheit.

trait.name: Metabolic Reserves
entries: The camel can go without water for up to 7 days, and without food for up to 90 days.

trait.name: Stubborn
entries: The camel has advantage on saving throws made to avoid or end the {@condition charmed}, {@condition frightened}, or {@condition prone} condition on themself.

trait.name: Tall and Narrow
entries: If the camel's caregiver is Medium or smaller, the caregiver can occupy the camel's space and vice versa, and it doesn't count as difficult terrain for them.

action.name: Signature Attack (Bite or Kick)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 plus PB} piercing damage (Bite) or bludgeoning damage (Kick).

action.name: 1st Level: Bilious Spit (2 Ferocity)
entries: The camel spits at a creature they can see within 10 feet of them. The target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of the camel's next turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Punishing Shake (5 Ferocity)
entries: The camel moves up to their speed and makes a signature Bite attack against one target. If the attack hits and the target is Medium or smaller, the camel also shakes and flings them up to 10 feet away horizontally. If the target hits a solid surface, they are knocked {@condition prone} and take an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} bludgeoning damage.

action.name: 5th Level: Trample (8 Ferocity)
entries: The camel moves up to their speed. During this move, they can move through other creature's spaces. Each Large or smaller creature whose space the camel passes through must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes {@damage PBd6} bludgeoning damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Ungulate Urgency
entries: If the camel's caretaker falls {@condition prone} and the camel can see them, the camel moves up to their speed toward their caregiver. If they end this movement in the same space as their caregiver, attacks against the caregiver have disadvantage until either the caregiver is no longer {@condition prone}, the caregiver is no longer in the same space as the camel, or the start of the camel's next turn, whichever comes first.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Utility)
headerEntries: In addition to any other spells in this stat block, Athenodorus can cast the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}):

trait.name: Exploit Opening (3/Day)
entries: When Athenodorus makes an attack, he has advantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Star of Iron
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, they are hexed until the end of their next turn. Whenever a creature hexed in this way makes an attack roll or saving throw, they must roll a {@dice d4} and subtract the number rolled from the attack roll or saving throw.

action.name: Iron Ring (2/Day)
entries: If not in the Cyst, Athenodorus teleports to the Cyst. If in the Cyst, he teleports to a place he has visited.

action.name: Unholy Fire (2/Day; 3rd-Level Spell)
entries: Athenodorus calls unholy black flames from the depths at a point he can see within 90 feet of him. Each enemy in a 15-foot-radius, 30-foot-high cylinder centered on that point must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage and is moved up to 15 feet horizontally. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't moved.

bonus.name: Blessing of Ajax (2/Day)
entries: Athenodorus chooses a creature he can see within 30 feet of him. The target regains 14 ({@dice 2d8 + 5}) hit points and Athenodorus can end one of the following conditions affecting the target: {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition dazed|FleeMortals}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition paralyzed}, {@condition poisoned}, or {@condition stunned}.

trait.name: Octopodan Camouflage
entries: Ceemal can attempt to hide even when they are only lightly obscured by foliage, heavy rain, falling snow, mist, or other natural phenomena.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Ceemal makes two Fillet Knife or two Acid Spit attacks.

action.name: Fillet Knife
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, another Abomination within 5 feet of the target regains hit points equal to half the damage dealt.

action.name: Acid Spit
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 20/40 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) acid damage, and the target is {@condition poisoned} until the start of Ceemal's next turn.

bonus.name: To Me, Sweetie (3/Day)
entries: Ceemal chooses an ally within 30 feet of them who can hear them. The ally can use their reaction to move up to their speed toward Ceemal without provoking opportunity attacks.

reaction.name: Wail of Loss
entries: When another Abomination who Ceemal can see is reduced to 0 hit points by an enemy within 60 feet of Ceemal, Ceemal releases a psychic wail. The enemy must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw, taking 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.name: Chimera
languages: understands any one language but can't speak

trait.name: Volant
entries: When the chimera reduces a creature to 0 hit points, the chimera can move up to their speed toward an enemy they can see.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The chimera makes three Bite attacks. They can replace one attack with a Lion's Toss attack or a use of Dragon's Eruption, if available.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Lion's Toss
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be moved up to 20 feet in any direction.

action.name: Dragon's Eruption {@recharge}
entries: The chimera spits a volcanic explosion at a point they can see within 120 feet of them. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 ({@damage 6d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

bonus.name: Roar
entries: Each enemy who can hear the chimera and is within 60 feet of them must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the chimera for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). If a creature succeeds on a saving throw against this effect or if the effect ends for them, the creature is immune to the chimera's Roar for the next 24 hours.

reaction.name: Ram's Defiance
entries: When a creature within 30 feet of the chimera misses them with an attack, the chimera can move up to half their speed in a straight line toward the creature. If the chimera ends this movement within 5 feet of the creature, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

monster.name: Chimera (Protector Variant)
languages: understands any one language but can't speak

trait.name: Volant
entries: When the chimera reduces a creature to 0 hit points, the chimera can move up to their speed toward an enemy they can see.

trait.name: Protector
entries: The chimera is divinely bound to another creature, who is their charge. When the chimera and their charge are on the same plane, the charge can telepathically communicate with the chimera, and the chimera knows the distance and direction to the charge. If the chimera is within 60 feet of the charge, half of any damage the charge takes (rounded up) is transferred to the chimera.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The chimera makes three Bite attacks. They can replace one attack with a Lion's Toss attack or a use of Dragon's Eruption, if available.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Lion's Toss
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be moved up to 20 feet in any direction.

action.name: Dragon's Eruption {@recharge}
entries: The chimera spits a volcanic explosion at a point they can see within 120 feet of them. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 ({@damage 6d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

bonus.name: Roar
entries: Each enemy who can hear the chimera and is within 60 feet of them must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the chimera for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). If a creature succeeds on a saving throw against this effect or if the effect ends for them, the creature is immune to the chimera's Roar for the next 24 hours.

reaction.name: Ram's Defiance
entries: When a creature within 30 feet of the chimera misses them with an attack, the chimera can move up to half their speed in a straight line toward the creature. If the chimera ends this movement within 5 feet of the creature, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Bite)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 plus PB} piercing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Ram's Defense (2 Ferocity)
entries: The chimera makes a signature attack. On a hit, the attack imposes disadvantage on the target's next attack roll made before the start of the chimera's next turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Lion's Leap (5 Ferocity)
entries: The chimera moves up to half their speed without provoking opportunity attacks. If they end this movement on the ground, each creature within 5 feet of them must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: 5th Level: Volcanic Blow (8 Ferocity)
entries: The chimera spits an explosion of fire at a point they can see within 60 feet of them. Each creature in a 10-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage PBd6} fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Protective Absorption (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When the chimera's caregiver takes damage while within 60 feet of the chimera, half the damage taken (rounded up) is transferred to the chimera.

trait.name: Lethe
entries: While the chimeron's soul count is 0, they have advantage on attack rolls, disadvantage on saving throws, and their Intelligence score becomes 3 (-4). Additionally, the chimeron must use their movement on each of their turns to move as close as possible to the nearest creature they can sense with their soulsight, and then if they are able, they must use their action to attack and attempt to kill that creature. The chimeron can't act with any other purpose until they add 1 to their soul count.

trait.name: Soul Devourer
entries: When the chimeron reduces a creature who isn't a Construct or an Undead to 0 hit points or deals damage to a dying creature, the creature must make a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the chimeron consumes the creature's soul and adds 1 to the chimeron's soul count. A creature whose soul is consumed in this way immediately dies, and they can't be restored to life by any means short of a {@spell wish} spell.

trait.name: Soul Resistance
entries: While the chimeron's soul count is is 2 or higher, they have advantage on saving throws against powers, spells, and other supernatural effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The chimeron makes up to three attacks using Powerful Bite, Scorching Bite, Booming Bite, or Chilling Bite. They can't use any attack more than once.

action.name: Powerful Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 4d8 + 7}) piercing damage.

action.name: Scorching Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d8 + 7}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) fire damage, and the target is set on fire until the target or a creature who can reach them uses an action to extinguish the flames. A creature who is on fire at the start of their turn takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage. If a creature who is already on fire is set on fire again on a subsequent turn, the damage isn't cumulative.

action.name: Booming Bite (Costs 1 Soul)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d8 + 7}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) thunder damage, and the target is knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Chilling Bite (Costs 1 Soul)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d8 + 7}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) cold damage, the target's speed is halved until the end of their next turn, and they can only make one attack during their next turn.

reaction.name: Pain Absorption (Costs 1 Soul)
entries: When the chimeron takes damage, they reduce the damage taken by 16 ({@damage 3d10}).

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The clawfish can hold their breath for 15 minutes.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) slashing damage, and if the target is a Small or larger creature, the clawfish can pull themself into the target's space and attach to the target. While attached, the clawfish moves with the target without provoking opportunity attacks, and the clawfish can't make Claw attacks. A creature who can reach the clawfish can use an action to make a {@dc 12} Strength ({@skill Athletics}) or Dexterity ({@skill Acrobatics}) check. On a success, the clawfish is detached and shunted into an unoccupied space of the clawfish's choice within 5 feet of the target. The clawfish also detaches if they become {@condition grappled}, {@condition incapacitated}, {@condition prone}, or {@condition restrained}, or if they use 5 feet of movement to detach.

action.name: Electrocute {@recharge}
entries: Each creature touching the clawfish takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) lightning damage. If the clawfish is immersed in water, each other creature within 10 feet of the clawfish who is touching the same body of water must succeed on a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage.

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The clawfish can hold their breath for 15 minutes.

action.name: Signature Attack (Bite)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 plus PB} piercing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Overwhelming Attack (2 Ferocity)
entries: The clawfish makes a signature attack. On a hit, the attack deals an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} lightning damage, and the target can't take reactions until the start of the clawfish's next turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Coiling Claws (5 Ferocity)
entries: The clawfish makes a signature attack against a Medium or smaller creature. On a hit, the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 10 plus PB}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and the clawfish can't make a signature attack against another target.

action.name: 5th Level: Lightning Bomb (8 Ferocity)
entries: Each creature within 10 feet of the clawfish must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage PBd8} lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Lightning Retaliation (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When the clawfish or their caregiver is attacked by a creature the clawfish can see within 5 feet of them, the clawfish shocks the attacker. The attacker must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage PBd6} lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Exploit Opening (3/Day)
entries: When Cloak makes an attack, she has advantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Cloak makes two Shortsword attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage, and the target is {@condition poisoned} until the start of Cloak's next turn.

action.name: Light Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature who hasn't moved since the end of Cloak's last turn, the attack deals an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Iron Ring (2/Day)
entries: If not in the Cyst, Cloak teleports to the Cyst. If in the Cyst, she teleports to a place she has visited.

bonus.name: Cunning Action
entries: Cloak takes the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

reaction.name: You Should've Been Watching Me
entries: If a creature within 5 feet of Cloak hits one of her allies with an attack, Cloak makes a Shortsword attack against the creature. To use this reaction, Cloak must be able to see the ally and the attacker.

monster.name: Count Rhodar von Glauer

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Utility)
headerEntries: In addition to any other spells in this stat block, Rhodar can cast the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 20}):

trait.name: Resting Place
entries: When Rhodar drops to 0 hit points and isn't in his resting place, he teleports to his resting place. While in his resting place, Rhodar is stable. After spending 1 hour in his resting place with 0 hit points, he regains 1 hit point.

trait.name: Spear Sacrifice (3/Day)
entries: Rhodar is surrounded by three floating spears of shimmering darkness, which he can summon to a free hand on his turn (no action required). When Rhodar fails an ability check or saving throw, he can choose to destroy one of these spears and succeed on the ability check or saving throw instead. Once Rhodar destroys all three spears, he can't use his Spear of the Damned attack or Spear Sacrifice until the next dusk, when he manifests any destroyed spears.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Rhodar makes two Sanguinus attacks, and he can make one Spear of the Damned attack for each Spear Sacrifice use he has remaining.

action.name: Sanguinus
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) slashing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) necrotic damage. If the target is a creature, their hit point maximum is reduced by a number equal to the necrotic damage taken, and Rhodar regains hit points equal to that number. This reduction lasts until reversed by a {@psionic cure ailment|TalPsi} power of 4th order or higher, a {@spell greater restoration} spell, or a similar supernatural effect.
The target dies if this effect reduces their hit point maximum to 0. A humanoid slain in this way rises the following midnight as a vampire spawn under Rhodar's control.

action.name: Spear of the Damned
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 12} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) force damage, and if the target is a creature, they are knocked {@condition prone} and {@condition restrained} as a spear of darkness impales them. A creature can attempt to free themself or another creature within their reach by using an action or a bonus action to make a {@dc 20} Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check. On a success, the creature is freed and the {@condition restrained} condition ends for them. The creature is also freed if Rhodar summons that spear to attack another target or destroys it using Spear Sacrifice.

bonus.name: Beguile
entries: Rhodar targets one creature he can see within 30 feet of him and who can see him. The target must make a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature uses their reaction, if available, to move up to their speed to a location chosen by Rhodar, then either makes a melee attack against a target of Rhodar's choice or falls {@condition prone} (Rhodar's choice).

bonus.name: Inhuman Agility
entries: Rhodar moves up to his speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

reaction.name: Withering Stare
entries: When Rhodar is hit by an attack by a creature he can see within 60 feet of him, his eyes bore into the creature. The target must succeed on a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage.

legendaryHeader: Rhodar has three villain actions. He can take each action once during an encounter after an enemy's turn. He can take these actions in any order but can use only one per round.

legendary.name: Action 1: Bloodstained
entries: Rhodar causes blood to explode in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on a point he can see within 120 feet of him. Creatures who aren't Undead in that area must succeed on a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw or be bloodstained until the end of Rhodar's next turn. Rhodar has advantage on attack rolls against bloodstained creatures, and bloodstained creatures have disadvantage on saving throws against Rhodar's Beguile bonus action.

legendary.name: Action 2: Fire Drake
entries: Rhodar, along with anything he is wearing or carrying, turns into a Large dragon made of fire. When he does, he releases any creature he was grappling, and if Rhodar was {@condition grappled} or {@condition restrained}, that effect ends for him. He then flies up to twice his speed to an unoccupied space. During this move, Rhodar ignores difficult terrain, doesn't provoke opportunity attacks, and can move through creatures and objects. Each creature Rhodar passes through must make a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw, taking 36 ({@damage 8d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. At the end of this movement, Rhodar transforms back into his previous form.

legendary.name: Action 3: Mist of Blades
entries: Rhodar fills the area within 60 feet of him with thick swirling mists, heavily obscuring that area for other creatures. He can teleport up to four times into any unoccupied space in the mist and make one Sanguinus attack after each teleport. The mist dissipates at the end of this action.

monster.name: Crawling Claw
languages: understands the languages they knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the claw takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the claw takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

action.name: Claw (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage. If three or more crawling claws joined the attack, the target must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or contract a disease called gravefilth. Whenever a power, a spell, or a similar supernatural effect causes a creature with gravefilth to regain hit points, the number of hit points they regain is halved. A creature with gravefilth can repeat the saving throw whenever they finish a long rest. On a successful save, the disease is cured.

hp.special: 6 + six times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Fingers for Feet
entries: While the claw is holding an object, their speed is halved. If the claw is knocked {@condition prone}, they drop anything they are holding.

action.name: Signature Attack (Claw)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 plus PB} slashing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Thieving Attack (2 Ferocity)
entries: The claw makes a signature attack. On a hit, the attack deals an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} slashing damage, and the claw takes a random object (determined by the GM) from an easily accessed pocket, pouch, backpack, or similar container the target is wearing or carrying.

action.name: 3rd Level: Dazing Slash (5 Ferocity)
entries: The claw makes a signature attack. On a hit, the attack deals an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} until the start of the claw's next turn.

action.name: 5th Level: Filthy Scratch (8 Ferocity)
entries: The claw scratches a creature they can see within 5 feet of them. The target must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage PBd8} poison damage and is {@condition poisoned} until the start of the claw's next turn. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the target can't regain hit points. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition poisoned}.

bonus.name: Fast Hand (3/Long Rest)
entries: The claw moves up to their speed toward the caregiver without provoking opportunity attacks. The claw can take the Use an Object action once during this movement.

trait.name: Ablaze
entries: The crux sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet, and they can't benefit from being {@condition invisible}. A creature who starts their turn grappling or {@condition grappled} by the crux takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The crux makes two Flame Tongue or two Sulfurous Rake attacks.

action.name: Sulfurous Rake
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage, and the target can't take reactions this turn.

action.name: Flame Tongue
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 6} to hit, range 100 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d12}) fire damage. If the target is a flammable object that isn't being worn or carried, it ignites.

bonus.name: Convocation of Fire (1/Day)
entries: The crux imbues the power of fire in themself or another Elemental they can see within 30 feet of them, granting one of the following effects of that Elemental's choice:

items: {@b Flame Bloom.} The Elemental launches a seed of flame at a point they can see within 60 feet of them. A 10-footradius sphere centered on that point erupts with fire and burns for 1 minute. Each creature who enters that area for the first time on a turn or starts their turn there takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage.

{@b Smoke Screen.} The Elemental exudes an aura of smoke 10 feet in every direction for 1 minute or until dispersed by a moderate or stronger wind. The smoky area is heavily obscured for all creatures who aren't fire elementals.

bonus.name: Flame Jet (1/Day)
entries: The crux gains a flying speed of 30 feet until the end of their turn and can move up to their speed.

monster.name: Crux of Frost
languages: plus the languages known by a creature reflected by Frosted Reflection

trait.name: Scintillating
entries: The crux can't benefit from being {@condition invisible}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The crux makes two Rimeglass Touch attacks, and they can use Frosted Reflection or It Stares Back, if available.

action.name: Rimeglass Touch
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) cold damage, and the target can't see or hear creatures other than themself and the crux until the start of the crux's next turn.

action.name: Frosted Reflection
entries: The crux reflects the appearance of a specific Medium or Small creature they've seen within the last week. This appearance is illusory and imperfect, showing a frostbitten version of the creature. The illusion lasts until the crux takes thunder damage, uses this action again, or is {@condition incapacitated}. For the duration, the crux additionally knows any languages that creature knows.

action.name: It Stares Back {@recharge 5}
entries: The crux imposes fragility on a creature within 60 feet of them who is reflected by the crux's Frosted Reflection. If the target can see the crux, the target must make a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition frightened} of the crux for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn), or until the crux stops reflecting them. While {@condition frightened} in this way, whenever the target takes damage, they take an extra 11 ({@damage 2d10}) psychic damage. On a successful save, the target isn't {@condition frightened}, and they are immune to the It Stares Back of all cruxes for 24 hours.

bonus.name: Convocation of Ice (1/Day)
entries: The crux imbues the power of ice in themself or another Elemental they can see within 30 feet of them, granting one of the following effects of that Elemental's choice:

items: {@b Frigid Sheen.} The Elemental gains a mirror sheen that reflects damage for 1 minute. When the Elemental is hit with an attack by a creature they can see within 30 feet of them, the Elemental can use a reaction to reflect the attack. The Elemental is unaffected by the attack, and the attacker must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the attack's damage and effects are reflected back at the attacker as if the attack originated from the Elemental, turning the attacker into the target. On a successful save, the attacker takes half as much damage, but suffers no other effect.

{@b Frost Squall.} Frost swirls around the Elemental for 1 minute. For the duration, each non-Elemental creature who starts their turn within 15 feet of the Elemental has their speed reduced to 15 feet unless it is already lower until the end of their turn, and the first time they willingly move before the start of their next turn, they take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage.

monster.name: Dancing Lady
languages: understands Druidic and Sylvan but can't speak

trait.name: Dancing Flowers
entries: The dancing lady has three spinning flowers resembling life-sized dancing Humanoids. Each flower has AC 16, 5 hit points, vulnerability to fire damage, and immunity to psychic damage. Attack rolls against these whirling blooms have disadvantage. Destroying a flower deals no damage to the dancing lady, who regrows destroyed flowers at the end of their turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dancing lady makes two Slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 3d12 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Blood-Red Waltz
entries: For each flower the dancing lady has, they can choose one creature they can see within 60 feet of them. Each target must make a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw as a dancing flower sweeps toward them. On a failed save, a creature takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) psychic damage and is moved to an unoccupied space within 60 feet of the dancing lady. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't moved.

action.name: Disarming Quickstep
entries: For each flower the dancing lady has, they can choose one creature they can see within 60 feet of them. Each target must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw as a dancing flower whirls them into a dance. On a failed save, a creature takes 17 ({@damage 5d6}) bludgeoning damage and is {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} until the start of the dancing lady's next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition dazed|FleeMortals}.

action.name: Ballet of Terror (1/Day)
entries: The dancing lady's flowers pirouette and emit acrid mist. Enemies within 120 feet of the dancing lady who can smell the mist must make a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature becomes {@condition frightened} of the dancing lady for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

reaction.name: Somber Dirge
entries: When a creature the dancing lady can see hits the dancing lady with an attack, the dancing lady causes the attack to hit one of their flowers instead.

monster.name: Deathhawk
languages: understands Common but can't speak it

trait.name: Corpse Sense
entries: Within a range of 5 miles, the deathhawk can sense the presence of Undead or corpses that have been dead for less than 90 days; the deathhawk knows the general direction these are in but not their exact locations. In addition, the deathhawk has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks made to find Undead or corpses that have been dead for less than 90 days.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The deathhawk doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when they fly out of an enemy's reach.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The deathhawk makes one Beak attack and one Wounding Talons attack.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 3d4 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Wounding Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature who isn't a Construct or an Undead, they gain a bleeding wound that lasts until they regain at least 1 hit point. A bleeding creature loses 5 ({@damage 1d10}) hit points for each bleeding wound they have at the start of their turn. Any creature who can reach the target can use an action to stanch all the target's wounds, ending the effect.

bonus.name: Bloodcurdling Shriek {@recharge}
entries: The deathhawk shrieks, and each enemy within 300 feet of the deathhawk who can hear them must make a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw. Creatures who are immune to the {@condition frightened} condition automatically succeed on this saving throw. On a failed save, a creature is horrified for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). While horrified, each time the creature makes an attack roll or a saving throw, they must roll a {@damage d4} and subtract the number rolled from the attack roll or saving throw.
If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for them, they are immune to the Bloodcurdling Shriek of all deathhawks for the next 24 hours.

monster.name: Decrepit Skeleton
languages: understands the languages they knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Bone Weapons
entries: The skeleton's weapon attacks are magical. They use their bones as ammunition for their bone bow, regrowing used bones every dusk.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the skeleton takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the skeleton takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

action.name: Bone Bow (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage. If the target is a creature and three or more skeleton minions joined the attack, the skeletons can choose another creature they can see within 5 feet of the original target. The second target takes 2 piercing damage.

action.name: Bone Knife (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 slashing damage.

trait.name: Psionic Shroud
entries: The dreamer is immune to divination spells and to any effect that would sense their emotions or read their thoughts.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dreamer makes two Tendrils attacks and uses Dream Spores, if available.

action.name: Tendrils
entries: {@atk mp} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage plus 22 ({@damage 4d10}) psychic damage. If the target is {@condition charmed} by the dreamer, the dreamer regains hit points equal to half the psychic damage dealt.

action.name: *Dream Spores (5th-Order Power; Recharge 5-6)
entries: The dreamer releases a cloud of psionic spores. Each creature within 60 feet of them must succeed on a {@dc 18} Intelligence saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by the dreamer for 1 minute.
While {@condition charmed} in this way, a creature must use their movement during their turn to move within 10 feet of the dreamer by the safest available route.
A creature {@condition charmed} in this way can repeat the saving throw whenever they take damage, ending the effect on themself on a success.

reaction.name: Rouse Dreamer
entries: When a creature makes an attack against the dreamer, the dreamer chooses a creature {@condition charmed} by the dreamer within the attack's range, and the {@condition charmed} creature becomes the target of the attack instead.

trait.name: True Name
entries: If a creature the adjudicator can hear within 60 feet of them speaks the adjudicator's true name aloud, the adjudicator loses their damage resistances, damage immunities, and Devilish Charm reaction for 24 hours.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The adjudicator makes two Infernal Injunction attacks and uses Adjudicator's Interdiction, if available.

action.name: Infernal Injunction
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 5d8 + 5}) fire damage, and the target must make a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the adjudicator chooses for the target to become either {@condition charmed} by or {@condition frightened} of them until the end of the target's next turn.

action.name: Adjudicator's Interdiction {@recharge 5}
entries: The adjudicator places an infernal seal on one creature they can see within 120 feet of them. The target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Charisma saving throw or be interdicted until the adjudicator dies. While interdicted, a creature's speed is halved, they can't take reactions, and they can't regain hit points. A {@psionic cure ailment|TalPsi} power, a {@spell lesser restoration} or {@spell remove curse} spell, or a similar supernatural effect ends the effect early.

action.name: Bad Deal (1/Day)
entries: Three creatures the adjudicator can see within 60 feet of them must make a {@dc 18} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, a target must choose to either take a -5 penalty to AC or a -5 penalty to ability checks and attack rolls. This penalty lasts for 10 minutes (save ends at end of turn).

reaction.name: Devilish Charm (2/Day)
entries: When the adjudicator is targeted by an attack, power, spell, or other supernatural effect by a creature they can see within 60 feet of them, the creature must make a {@dc 18} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition charmed} by the adjudicator until the start of the creature's next turn, and the adjudicator chooses a new target the adjudicator can see for the triggering effect. The new target must be within the triggering effect's range.

trait.name: Hellfire
entries: Fire damage dealt by the jurist ignores damage resistance.

trait.name: True Name
entries: If a creature the jurist can hear within 60 feet of them speaks the jurist's true name aloud, the jurist loses their damage resistances, damage immunities, and Devilish Charm reaction for 24 hours.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The jurist makes two Fire and Brim stone attacks.

action.name: Fire and Brimstone
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) fire damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or gain one festering wound. A creature takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage at the start of each of their turns for each festering wound they have. A creature who receives supernatural healing loses all festering wounds.

action.name: Inferno {@recharge 5}
entries: The jurist makes one Fire and Brimstone attack against each enemy they can see within 60 feet of them.

bonus.name: Ashes to Ashes
entries: The jurist chooses a creature they can see within 120 feet of them who has one or more festering wounds. One of the target's wounds ignites and they take 9 ({@damage 2d8}) fire damage.

reaction.name: Devilish Charm (1/Day)
