entries: When the jurist is targeted by an attack, power, spell, or other supernatural effect by a creature they can see within 60 feet of them, the creature must make a {@dc 16} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition charmed} by the jurist until the start of the creature's next turn, and the jurist chooses a new target the jurist can see for the triggering effect. The new target must be within the triggering effect's range.

trait.name: Hellish Resistance
entries: While in Hell or within 60 feet of a devil with a challenge rating of 9 or higher, the legate has advantage on saving throws against powers, spells, and other supernatural effects.

trait.name: True Name
entries: If a creature the legate can hear within 60 feet of them speaks the legate's true name aloud, the legate loses their damage resistances, damage immunities, and Devilish Charm reaction for 24 hours.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The legate makes two Infernal Pike attacks.

action.name: Infernal Pike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) piercing damage plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) fire damage, and the legate chooses one of the following effects:

items.name: Focused Hate
entries: The target has disadvantage on attack rolls made against creatures other than the legate until the end of the legate's next turn.

items.name: Hellbite
entries: The target takes an extra 5 ({@damage 2d4}) fire damage.

items.name: Skewer
entries: The legate deals 5 ({@damage 1d10}) piercing damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage to another creature within 5 feet of the target.

reaction.name: Devilish Charm (1/Day)
entries: When the legate is targeted by an attack, power, spell, or other supernatural effect by a creature they can see within 60 feet of them, the creature must make a {@dc 15} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition charmed} by the legate until the start of the creature's next turn, and the legate chooses a new target the legate can see for the triggering effect. The new target must be within the triggering effect's range.

trait.name: True Name
entries: If a creature the magistrate can hear within 60 feet of them speaks the magistrate's true name aloud, the magistrate loses their damage resistances, damage immunities, and Devilish Charm reaction for 24 hours.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The magistrate makes two Infernal Knife attacks and one Obsidian Kris attack.

action.name: Infernal Knife
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) fire damage, and the target is {@condition frightened} of their allies until the end of their next turn.

action.name: Obsidian Kris
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) piercing damage, and if the target is {@condition frightened}, they can't take reactions until the {@condition frightened} condition ends for them.

reaction.name: Devilish Charm (2/Day)
entries: When the magistrate is targeted by an attack, power, spell, or other supernatural effect by a creature they can see within 60 feet of them, the creature must make a {@dc 16} Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition charmed} by the magistrate until the start of the creature's next turn, and the magistrate chooses a new target the magistrate can see for the triggering effect. The new target must be within the triggering effect's range.

trait.name: Importunity
entries: At the start of the notary's turn, they can grant an infernal blessing to a non-minion ally they can see within 60 feet of them (no action required). The next time that ally makes an attack roll or saving throw before the start of the notary's next turn, the ally can add a +1 bonus to the roll. This bonus increases by 1 (maximum bonus of +5) for each notary who grants an infernal blessing to the creature.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the notary takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the notary takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

trait.name: True Name
entries: If a creature the notary can hear within 60 feet of them speaks the notary's true name aloud, the notary loses their damage immunities and Importunity trait for 24 hours.

action.name: Brimstone (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft., one target. {@h}4 fire damage.

hp.special: Eight times their level (number of d10 Hit Dice equal to their level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Daggers)
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft. {@h}{@damage 2d4 + PB} piercing damage. Beginning at 7th level, the retainer can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Misleading Strike (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the retainer makes a signature attack. On a hit, the target must use their reaction, if available, to make a weapon attack against a creature of the retainer's choice.

action.name: 5th Level: Adjuration (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the retainer grants an infernal blessing to an ally they can see within 60 feet of them. The next time that ally makes an attack roll before the start of the retainer's next turn, the ally adds a +PB bonus to the roll. If the attack hits, it deals an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} damage.

action.name: 7th Level: Hellbitten Knives (1/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the retainer imbues their daggers with hellfire. For 1 minute, their signature attack deals an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} fire damage and ignores damage resistances.

trait.name: Exceptional Vision
entries: The bird has a +10 bonus to Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The bird doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when they fly out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: High-Speed Dive (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If the bird descends at least 30 feet on their turn, they can take the Dash action as a bonus action. When they do, they have advantage on the next attack they make before the end of their turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bird makes two attacks using Heavy Beak, Rending Talons, or both.

action.name: Heavy Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage. On a critical hit, the target is {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} until the start of the bird's next turn.

action.name: Rending Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, they are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}). While grappling a target, the bird's Beak attacks against that target are made with advantage, and the bird can't attack another target. Each time the target makes a check to end the grapple, the target takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) slashing damage.

action.name: Crushing Grip
entries: The bird's powerful talons crush a {@condition grappled} target. The target must make a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw, taking 17 ({@damage 5d6}) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the target fails the save by 5 or more, they are also {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} until the end of their next turn.

bonus.name: Spot
entries: The bird makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

monster.name: Dirt Mournling
languages: understands the languages of their creator but can't speak

trait.name: Anguish Unleashed
entries: When the mournling dies, the sadness they contain is released into the world. Each creature within 30 feet of the mournling who can hear them must make a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The mournling is immune to any power, spell, or effect that would alter their form.

trait.name: Puddle of Mud
entries: When the mournling leaves a space, the ground in that space becomes difficult terrain for their enemies for 10 minutes.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mournling makes three attacks using Slam, Mudslide, or both, and they can use Dust Storm, if available.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 20}). While {@condition grappled} in this way, the target is {@condition restrained}.

action.name: Mudslide
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 12} to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Huge or smaller creature, the target and each Huge or smaller creature of the mournling's choice within 5 feet of the target are pulled up to 30 feet toward the mournling.

action.name: Dust Storm (1/Day)
entries: The mournling hurls dirt, gravel, and sand. Each creature within 60 feet of them must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

bonus.name: Break and Reform
entries: The mournling teleports to an unoccupied space they can see within 30 feet of them.

reaction.name: Stuck Fast
entries: When the mournling is hit by a melee weapon attack, they capture the weapon that struck them in quickhardening mud, disarming the attacker. A creature who can reach the weapon can use an action or bonus action to make a {@dc 19} Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check, freeing the weapon on a success. The mournling can't use this reaction on attacks made with natural weapons.

monster.name: Dohma Raskovar

trait.name: Adrenaline Rush
entries: If Raskovar fails a saving throw, he can expend a use of his Dohma Rally without gaining its benefits (no action required) and succeed instead.

trait.name: Relentless (1/Turn)
entries: When Raskovar isn't {@condition incapacitated} and he is reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, he can make an attack against an enemy (no action required) before the hit point reduction is resolved. If the attack hits and its damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, Raskovar drops to 1 hit point instead of 0 hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Raskovar makes three Repeating Crossbow attacks or two War Mace attacks.

action.name: War Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} until the end of their next turn.

action.name: Repeating Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d12 + 1}) piercing damage, and the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the end of their next turn.

action.name: Reinforcements (1/Day)
entries: Raskovar takes the Dodge action, and ten orc blitzers appear in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of him.

bonus.name: Dohma Rally (3/Day)
entries: Raskovar regains 20 hit points, and he gains resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage until the end of his next turn.

reaction.name: On the House
entries: When a creature Raskovar can see within 30 feet of him fails an ability check or misses with an attack roll, that creature can reroll the check or attack, choosing either result.

legendaryHeader: Raskovar has three villain actions. He can take each action once during an encounter after an enemy's turn. He can take these actions in any order but can use only one per round.

legendary.name: Action 1: Close In
entries: Each ally within 60 feet of Raskovar who can hear him can move up to their speed. After this movement, each enemy within 5 feet of at least one creature who moved must make a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of Raskovar for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

legendary.name: Action 2: Lockdown
entries: Each ally within 60 feet of Raskovar who can hear him can make a Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check with advantage to grapple an enemy within their reach (no action required). Then Raskovar can move up to his speed.

legendary.name: Action 3: Do It Myself
entries: Raskovar moves up to his speed without provoking opportunity attacks. At the end of the movement, he can make up to five War Mace attacks with advantage.

trait.name: Arcane Acumen
entries: The dragonet has advantage on Intelligence ({@skill Arcana}) checks made to reveal information about supernatural effects and objects they can see. Additionally, they always know if their emotions are being sensed, their thoughts are being read, or they are being targeted or perceived by any divination spells.

trait.name: True Words
entries: When a creature speaks in Draconic, the dragonet has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) checks to determine whether they are lying.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Revealing Breath (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: The dragonet exhales sparkling light in a 15-foot cone. Each object in that area is outlined in light for 1 minute, and each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or also be outlined in light for the duration. Outlined creatures and objects shed dim light in a 5-foot radius, and if any outlined creatures or objects bear magic, the dragonet can learn its school of magic, if any, by looking at it. Any attack roll against an outlined creature or object has advantage if the attacker can see the target, and the outlined creature or object can't benefit from being {@condition invisible}.

action.name: Truesight (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: For 1 minute, the dragonet gains truesight out to a range of 60 feet.

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The drangolin can burrow through solid rock at half their burrow speed and leaves behind a 3-foot-diameter tunnel when they burrow. Tiny and Small creatures can move through this tunnel normally, and Medium and Large creatures can squeeze through it. This tunnel collapses after 10 minutes.

action.name: Signature Attack (Claws)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 plus PB} slashing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Spit Breath (2 Ferocity)
entries: The drangolin breathes fire at their foe. This attack uses the statistics for their signature attack, except the fire is a ranged weapon with a normal range of 30 feet and a long range of 60 feet. On a hit, the attack deals an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} damage, and all the damage dealt by the attack is fire damage instead of piercing damage.

action.name: 3rd Level: Roll Out (5 Ferocity)
entries: The drangolin moves up to their walking speed in a straight line without provoking opportunity attacks. The drangolin can end this movement in a space that contains another creature. If they do, that creature takes 2 × PB bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet the drangolin traveled, and they must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, the creature is pushed 5 feet out of the drangolin's space into an unoccupied space of the creature's choice.

action.name: 5th Level: Rend and Roast (8 Ferocity)
entries: The drangolin makes two signature attacks against the same target, then breathes fire on them. The target must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage PBd6} fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Ash Shot (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: When an enemy the drangolin can see moves within 5 feet of the drangolin's caregiver, the drangolin sprays the enemy with ash. If the drangolin is within 30 feet of their caregiver, the target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the start of the drangolin's next turn.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Utility)
headerEntries: In addition to any other spells in this stat block, Draven can cast the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 19}):

trait.name: Exploit Opening (3/Day)
entries: When Draven makes an attack, he has advantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Profane Sacrifice (1/Turn)
entries: When Draven hits a creature with a melee attack, he can sacrifice his vitality to empower the attack. The target's speed drops to 0 until the start of his next turn, and Draven takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) psychic damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Draven makes three Gloom Dagger attacks.

action.name: Gloom Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d4 + 8}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 3d4}) necrotic damage, and Draven can move the target up to 10 feet horizontally. If the damage from this attack reduces a creature to 0 hit points, Draven regains a use of Blood of the Dragon.

action.name: Blood of the Dragon (1/Day)
entries: Draven boils the blood of up to three creatures he can see within 60 feet of him. Each target takes 33 ({@damage 6d10}) necrotic damage and must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn) and knocked {@condition prone}.

bonus.name: Creeping Dread
entries: Draven chooses a creature he can see within 30 feet of him in an area of dim light or darkness. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw or move their speed in a direction chosen by Draven. A creature with advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened} has advantage on this saving throw, and a creature who can't be {@condition frightened} automatically succeeds on it.

monster.name: Durixaviinox

trait.name: Frosted Resistance (3/Day)
entries: When Durixaviinox fails a saving throw, he can succeed instead. When he does, his speed is halved and he can't take the Disengage action until the end of his next turn.

trait.name: Hoarfrost
entries: Cold damage dealt by Durixaviinox ignores damage resistance.

trait.name: Ice Walk
entries: Durixaviinox can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, difficult terrain composed of ice or snow doesn't cost him extra movement.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Durixaviinox makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d10 + 8}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) cold damage, and the target can't take reactions until the end of their next turn.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) slashing damage, and Durixaviinox can move the target up to 15 feet horizontally.

action.name: Numbing Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: Durixaviinox exhales a freezing blast in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 22} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 42 ({@damage 12d6}) cold damage and is {@condition restrained} until the end of their next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition restrained}.

bonus.name: Icy Grip
entries: Durixaviinox encases a creature he can see within 60 feet of him in ice. The target must make a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) cold damage and is {@condition restrained}. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition restrained}. A creature can use an action to break themself or another creature they can reach out of the ice, ending the {@condition restrained} condition.

reaction.name: Withering Frost
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of Durixaviinox hits him with an attack, Durixaviinox releases a burst of cold energy. Each creature within 5 feet of him must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) cold damage.

legendaryHeader: Durixaviinox has three villain actions. He can take each action once during an encounter after an enemy's turn. He can take these actions in any order but can use only one per round.

legendary.name: Action 1: Raging Blizzard
entries: Durixaviinox beats his wings, and frigid winds and hail swirl around him. Each creature within 120 feet of him must make a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) bludgeoning damage, is pushed 60 feet directly away from Durixaviinox, and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed or knocked {@condition prone}.

legendary.name: Action 2: Royal Defense
entries: Durixaviinox calls the faithful soul of a spectral guard to fight at his side. The guard uses the frost giant wind sprinter stat block, but they are an Undead instead of a Giant. The guard acts immediately after Durixaviinox and follows his verbal commands. While the guard is within 60 feet of Durixaviinox, Durixaviinox gains resistance to all damage. If Durixaviinox dies, the guard is destroyed.

legendary.name: Action 3: Frost Cataclysm
entries: Durixaviinox releases a pulse of frigid energy followed by a shock wave of force in a 120-foot-radius sphere centered on him. Each enemy in that area must make a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw, taking 45 ({@damage 10d8}) cold damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Immediately after, each enemy in that area must make a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw, taking 45 ({@damage 10d8}) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Earth Glide
entries: The elemental can burrow through mundane, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the elemental doesn't disturb the material they move through. While they use Earth Glide, the elemental can't be used as a mount.

action.name: Signature Attack (Slam)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 plus PB} bludgeoning damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Stretch Attack (2 Ferocity)
entries: The elemental makes a signature attack with a reach of 10 feet. On a hit, the attack deals an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} damage, and the elemental can pull the target 5 feet toward them.

action.name: 3rd Level: Earthshaker (5 Ferocity)
entries: The elemental strikes the ground, and each creature within 10 feet of them must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. The elemental's caregiver automatically succeeds on this saving throw.

action.name: 5th Level: Transmute Ground (8 Ferocity)
entries: The elemental picks a 10-foot-square area of ground they can see within 30 feet of them. Each creature standing in the area must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength saving throw or partially sink into the ground and become {@condition restrained}. A creature can use their action to make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check, freeing themself or another creature within their reach on a success and ending the {@condition restrained} condition for the freed creature.

bonus.name: Toss Me
entries: While the elemental is within 5 feet of their caregiver, they can hurl the caregiver 5 × PB feet in any direction, including up. If the caregiver would normally take damage from a fall after being thrown, they can negate the damage with a successful {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the spark takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the spark takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

trait.name: Trampling Rampage
entries: If an enemy who is touching the ground starts their turn within 5 feet of two or more earth sparks, the enemy must make a Strength saving throw with a DC equal to 12 plus the number of earth sparks within 5 feet of the enemy. On a failed save, the enemy falls {@condition prone}, and they can't stand up until there are fewer than two earth sparks within 5 feet of them.

action.name: Shatter Smash (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Snort Rocks (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 bludgeoning damage. If the target is a flying creature, they must succeed on a Strength saving throw or fall {@condition prone}. The DC for this saving throw equals 12 plus the number of sparks who joined the attack.

trait.name: Supernatural Resistance
entries: The stag has advantage on saving throws against powers, spells, and other supernatural effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The stag makes three Ram or Lightburst attacks.

action.name: Ram
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 4d8 + 7}) piercing damage.

action.name: Lightburst
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 10} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) radiant damage, and the target is outlined in a golden light, giving attack rolls against them advantage until the start of the stag's next turn.

action.name: Starcall (1/Day)
entries: The stag calls down a magical shower of stars on an area that is 60 feet long and 5 feet wide within 120 feet of the stag. Each enemy in that area must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Each other willing creature in that area regains 15 hit points.

The stars then create a 10-foot-high wall of opaque radiant light in that area. Each creature in the wall's space is pushed out of it by the shortest route. The creature chooses which side of the wall to end up on. The wall lasts for 1 minute or until the stag is {@condition incapacitated} or dies. Any enemy who enters the wall of light for the first time on a turn must make a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

bonus.name: Starlight Infusion
entries: The stag infuses radiant energy into a willing creature they can see within 60 feet of them. That creature deals an extra 5 radiant damage with weapon attacks until the start of the stag's next turn.

reaction.name: Nature's Ward
entries: When the stag or a creature they can see within 30 feet of them takes damage, the stag magically creates a protective barrier around that creature. The barrier reduces that damage to the protected creature by 20, then vanishes.

trait.name: Flowing Form
entries: The essence can enter an enemy's space and stop there, and they can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Gasping Aura
entries: While within 10 feet of the essence, creatures who need to breathe can't take reactions or speak.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The essence makes two Breathless Rend attacks.

action.name: Breathless Rend
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) slashing damage plus 22 ({@damage 4d10}) psychic damage.

bonus.name: Convocation of Breath (2/Day)
entries: The essence imbues the power of breath in themself or another Elemental they can see within 30 feet of them, granting one of the following effects of that Elemental's choice:

items: {@b Hide in Breath.} The Elemental tries to hide inside the body of a creature within 10 feet of them who isn't a Construct, an Elemental, an Ooze, or an Undead. The target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or the Elemental retreats inside the target until the start of the Elemental's next turn. While inside the target, the Elemental can't take actions and has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the target.

{@b Toxic Breath.} The Elemental exudes a noxious aura 10 feet in every direction for 1 minute or until dispersed by a moderate or stronger wind. That area is lightly obscured, and each creature who needs to breathe who starts their turn in that area must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the end of their next turn.

bonus.name: Breathstealer's Shimmer (1/Day)
entries: The essence becomes {@condition invisible} then takes the Hide action. This invisibility ends if the essence makes an attack or uses Convocation of Breath.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The essence makes two Wind Talons attacks. They can replace one attack with a use of Bluster or Lightning Squall, if available.

action.name: Wind Talons
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Bluster
entries: The essence unleashes a 30-foot cone of wind. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be moved up to 10 feet in any direction.

action.name: Lightning Squall (3/Day)
entries: The essence hurls a small lightning storm at a creature they can see within 30 feet of them. The target must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 28 ({@damage 8d6}) lightning damage and is {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). On a successful save, they take half as much damage and aren't {@condition dazed|FleeMortals}.

bonus.name: Convocation of Air (1/Day)
entries: The essence imbues the power of air in themself or another Elemental they can see within 30 feet of them, granting one of the following effects of that Elemental's choice:

items: {@b Rising Whirlwind.} Each creature of the Elemental's choice within 30 feet of them must make a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw against a violent whirlwind. On a failed save, the target rises 10 feet upward and is {@condition restrained} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). A target {@condition restrained} in this way rises an additional 10 feet at the start of each of their turns. Another creature who can reach the target can use an action to pull them free of the effect, ending the {@condition restrained} condition for that creature. The whirlwind ends if the Elemental dies or chooses to end it (no action required).
{@b Vortex Terrain.} A vortex swirls around the Elemental. For 1 minute, the area within 20 feet of the Elemental is difficult terrain for enemies.

trait.name: Water Glide
entries: While within 5 feet of a liquid or solid surface, the essence gains a flying speed equal to their swimming speed. While flying, the essence doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The essence makes two Water Wing attacks and one Lightning Tail Whip attack.

action.name: Water Wing
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. If the same creature is hit twice with this attack on a turn, they are vulnerable to lightning damage until the end of the essence's turn.

action.name: Lightning Tail Whip
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) lightning damage, and the target is pushed up to 10 feet away from the essence.

bonus.name: Convocation of Water (1/Day)
entries: The essence imbues the power of water in themself or another Elemental they can see within 30 feet, granting one of the following effects of that Elemental's choice:

items: {@b Scalding Steam.} The Elemental spouts blistering steam. Each non-Elemental creature within 15 feet of them must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) fire damage and is {@condition blinded} until the end of their next turn. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition blinded}.

{@b Waters of Vitality.} The Elemental regains 25 hit points and can end one of the following conditions affecting them: {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition dazed|FleeMortals}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition paralyzed}, {@condition poisoned}, or {@condition stunned}.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: Excess can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Excess makes one Bite attack and one Sting attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, they are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}). While {@condition grappled}, a target takes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) poison damage at the start of each of Excess's turns, and Excess can't make a Bite attack against another target.

action.name: Sting
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

action.name: Swallow
entries: Excess makes a Bite attack against a Medium or smaller creature who they are grappling or hidden from.

If the attack hits, the target is swallowed as Excess enlarges their head and stomach. The swallowed target is no longer {@condition grappled}, but they are {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, have total cover against attacks and other effects outside Excess, and take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) acid damage at the start of each of Excess's turns. Excess can have only one target swallowed at a time.
If Excess dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by them and can escape from the corpse by using 5 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

bonus.name: Cunning Action
entries: Excess takes the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

trait.name: Healing Heat
entries: When the lightbearer targets a fire giant with an attack, spell, or other supernatural effect that deals fire damage, that target instead regains a number of hit points equal to the damage that would be dealt. The target can choose to be hit by this attack or fail their saving throw against this effect.

trait.name: Molten Flesh
entries: The first time a creature other than a fire giant touches the lightbearer or hits them with a melee attack on a turn, that creature takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lightbearer makes two attacks using Slam, Living Blaze, or both. They can replace one attack with a use of Flamelash.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage, and if the target is a Huge or smaller creature, the target must choose between being knocked {@condition prone} or pushed 10 feet away from the lightbearer.

action.name: Living Blaze
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 10} to hit, range 180 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) fire damage, and the lightbearer can ricochet the flame toward another target within 5 feet of the first. The lightbearer makes another spell attack roll against the second target with disadvantage, dealing the same damage on a hit.

action.name: Flamelash
entries: The lightbearer extends a whiplike flame to strike a creature they can see within 30 feet of them. The target must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) fire damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, the lightbearer moves the target up to 10 feet horizontally.

bonus.name: Travel by Fire (3/Day)
entries: The lightbearer chooses two willing creatures they can see within 30 feet of them. Each target takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage and teleports, swapping places with the other target.

trait.name: Heat and Pressure
entries: When an enemy moves out of the red fist's reach, the enemy must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or gain a level of {@condition exhaustion}. Creatures with resistance or immunity to fire damage are immune to this effect.

trait.name: Molten Flesh
entries: The first time a creature other than a fire giant touches the red fist or hits them with a melee attack on a turn, that creature takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The red fist makes two Unarmed Strike attacks.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d6 + 7}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage. If the same creature is hit twice with this attack on a turn, they are {@condition blinded} until the end of their next turn.

action.name: Hurl Flame
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 10} to hit, range 180 ft., one target. {@h}34 ({@damage 8d6 + 6}) fire damage.

reaction.name: Guardian Block (3/Day)
entries: When an enemy within 10 feet of the red fist hits a creature other than the red fist with an attack, the red fist halves the damage dealt by that attack. The red fist then makes an Unarmed Strike against the attacker.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the trooper takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the trooper takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

trait.name: Molten Flesh
entries: The first time a creature other than a fire giant touches the trooper or hits them with a melee attack on a turn, that creature takes 7 fire damage.

action.name: Unarmed Strike (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}3 bludgeoning damage plus 3 fire damage, and the target must succeed on a Strength saving throw or fall {@condition prone}. The DC for this saving throw equals 12 + the number of troopers who joined the group attack.

action.name: Rock (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}6 bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Little Flames
entries: The spark sheds bright light in a 15-foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet. If an enemy starts their turn within 5 feet of three or more fire sparks, they take 6 fire damage.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the spark takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the spark takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

action.name: Ember Claw (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 fire damage.

monster.name: Flesh Mournling
languages: understands the languages of their creator but can't speak

trait.name: Horrid Sob
entries: When an enemy who can hear the mournling starts their turn within 30 feet of the mournling, the enemy must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the mournling until the start of their next turn. A creature who succeeds on their saving throw is immune to the Horrid Sob of all flesh mournlings for 24 hours.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The mournling is immune to any power, spell, or effect that would alter their form.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mournling makes two Slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is {@condition frightened} of the mournling, the target falls {@condition prone}.

action.name: Agonizing Wail {@recharge 5}
entries: The flesh mournling screams with unbearable pain in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area who can hear the mournling must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature's eyes water uncontrollably, they take 16 ({@damage 3d10}) psychic damage, and they can't see anything more than 5 feet away until the end of their next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and suffers no other effect.

trait.name: Obscuring Form
entries: Other creatures in the swarm's space are {@condition blinded}.

trait.name: Shrink
entries: When the swarm is reduced to half their hit points, their size becomes Large.

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The swarm has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The swarm makes three Flutter Cutter attacks.

action.name: Flutter Cutter
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. {@h}26 ({@damage 6d6 + 5}) slashing damage, or 33 ({@damage 8d6 + 5}) slashing damage if the target is a Construct made of stone or is holding or wearing an object that emits bright light.

bonus.name: Devour Stone
entries: The swarm feeds on a mundane object or structure within 5 feet of them that is made mostly of stone.
If the swarm targets a Medium or smaller object, it is entirely devoured. If the swarm targets a structure or a Large or larger object, the swarm devours a 5-foot-cube portion of it.

trait.name: Visceral Sight
entries: The force of blood can see any creature within 120 feet of them who isn't a Construct or an Undead. This sight ignores effects that obscure sight.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The force of blood makes three Scarlet Longspear attacks. They can replace one attack with a Rend from Within attack.

action.name: Scarlet Longspear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 13} to hit, reach 15 ft. or range 30/60 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d10 + 7}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, the force of blood regains 5 hit points.

action.name: Rend from Within
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) slashing damage plus 26 ({@damage 4d12}) necrotic damage, and the target spends 1 Hit Die with no effect and can't take reactions until the start of their next turn. Miss: 13 ({@damage 2d12}) necrotic damage.

bonus.name: Convocation of Blood
entries: The force of blood imbues the power of blood in themself or another Elemental they can see within 30 feet of them, granting one of the following effects of that Elemental's choice:

items: {@b Boiling Blood.} The Elemental boils the blood of a creature within 5 feet of them who isn't a Construct or an Undead. The target must make a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target must choose to either take 27 ({@damage 5d10}) fire damage or make an attack with a weapon that has a damage die of {@damage 1d4} or greater against a creature of the Elemental's choice. If the attack hits, it deals an extra 11 ({@damage 2d10}) fire damage.

{@b Essence Thief.} The Elemental steals the essence of two creatures the Elemental can see within 30 feet of them. Each target must make a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw, taking 19 ({@damage 3d12}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The Elemental can then teleport to an unoccupied space they can see within 5 feet of one of the targets.

trait.name: Earth Glide
entries: The force of earth can burrow through mundane, unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the force of earth doesn't disturb the material they move through.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The force of earth makes two Earthbind Strike attacks.

action.name: Earthbind Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, and the target's speed becomes 0 until the start of the force of earth's next turn.

action.name: Shatter Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 60/120 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d12 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, or 47 ({@damage 6d12 + 8}) bludgeoning damage if the target is an object or structure.

bonus.name: Convocation of Earth (1/Day)
entries: The force of earth imbues the power of earth in themself or another Elemental they can see within 30 feet of them, granting one of the following effects of that Elemental's choice:

items: {@b Earthen Aura.} Stones rapidly whir around the Elemental in a 10-foot-radius sphere for 1 minute or until they're killed or {@condition incapacitated}. A creature who isn't an Elemental takes 5 slashing damage for every 5 feet they move into or within that area.

{@b Stone Armor.} Stone grows over the Elemental in a protective carapace, and they gain 20 temporary hit points. While the Elemental has these temporary hit points, they are immune to the {@condition dazed|FleeMortals}, {@condition paralyzed}, {@condition petrified}, and {@condition stunned} conditions.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The force of iron uses Form Stance then makes three Ferrous Blade attacks or three Iron Spike attacks.

action.name: Ferrous Greatblade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft. (20 ft. in Polearm Form), one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 4d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Iron Spike
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Form Stance
entries: The force of iron shapes their body to gain one of the following benefits until the start of their next turn:

action.name: Polearm Form
entries: The force of iron's melee attacks have a reach of 20 feet instead of 5 feet.

action.name: Reckless Form
entries: The force of iron has advantage on all melee attack rolls, but attack rolls against the force of iron have advantage.

action.name: Shield Form
entries: The force of iron gains a +3 bonus to AC.

action.name: Fire Form (1/Day)
entries: The force of iron's attacks deal an extra 13 ({@damage 2d12}) fire damage on a hit.

bonus.name: Convocation of Iron (1/Day)
entries: The force of iron imbues the power of iron in themself or another Elemental they can see within 30 feet of them, granting one of the following effects of that Elemental's choice:

items: {@b Earth Reinforcements.} Five {@creature earth spark|FleeMortals}s appear in unoccupied spaces within 20 feet of the Elemental. The sparks understand the Elemental, follow their verbal commands, and act immediately after the Elemental in the initiative order.

{@b Iron Skin.} Metal covers the Elemental, granting them resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage for 1 minute or until their {@status concentration} is broken (as if {@status concentration||concentrating} on a spell).

monster.name: Forzaantirilys

trait.name: Hellfire
entries: Fire damage dealt by Forzaantirilys ignores damage resistance.

trait.name: Ireful Defense (3/Day)
entries: When Forzaantirilys fails a saving throw, she can succeed instead. When she does, attack rolls made against her have advantage until the end of her next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Forzaantirilys makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 2d10 + 10}) piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage, and the target is set on fire for 1 minute or until the target or a creature who can reach them uses an action to extinguish the flames. A creature who is on fire at the start of their turn takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage. If a creature who is already on fire is set on fire again on a subsequent turn, the damage isn't cumulative, but the duration of the fire resets to 1 minute.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 17} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d6 + 10}) slashing damage, and Forzaantirilys can move the target up to 15 feet horizontally.

action.name: Scorching Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: Forzaantirilys exhales fire in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 24} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 70 ({@damage 20d6}) fire damage, and any mundane metal objects they are wearing or carrying are melted into slag and destroyed. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and their equipment isn't destroyed.

Additionally, the fire remains in that area until the end of Forzaantirilys's next turn. For the duration, that area is difficult terrain, and a creature who enters that area for the first time on a turn or ends their turn there takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage.

bonus.name: Blazing Rush
entries: Forzaantirilys moves up to half her speed. If she enters a creature's space during this move, the creature takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage.

reaction.name: Ignite the Insolent
entries: When a creature within 120 feet of Forzaantirilys attacks her, the attacker must make a {@dc 21} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the attacker is set on fire for 1 minute or until the attacker or a creature who can reach them uses an action to extinguish the flames. A creature who is on fire at the start of their turn takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage. If a creature who is already on fire is set on fire again on a subsequent turn, the damage isn't cumulative, but the duration of the fire resets to 1 minute.

legendaryHeader: Forzaantirilys has three villain actions. She can take each action once during an encounter after an enemy's turn. She can take these actions in any order but can use only one per round.

legendary.name: Action 1: Cinderfall
entries: A 30-foot-radius cloud of smoke and cinders surrounds Forzaantirilys until the end of her next turn. That area is heavily obscured for creatures other than Forzaantirilys. An enemy who needs to breathe and starts their turn within the cloud must succeed on a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

legendary.name: Action 2: Ashen Armor
entries: Forzaantirilys's skin hardens into a protective armor of ashen scales, granting her 100 temporary hit points. Until all these temporary hit points are gone, a creature within 5 feet of Forzaantirilys who touches her or hits her with an attack takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) fire damage.

legendary.name: Action 3: Supernova
entries: Forzaantirilys unleashes a massive burst of light and heat. Each creature within 120 feet of her must make a {@dc 21} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 35 ({@damage 10d6}) fire damage plus 35 ({@damage 10d6}) radiant damage and is {@condition blinded}. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition blinded}. The blindness lasts until cured by a power, a spell, or a similar supernatural effect that removes the {@condition blinded} condition.

trait.name: Churning Trunk
entries: Prone creatures can't make opportunity attacks against the cryptic, and the cryptic can move through spaces occupied by {@condition prone} creatures. The first time on a turn the cryptic moves through a space occupied by a {@condition prone} enemy, that enemy takes 7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cryptic makes two Slam attacks and uses Stone Bone Storm.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Stone Bone Storm
entries: The cryptic breaks apart their body, driving a flurry of stones in a 5-foot-wide, 30-foot-long line originating from their space. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) bludgeoning damage and falling {@condition prone} on a failed save, or taking half as much damage and not falling {@condition prone} on a successful one.
The fossil cryptic then reforms in an unoccupied space in the line's area.

action.name: Shatterstone {@recharge}
entries: The cryptic burrows up to half their speed. If the cryptic ends this movement within 5 feet of the surface, they can breach the surface. Each other creature within 20 feet of the cryptic when they breach must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 36 ({@damage 8d8}) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

bonus.name: Stoneshift
entries: The cryptic shifts the ground under the feet of one creature or object touching the ground within 30 feet of them. The target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or be moved up to 15 feet horizontally. Objects automatically fail this saving throw.

trait.name: Oncoming Storm
entries: Wisps of stinging snow and icy winds surround the storm hurler. When an enemy {@status concentration||concentrating} on a power, a spell, or a similar effect starts their turn within 15 feet of the storm hurler, the enemy must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or lose {@status concentration}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The storm hurler makes two Ice Javelin attacks.

action.name: Ice Javelin
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 120/360 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) piercing damage, and the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the end of their next turn.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Flower of Frost (3/Day)
entries: The storm hurler throws up to three Medium ice javelins, each at an unoccupied space they can see within 300 feet of them. These spaces must be within 30 feet of each other. The javelins have AC 13, 10 hit points, and vulnerability to fire damage. At the start of the storm hurler's next turn, any javelins with hit points remaining explode, showering icicles in a 20-foot radius. Creatures within the area of one or more explosions must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 28 ({@damage 8d6}) cold damage and is {@condition restrained} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition restrained}. Objects within this area take 28 ({@damage 8d6}) cold damage.

reaction.name: Frozen Retribution
entries: When a creature within 120 feet of the storm hurler misses them with a ranged weapon attack, the storm hurler can manipulate the storm surrounding them to freeze the projectile and hurl it back at the attacker as an Ice Javelin attack.

trait.name: Crush Underfoot
entries: When the wind sprinter enters a Medium or smaller enemy's space, the enemy must choose to either fall {@condition prone} or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) bludgeoning damage. Each enemy can be affected by this trait only once per turn.

trait.name: Oncoming Storm
entries: Wisps of stinging snow and icy winds surround the wind sprinter. When an enemy {@status concentration||concentrating} on a power, a spell, or a similar effect starts their turn within 15 feet of the wind sprinter, the enemy must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or lose {@status concentration}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The wind sprinter makes two Ice Axe attacks.

action.name: Ice Axe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d10 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Blizzard Surge {@recharge 5}
entries: The wind sprinter moves up to their speed in a straight line. At any point during this move, they can make up to three Ice Axe attacks against different creatures.

reaction.name: Begone, Smallfolk!
entries: After a Medium or smaller creature makes an opportunity attack against the wind sprinter, the wind sprinter can make an Ice Axe attack against that creature.

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The gem jelly can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the jelly remains motionless, they are indistinguishable from a natural crystal formation.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gem jelly makes two Pseudopod attacks.

action.name: Pseudopod (True Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Crystalline Shatter (Crystalline Form Only)
entries: The jelly shatters their hardened outer layer, returning to their true form and sending crystal shrapnel in all directions. Each creature within 10 feet of the gem jelly must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 36 ({@damage 8d8}) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Gem jellies are immune to this damage.

bonus.name: Harden
entries: The gem jelly transforms into a psionically hardened crystalline form or back into their true form. While in crystalline form, the jelly's AC increases to 20, their speed becomes 0, they can't make Pseudopod attacks, they have disadvantage on Dexterity saving throws, and they gain vulnerability to thunder damage.

reaction.name: Reactive Shatter (Crystalline Form Only)
entries: When the jelly takes thunder damage, they use Crystalline Shatter.

hp.special: 8 + eight times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The jelly can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the jelly remains motionless, they are indistinguishable from a natural crystal formation.

trait.name: Flowing Jelly
entries: The jelly can occupy their caregiver's space and vice versa, and it doesn't count as difficult terrain for them.
While occupying the same space as the jelly, the caregiver can take the Hide action to hide from creatures outside the jelly.

action.name: Signature Attack (Pseudopod)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 plus PB} piercing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Stretch Attack (2 Ferocity)
entries: The jelly makes a signature attack with a reach of 10 feet. On a hit, the attack deals an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} damage, and the jelly can pull the target 5 feet toward them.

action.name: 3rd Level: Crystallize (5 Ferocity)
entries: The jelly grows sharp crystals from the ground in a 20-foot-radius sphere centered on the jelly. Until the start of the jelly's next turn, that area becomes difficult terrain for their enemies, and when an enemy moves into or within that area, the enemy takes 2 × PB piercing damage for every 5 feet they travel.

action.name: 5th Level: Shatter (8 Ferocity)
entries: The jelly ejects jagged crystals from their body toward each enemy within 10 feet of them.
Each target must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw, taking {@damage PBd6} piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.name: Ghost Sycophant

hp.special: Six times their level (number of d6 Hit Dice equal to their level)

languages: any two languages they knew in life

action.name: Signature Attack (Dark Essence)
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) necrotic damage. This spell's damage increases by {@damage 1d10} when the sycophant reaches 5th level ({@damage 2d10}), 11th level ({@damage 3d10}), and 17th level ({@damage 4d10}).

action.name: 3rd Level: Call of the Dead (3/Day)
entries: When the sycophant hits a creature with a signature attack, the target must also succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the sycophant for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

action.name: 5th Level: Astral Presence (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the sycophant becomes {@condition invisible} for 1 minute or until they use a bonus action to end this effect. While {@condition invisible}, the sycophant can move through creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain, and the sycophant's signature attacks deal an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} damage to creatures who can't see them. The sycophant takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if they end their turn inside an object.

action.name: 7th Level: Whispers of the Dead (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the sycophant chooses up to PB creatures they can see within 30 feet of them. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Charisma saving throw or make an attack against their nearest ally (no action required). A {@condition frightened} creature has disadvantage on the saving throw.

monster.name: Ghoul
languages: the languages they knew in life

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ghoul makes one Barbed Tongue attack and one Claws attack. If both attacks hit the same creature, the target is {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} until the end of the target's next turn.

action.name: Barbed Tongue
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage, and the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the end of their next turn.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage, and the target can't take reactions until the end of their next turn.

bonus.name: Hungry Charge
entries: The ghoul moves up to half their speed in a straight line. If the ghoul moves at least 15 feet and ends this movement within 5 feet of a creature, they have advantage on the next attack roll they make against that creature until the end of the ghoul's next turn.

monster.name: Ghoul Craver
languages: the languages they knew in life

trait.name: Ever So Hungry
entries: Enemies can't take the Disengage action while three or more cravers are within 5 feet of them.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the craver takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the craver takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

action.name: Just a Taste (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}1 slashing damage, and the next non-minion ghoul who attacks that target before the start of the craver's next turn gains a bonus to the attack roll equal to the number of cravers who joined the attack.

monster.name: Giant Zombie
languages: understands the languages they knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Negative Nerves
entries: Whenever a creature deals 7 damage or less to the zombie, the zombie takes no damage instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The zombie makes two Fist attacks.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, they are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}). The zombie has two fists, each of which can grapple one target.

action.name: Toxic Exhalation {@recharge 5}
entries: The zombie spews toxic vomit in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Shove Away
entries: When a Huge or smaller creature within 10 feet of the zombie hits them with a melee attack, the zombie pushes the creature up to 10 feet away.

monster.name: Gibbering Mouther
languages: speaks all languages but doesn't understand any

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The gibbering mouther is immune to any power, spell, or effect that would alter their form.

trait.name: Primordial Influence
entries: A {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} enemy who starts their turn within 20 feet of the gibbering mouther must make a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, that creature's body is altered in an otherworldly way of the GM's choice—they might flicker in and out of reality, sprout miniature fingers from their fingers, or have their physical form altered in a similarly alien way. This alteration doesn't affect the creature's game statistics. A {@psionic cure ailment|TalPsi} power of 4th order or higher, a {@spell greater restoration} spell, or a similar supernatural effect reverses this alteration.

While altered in this way, a creature must repeat the saving throw whenever they finish a long rest. On a failed save, their previous alteration worsens or they experience another chaotic alteration of the GM's choice. If a creature fails this saving throw three times after their initial alteration, they transform into a gibbering mouther controlled by the GM, and only a {@spell wish} spell can restore the creature to their original form.

trait.name: Viscous Vicinity
entries: The gibbering mouther envelops their surroundings in their shifting reality. The area within 20 feet of them is difficult terrain for other creatures.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The gibbering mouther makes two Reality Rend attacks. They can replace one attack with a use of Pull.

action.name: Reality Rend
entries: {@atk mp} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) psychic damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} until the start of the gibbering mouther's next turn.

action.name: Pull
entries: The gibbering mouther warps reality around up to three creatures they can see within 60 feet of them. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 30 feet directly toward the gibbering mouther.

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The gibbering mouther is immune to any power, spell, or effect that would alter their form.

trait.name: Viscous Vicinity
entries: The gibbering mouther envelops their surroundings in their shifting reality. The area within 10 feet of them is difficult terrain for other creatures.

action.name: Signature Attack (Reality Rend)
entries: {@atk mp} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}{@damage 1d6 plus PB} psychic damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Stretch Attack (2 Ferocity)
entries: The gibbering mouther makes a signature attack with a reach of 10 feet. On a hit, the attack deals an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} damage, and the gibbering mouther can pull the target 5 feet toward them.

action.name: 3rd Level: Reality Pull (5 Ferocity)
entries: The gibbering mouther warps reality around up to PB enemies within 60 feet of them. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 20 feet directly toward the gibbering mouther.

action.name: 5th Level: Vicinity Shift (8 Ferocity)
entries: The gibbering mouther and each ally within 30 feet of them gains a +PB bonus to damage rolls and has their speed doubled until the start of the gibbering mouther's next turn. Additionally, the gibbering mouther can make one signature attack as part of this action.

trait.name: Bloodscent
entries: The abyssal archer knows the location of each creature who doesn't have all their hit points within 60 feet of them.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage, and the target's walking speed is reduced by a cumulative 5 feet until they regain at least 1 hit point.

reaction.name: Death Frenzy
entries: When an ally the abyssal archer can see within 30 feet of them is reduced to 0 hit points, the abyssal archer moves up to half their speed and makes a Bite attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The summoner makes two attacks using Bite, Three-Tail Flail, Fire Blast, or a combination of them. They can replace one attack with a use of Demonic Howl, if available.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage, and if the target is a creature, another creature the summoner can see within 30 feet of them magically regains 7 ({@damage 2d6}) hit points. If this attack is made against a willing ally, it automatically hits.

action.name: Three-Tail Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 3d4 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is pushed 5 feet away from the summoner.

action.name: Fire Blast (Cantrip)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 6} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Demonic Howl {@recharge 5}
entries: Until the beginning of the summoner's next turn, each ally within 30 feet of the summoner who can hear them has advantage on attack rolls.

action.name: Uplift (3/Day)
entries: The gnoll magically turns an allied {@creature abyssal hyena|FleeMortals} into a {@creature gnoll marauder|FleeMortals} for 1 hour.

bonus.name: Summon Abyssal Hyenas (3/Day)
entries: The summoner summons {@dice 1d4 + 1} {@creature abyssal hyena|FleeMortals}s, who appear in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of the summoner. The hyenas act immediately after the summoner's turn and follow the summoner's commands.

reaction.name: Death Frenzy
entries: When an ally the summoner can see within 30 feet of them is reduced to 0 hit points, the summoner moves up to half their speed and makes a Bite attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bonesplitter makes two attacks using Bite, Spiked Flail, or both. They can replace one attack with a use of Bloody Roar, if available.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage, or 11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage if the target is {@condition restrained}.

action.name: Spiked Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, they are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and the bonesplitter can't make Spiked Flail attacks.

action.name: Bloody Roar {@recharge}
entries: The bonesplitter roars, spitting a spray of blood. Each ally within 10 feet of them who can see them can make a weapon attack (no action required), provided that ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

bonus.name: Over Here!
entries: The bonesplitter yanks a creature they are grappling. The target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or swap spaces with the bonesplitter.

reaction.name: Death Frenzy
entries: When an ally the bonesplitter can see within 30 feet of them is reduced to 0 hit points, the bonesplitter moves up to half their speed and makes a Bite attack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The cackler makes one Bite attack or one Chill Touch attack and uses Moment of Brutality.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage plus 2 ({@damage 1d4}) necrotic damage.

action.name: Chill Touch (Cantrip)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 5} to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage, and the target can't regain hit points until the start of the cackler's next turn.

action.name: Moment of Brutality
entries: The cackler targets a creature they can see within 30 feet of them, magically flooding them with fury. The target must make a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw, which they can choose to fail. A creature who can't be {@condition charmed} succeeds on this saving throw automatically. On a failed save, the target takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage, then makes a Bite attack against a creature of the cackler's choice within 5 feet of the target. If the target has no Bite attack, they make an unarmed strike that deals piercing damage equal to {@damage 1d4} + their Strength modifier on a hit.

action.name: Fiendish Cackle {@recharge 5}
entries: The cackler unleashes a spine-chilling laugh. Each enemy within 30 feet of them who can hear them must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the cackler for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

reaction.name: Death Frenzy
entries: When an ally the cackler can see within 30 feet of them is reduced to 0 hit points, the cackler moves up to half their speed and makes a Bite attack.

reaction.name: Fell Teleport
entries: When a creature who the cackler can see within 30 feet of them dies, the cackler magically teleports into the space the creature occupied.

hp.special: Eight times their level (number of d10 Hit Dice equal to their level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Bite)
entries: {@atk mw} +3 plus damage. Beginning at 7th level, the gnasher can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Frenzied Bite (3/Day)
entries: When a creature the gnasher can see within 30 feet of them is reduced to 0 hit points, the gnasher can use a reaction to move up to half their speed and then make a signature attack. On a hit, the attack deals an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} piercing damage.

action.name: 5th Level: Flurry of Fangs (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the gnasher makes a signature attack against up to PB creatures within 5 feet of them.

action.name: 7th Level: Horrific Feast (1/Day)
entries: When the gnasher reduces a creature to 0 hit points with their signature attack, they can consume part of the creature as part of the attack, gaining {@damage PBd10} temporary hit points. Each enemy within 30 feet of the gnasher who can see them must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the gnasher until the end of the gnasher's next turn.

trait.name: Life Eater
entries: When an enemy the mage-gorger can see within 30 feet of them regains hit points, the mage-gorger chooses one non-minion ally they can see within 30 feet of them. That ally regains 2 hit points.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the mage-gorger takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the mage-gorger takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

action.name: Wizard Ripper (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 slashing damage plus 2 acid, cold, fire, or lightning damage (mage-gorger's choice), and until the start of the mage-gorger's next turn, the target has disadvantage on Constitution saving throws made to maintain {@status concentration}, including any Constitution saving throw triggered by this attack. Only one damage type is chosen for this attack regardless of how many mage-gorgers joined it.

trait.name: Rampaging Charge
entries: If the marauder moves at least 10 feet straight toward a creature and hits them with a Flail attack on the same turn, the marauder can make a Bite attack against that target as a bonus action.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Flail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Death Frenzy
entries: When an ally the marauder can see within 30 feet of them is reduced to 0 hit points, the marauder moves up to half their speed and makes a Bite attack.

trait.name: Death Feast
entries: When an ally within 5 feet of the wildling is reduced to 0 hit points, the wildling can deal 1 piercing damage to a creature within 5 feet of them (no action required), provided the wildling isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the wildling takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the wildling takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

action.name: Flail (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} by each wildling who joined the attack (escape {@dc 10} plus the number of wildlings who have it {@condition grappled}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the wildling can't make a Flail attack against another creature. A wildling can choose to release the {@condition grappled} creature while other wildlings still have them {@condition grappled}, reducing the escape DC accordingly.

trait.name: Backstab
entries: When the assassin has advantage on their attack roll against a creature who isn't a Construct or an Undead, their attacks deal an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage and inflict a bleeding wound on the target that lasts until the bleeding creature regains at least 1 hit point. A bleeding creature loses 2 hit points for each bleeding wound they have at the start of their turn. Any creature who can reach the target can use an action to stanch all the target's wounds, ending the effect.

trait.name: Crafty
entries: The assassin doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when they move out of an enemy's reach.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Summon Shadows (1/Day)
entries: A 10-foot-radius sphere of magical darkness emanates from a point the assassin can see for 1 minute. The darkness spreads around corners. Except for the assassin, a creature with darkvision can't see through this darkness, and mundane light can't illuminate it. At the start of their turn, the assassin can move the darkness up to 30 feet to a point they can see (no action required). If the assassin takes damage, the effect ends.

bonus.name: Sneak
entries: The assassin takes the Hide action.

trait.name: Crafty
entries: The cursespitter doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when they move out of an enemy's reach.

action.name: Toxic Touch (Cantrip)
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

action.name: Brittle Bone Hex (Cantrip)
entries: The cursespitter chooses one creature they can see within 60 feet of them. The target's bones are wracked with pain until the end of their next turn. The first time the target willingly moves or uses an action, a bonus action, or a reaction before then, they must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or take 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage.

action.name: To Me!
entries: The cursespitter chooses up to two willing creatures they can see within 30 feet of them. Each creature is teleported to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the cursespitter.

action.name: Dizzying Hex (2/Day; 1st-Level Spell)
entries: The cursespitter chooses one creature they can see within 60 feet of them. The target must make a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target falls {@condition prone} and can't stand back up for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

reaction.name: Cowardly Commander
