entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d8 + 9}) piercing damage. If the target is Huge or smaller, they must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed (as if by the worm's Swallow action).

action.name: Swallow
entries: The worm pulls a Huge or smaller {@condition grappled} creature into their maw and swallows them. A swallowed creature is no longer {@condition grappled}, but they are {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, have total cover against attacks and other effects outside the worm, and take 28 ({@damage 8d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the worm's turns.

If the worm takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside them, the worm must succeed on a {@dc 21} Constitution check at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, each of whom fall {@condition prone} in an unoccupied space within 10 feet of the worm. If the worm dies, a swallowed creature can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

bonus.name: Tongue Sweep
entries: The worm violently swings a creature they have {@condition grappled}. The {@condition grappled} creature takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) bludgeoning damage, and each enemy within 10 feet of the {@condition grappled} creature must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Tongue Recall
entries: When one of the worm's tongues takes damage that doesn't immediately destroy it, the worm can release any target that tongue is grappling and recall the tongue back inside the worm's body. That tongue can't be targeted until the worm uses it to grapple a creature again.

legendaryHeader: The worm has three villain actions. They can take each action once during an encounter after an enemy's turn. They can take these actions in any order but can use only one per round.

legendary.name: Action 1: Open the Earth
entries: The worm writhes, sending tremors through the ground and opening a 20-foot-wide, 100-foot-long, 40-foot-deep fissure in the ground, originating from the worm. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature falls into the fissure, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) bludgeoning damage from the fall and landing {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a creature flees to the closest unoccupied space outside the fissure's area.

legendary.name: Action 2: Earth Breach
entries: The worm burrows up to half their speed and then bursts through the surface, breaching the ground in a 10-foot-radius circle. Huge and smaller creatures within that area must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed (as if by the worm's Swallow action).

legendary.name: Action 3: Better Out Than In
entries: The worm projectile vomits the contents of their stomach in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) bludgeoning damage plus 21 ({@damage 6d6}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Additionally, creatures who were swallowed by the worm are regurgitated, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) bludgeoning damage and landing {@condition prone} in an unoccupied space of the worm's choice within that area.

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Tongue Lash)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 plus PB} acid damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Distracting Attack (2 Ferocity)
entries: The worm makes a signature attack. On a hit, the attack deals its normal effects, and the next attack roll made against the target before the start of the worm's next turn has advantage.

action.name: 3rd Level: Tongue Grab (5 Ferocity)
entries: The worm makes a signature attack. On a hit, the target is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 10 plus PB}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and the worm can't make a signature attack against another target.

action.name: 5th Level: Swallow (8 Ferocity)
entries: The worm attempts to swallow a Medium or smaller creature within 5 feet of them. The target must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage PBd6} bludgeoning damage and is swallowed. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't swallowed. The worm can have only one target swallowed at a time.

A swallowed target is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, they have total cover against attacks and other effects outside the worm, and they take {@damage PBd6} acid damage at the start of each of the worm's turns. Whenever the worm takes damage, they must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or regurgitate the swallowed creature, who falls {@condition prone} in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the worm. The DC for this saving throw equals 10 or half the triggering damage, whichever is higher. If the worm is {@condition incapacitated} or dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by the worm and can escape from the corpse using 5 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

bonus.name: Item Storage
entries: The worm can swallow an object without harming it by storing the object in a second stomach. They can use this bonus action again to regurgitate a specific stored object without disturbing any other objects in their second stomach. A regurgitated object lands in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the worm.
The worm's second stomach can hold up to PB × 10 pounds of objects, not exceeding a volume of 10 cubic feet.

monster.name: Kiona the Dread Lord

trait.name: Corrupting Phasing
entries: Kiona can move through other creatures and objects. Kiona takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if she ends her turn inside an object. A creature takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage the first time Kiona passes through them on a turn.

trait.name: Incorporeal Empowerment
entries: Each incorporeal Undead within 120 feet of Kiona ignores difficult terrain.

trait.name: Spiritual Sacrifice (3/Day)
entries: When Kiona fails a saving throw, she can lose 15 hit points and choose to succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Kiona makes two Energy Siphon attacks.

action.name: Energy Siphon
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one creature. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) necrotic damage, and the target can't regain hit points until the start of Kiona's next turn. Kiona gains temporary hit points equal to half the damage dealt by this attack.

action.name: Rise from Death (1/Day)
entries: Kiona conjures three shadows, two specters, or one wraith under her control. Each summoned creature appears in an unoccupied space within 30 feet of Kiona and acts immediately after her turn on the same initiative count.

bonus.name: Path of Pain
entries: Kiona chooses one other incorporeal Undead within 120 feet of her who can see her. That Undead can move up to their speed.

reaction.name: Death's Breath
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of Kiona hits her with an attack, she breathes a toxin at the creature. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the end of their next turn.

legendaryHeader: Kiona has three villain actions. She can take each action once during an encounter after an enemy's turn. She can take these actions in any order but can use only one per round.

legendary.name: Action 1: Restrain Them!
entries: A 20-foot-radius sphere of spectral arms emerges from a point Kiona can see within 120 feet of her. Each enemy in that area must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition restrained} until the end of Kiona's next turn.

legendary.name: Action 2: Ruinous March
entries: Kiona and each ally within 60 feet of her can move up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

legendary.name: Action 3: Vitality Drain
entries: Kiona and each ally within 60 feet of her can make a melee attack (no action required). A creature hit by one of these attacks gains a level of {@condition exhaustion}.

trait.name: Charm Resistant
entries: Kishina has advantage on saving throws she makes to avoid or end the {@condition charmed} condition on herself.

trait.name: Light Landing
entries: Kishina takes no damage from falling.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: Kishina's long jump is up to 45 feet and her high jump is up to 15 feet, with or without a running start.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Kishina makes four Unarmed Strike attacks or three Throwing Knife attacks.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage, or 20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage on a critical hit.

action.name: Throwing Knife
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d4 + 7}) piercing damage.

action.name: Painful Sprint {@recharge}
entries: Kishina moves up to her speed without provoking opportunity attacks, hitting a pressure point on each enemy she can see who she passes within 5 feet of during this move. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throwing or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of their next turn. A creature who fails this save by 5 or more also falls {@condition prone}.

bonus.name: Throw
entries: Kishina attempts to throw a Large or smaller enemy she can see within 5 feet of her. The target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw or be moved up to 15 feet away from her and be knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Shield (3/Day; 1st-Level Spell)
entries: When Kishina is targeted by an attack or a {@spell magic missile} spell, she conjures an {@condition invisible} barrier of force. Until the start of her next turn, she gains a +5 bonus to AC, including against the triggering attack, and takes no damage from magic missile.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: Klar can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: Klar can mimic animal sounds. A creature who hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful {@dc 13} Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check.

trait.name: Standing Leap
entries: Klar's long jump is up to 40 feet and their high jump is up to 15 feet, with or without a running start.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Klar makes one Bite attack and one Mantis Claws attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Mantis Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 f., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, they are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}). While {@condition grappled} in this way, the target is {@condition restrained}. Moving while grappling a Medium or smaller target doesn't halve Klar's speed. Klar can have only one target {@condition grappled} in this way at a time.

bonus.name: Bellowing Roar (1/Day)
entries: Klar lets loose a terrifying roar.

Each creature within 30 feet of Klar who can hear them must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of Klar for 1 minute. If a creature {@condition frightened} in this way takes damage, they can repeat this saving throw, ending the effect on themself on a success.

bonus.name: Kangaroo Leap
entries: Klar jumps up to half their speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

trait.name: Shield? Shield!
entries: The adeptus gains a +1 bonus to AC while within 5 feet of at least one ally who also has this trait, is wielding a shield, and isn't {@condition incapacitated} or {@condition prone}. To benefit from this trait, the adeptus must be wielding a shield.

action.name: Firecracker
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 4} to hit, range 60 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 2d4}) fire damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition deafened} until the end of their next turn.

action.name: Shocking Grasp (Cantrip)
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) lightning damage, and the target can't take reactions until the start of their next turn. The adeptus has advantage on this attack roll if the target is wearing metal armor.

action.name: Lesser Magic Missile (1/Day; 1st-Level Spell)
entries: The adeptus creates three glowing darts of magical force. Each dart hits a creature of their choice who they can see within 120 feet of them. A dart deals 2 ({@damage 1d2 + 1}) force damage to its target. The darts all strike simultaneously, and the adeptus can direct them to hit one creature or several. This action is considered to be the {@spell magic missile} spell for the purpose of other spells and effects.

trait.name: Shield? Shield!
entries: The artifex gains a +1 bonus to AC while within 5 feet of at least one ally who also has this trait, is wielding a shield, and isn't {@condition incapacitated} or {@condition prone}. To benefit from this trait, the artifex must be wielding a shield.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The artifex makes one Chain Hook attack and uses Activate Trap, if available.

action.name: Chain Hook
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 15/30 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage, and if the target is a Large or smaller creature, they must succeed on a {@dc 12} Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 15 feet toward the artifex.

action.name: Activate Trap (3/Day)
entries: The artifex activates one of the following hidden traps; the artifex can't use the same trap two rounds in a row:

action.name: Spiky Pit Trap
entries: The artifex chooses a point on the ground that they can see within 60 feet of them, opening a concealed 15-foot-square trapdoor on the ground centered on that point to reveal a 10-foot-deep pit trap lined with spikes. Creatures on the ground in the trapdoor's area must make a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature falls into the pit and takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage from the spikes and 3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage from the fall. On a successful save, a creature moves to the nearest unoccupied space outside that area.

action.name: Swarm of Bees Trap
entries: The artifex chooses a point on the ground that they can see within 60 feet of them, causing a buried canister to erupt and release a 15-foot-radius, 10-foot-high cylinder of swarming bees. When a creature enters the swarm's area for the first time on a turn or starts their turn there, they must make a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 5 ({@damage 2d4}) poison damage and is {@condition poisoned} until the end of their next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition poisoned}. At the start of each of the artifex's turns, the swarm moves 10 feet away from the artifex in a straight line. The swarm disperses after 1 minute or when the artifex dies.

action.name: Wall of Fire Trap
entries: The artifex chooses a point on the ground that they can see within 60 feet of them, igniting a concealed trench of oil and creating a 20-foot long, 15-foot high, and 1-foot-thick wall of fire. When the wall appears, each creature within its area must make a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw, taking 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature who enters the wall for the first time on a turn or ends their turn there takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage. The wall is opaque and lasts for 1 minute.

trait.name: Shield? Shield!
entries: The centurion gains a +1 bonus to AC while within 5 feet of at least one ally who also has this trait, is wielding a shield, and isn't {@condition incapacitated} or {@condition prone}. To benefit from this trait, the centurion must be wielding a shield.

action.name: Pilum
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Firetail Pilum (2/Day)
entries: The centurion ignites a pilum then uses it to make a ranged Pilum attack against a target within 60 feet of them. Hit or miss, the target and each creature in a 5-foot-wide line between the target and the centurion must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or take 5 ({@damage 2d4}) fire damage. The line smolders for 1 minute, creating a 5-foot-wide, 20-foot-tall wall of opaque smoke. A creature within reach of the pilum can use an action to extinguish it, causing the smoke to dissipate.

action.name: Boom Pilum!!! (1/Day)
entries: The centurion straps a vial of unstable ores to a pilum then uses it to make a ranged Pilum attack against a target within 60 feet of them. Hit or miss, the ores explode after the attack. The target and each creature within 10 feet of them must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) thunder damage, is knocked {@condition prone}, and is {@condition deafened} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). On a successful save, a creature takes only half as much damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone} or {@condition deafened}.

hp.special: Eight times their level (number of d10 Hit Dice equal to their level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Gladius)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d8 plus PB} piercing damage. Beginning at 7th level, the decanus can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Reinforce (3/Day)
entries: When the decanus sees an ally within 30 feet of them being targeted by an attack, the decanus can use a reaction to move up to their speed toward the target. If the decanus ends their movement within 5 feet of the target, the target gains a +PB bonus to their AC until the beginning of the decanus's next turn, including against the triggering attack.

action.name: 5th Level: Shield Bash (3/Day)
entries: The decanus attempts to topple a Medium or smaller creature within 5 feet of them. The target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. Succeed or fail, the decanus then makes two signature attacks against any creature within reach.

action.name: 7th Level: One-Kobold Army (1/Day)
entries: The decanus moves up to their speed, then makes a number of signature attacks equal to the number of enemies within 5 feet of them (minimum of three attacks). Each enemy within range must be attacked at least once. On a hit, the target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Charisma saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the decanus for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

trait.name: Shield? Shield!
entries: The legionary gains a +1 bonus to AC while within 5 feet of at least one ally who also has this trait, is wielding a shield, and isn't {@condition incapacitated} or {@condition prone}. To benefit from this trait, the legionary must be wielding a shield.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The legionary makes two Gladius attacks. They can replace one attack with a Shield Bash attack.

action.name: Gladius
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shield Bash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, they must succeed on a {@dc 12} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Reinforce
entries: When an ally within 10 feet of the legionary is targeted by an attack, the legionary can move to the nearest unoccupied space within 5 feet of that creature. If that creature also has the Shield? Shield! trait, they gain the benefit of that trait against the triggering attack. To use this reaction, the legionary must be able to see the ally and the attacker.

trait.name: Shield? Shield!
entries: The signifer gains a +1 bonus to AC while within 5 feet of at least one ally who also has this trait, is wielding a shield, and isn't {@condition incapacitated} or {@condition prone}. To benefit from this trait, the signifer must be wielding a shield.

trait.name: Standard Bearer
entries: Each kobold unit can have one or more signifers, whose weapon is their unit's battle standard. If a signifer drops their signum, they use the kobold tiro stat block instead. If an allied kobold tiro uses an action to pick up a signum not carried by another creature, that tiro uses the kobold signifer stat block instead. When a signifer or tiro's stat block changes in this way, any conditions or effects currently affecting them remain active, and their hit points and hit point maximum remain the same.
A signum that isn't being held by a creature can be damaged; it has AC 15, 5 hit points, and immunity to poison and psychic damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The signifer makes two Signum attacks.

action.name: Signum
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Shield Wall Formation
entries: The signifer chooses up to four kobolds within 60 feet of them who can hear them. Each kobold can use their reaction to move up to their speed, and each kobold who does so must end this movement within 5 feet of an ally.

bonus.name: Glory to the Legion (1/Day)
entries: The signifer and each ally within 30 feet of them who can hear them regains 5 ({@damage 2d4}) hit points.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the tiro takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the tiro takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

trait.name: Shield? Shield!
entries: The tiro gains a +1 bonus to AC while within 5 feet of at least one ally who also has this trait, is wielding a shield, and isn't {@condition incapacitated} or {@condition prone}. To benefit from this trait, the tiro must be wielding a shield.

trait.name: Testudo
entries: When the tiro finishes a long rest, they choose a non-minion creature to be their commander. While a tiro who isn't {@condition incapacitated} or {@condition prone} is within 5 feet of their commander, the commander gains a cumulative +1 bonus to AC (maximum bonus of +5).

action.name: Pugio (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage.

trait.name: Shield? Shield!
entries: The veles gains a +1 bonus to AC while within 5 feet of at least one ally who also has this trait, is wielding a shield, and isn't {@condition incapacitated} or {@condition prone}. To benefit from this trait, the veles must be wielding a shield.

action.name: Pilum
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage. If the attack hits a creature wielding a shield, the veles can embed the pilum in the shield, giving the target disadvantage on attack rolls until the target either stops wielding the shield or uses an action to remove the pilum from it. The veles carries six pila.

bonus.name: Pivot
entries: The veles moves up to half their speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

trait.name: Not What I Seem
entries: The venator begins combat disguised as an inexperienced warrior. They have advantage on their first weapon attack roll against a creature who hasn't seen them make an attack.

trait.name: Shield? Shield!
entries: The venator gains a +1 bonus to AC while within 5 feet of at least one ally who also has this trait, is wielding a shield, and isn't {@condition incapacitated} or {@condition prone}. To benefit from this trait, the venator must be wielding a shield.

action.name: Dolabra
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Net
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 5/15 ft., one Large or smaller creature. {@h}The target is {@condition restrained} until they are freed. A creature can use their action to make a {@dc 10} Strength check, freeing themself or another creature within their reach on a success. Dealing 5 slashing damage to the net (AC 10) also frees the creature without harming them and destroys the net. The venator carries one net.

bonus.name: Lost in the Crowd
entries: The venator takes the Hide action. They have advantage on their Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) check if they are within 5 feet of two or more allied kobolds.

bonus.name: Then We Light the Net on Fire!
entries: The venator chooses a creature within 5 feet of them who is {@condition restrained} by a net and lights that net on fire. While {@condition restrained} by the net, the target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage at the start of each of their turns. Each time the net deals damage, roll any die. On an odd result, the net burns away and is destroyed, freeing the {@condition restrained} creature. A creature who attempts to free the {@condition restrained} creature from the net (as described in the venator's Net attack) automatically puts out the fire as part of that action, regardless of whether that check succeeds.

monster.name: Koptourok
languages: understands the languages they knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Breathless Aura
entries: Enemies within 30 feet of the koptourok can't speak, and if they are a creature who needs to breathe, they also have disadvantage on Constitution saving throws.

trait.name: Wings of Breath
entries: The koptourok gains a flying speed equal to their walking speed if they have at least one enemy within 30 feet of them. If the koptourok starts their turn in the air and doesn't have a flying speed, they fall.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The koptourok makes two Choking Grasp attacks.

action.name: Choking Grasp
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 30 ft., one creature. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is pulled to an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the koptourok and {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}). While {@condition grappled} in this way, the target is {@condition restrained} and the koptourok's speed isn't halved by the grapple.

action.name: Last Gasp
entries: The koptourok attempts to steal the breath from each creature they are grappling. Each target must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) bludgeoning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The koptourok gains temporary hit points equal to 5 times the number of creatures who failed their save.

reaction.name: Thunderous Deflation
entries: When the koptourok drops to 30 hit points or fewer, they unleash a shrieking wail. Each creature within 30 feet of the koptourok must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) thunder damage and is {@condition deafened} until the end of their next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition deafened}. The koptourok then releases all creatures they are grappling and flies up to their speed.

monster.name: Kraken
languages: understands all languages but can't speak

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The Kraken can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Discorporation
entries: When the Kraken drops to 0 hit points or dies, all conditions and other effects end for them. They teleport back to the place where they slumber, return to life with all their hit points, and fall {@condition unconscious}.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The Kraken deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Slowed Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the Kraken fails a saving throw, they can choose to succeed instead, and their speed is reduced by a cumulative 10 feet for 24 hours.

trait.name: Supernatural Resistance
entries: The Kraken has advantage on saving throws against powers, spells, and other supernatural effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Kraken makes four Tentacle attacks or uses Mental Lance three times.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d10 + 8}) bludgeoning damage plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) psychic damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 18}). The Kraken has ten tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

action.name: Mental Lance (3rd-Order Power)
entries: {@atk rp} {@hit 18} to hit, range 120 ft., one creature. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d10}) psychic damage, and the target is {@condition frightened} of the Kraken until the start of the Kraken's next turn.

action.name: Psionic Storm
entries: The Kraken creates a psionic storm, entrapping a vehicle they can see within 120 feet of them. While entrapped in the storm, the vehicle is {@condition restrained}. The storm ends if the Kraken's {@status concentration} is broken (as if {@status concentration||concentrating} on a spell) or if they are more than 120 feet from the vehicle. If the Kraken's turn ends three times before the storm ends, the vehicle is reduced to 0 hit points and this effect ends.

action.name: Skull-Splitting Howl (1/Day)
entries: The Kraken telepathically howls in the mind of each enemy within 120 feet of them. Each target must make a {@dc 26} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 55 ({@damage 10d10}) psychic damage and can't concentrate on powers or spells until the start of the Kraken's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and suffers no other effect.

bonus.name: Telekinetic Fling
entries: The Kraken throws a creature they are grappling into an unoccupied space the Kraken can see within 60 feet of them. The target lands {@condition prone} and takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Psychic Reprisal
entries: When the Kraken is damaged by an attack, each enemy within 30 feet of the attacker (including the attacker) must make a {@dc 26} Wisdom saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendaryHeader: The Kraken has three villain actions. They can take each action once during an encounter after an enemy's turn. The Kraken can take these actions in any order but can use only one per round.

legendary.name: Action 1: Psionic Tentacles
entries: Psionically conjured tentacles make a Tentacle attack on each enemy within 120 feet of the Kraken. The Kraken then uses Telekinetic Fling on each creature they are grappling.

legendary.name: Action 2: Psionic Ink
entries: The Kraken teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space they can see. Each creature within 30 feet of the space the Kraken left must make a {@dc 26} Dexterity saving throw or be covered in psionic ink, which they can use an action to wipe away. A creature covered in psionic ink takes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) psychic damage at the start of each of their turns.

legendary.name: Action 3: The Ocean's Wrath
entries: The Kraken unleashes a wave of intense psionic power. Each creature within 120 feet of the Kraken must make a {@dc 26} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 65 ({@damage 10d12}) psychic damage and is {@condition frightened} of the Kraken for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Avoidance
entries: If the lacuna is subjected to an effect that allows them to make a saving throw to take only half damage, they instead take no damage if they succeed on the saving throw, and only half damage if they fail.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the lacuna remains motionless, they are indistinguishable from a normal statue.

trait.name: Fiend Between
entries: The lacuna doesn't have a walking speed and can't benefit from any bonus to their speed.

trait.name: Supernatural Resistance
entries: The lacuna has advantage on saving throws against powers, spells, and other supernatural effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lacuna makes three Grief-Eater attacks and uses Infuse Sadness, if available.

action.name: Grief-Eater
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20 ft., one creature. {@h}29 ({@damage 4d10 + 7}) psychic damage, and the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the end of their next turn.

action.name: Infuse Sadness (1/Day)
entries: Each enemy the lacuna can see within 30 feet of them must succeed on a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw or be overwhelmed with grief for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). While a creature is overwhelmed, attacks against them are made with advantage.

bonus.name: Slip Between
entries: The lacuna teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space they can see.

reaction.name: Slip Away
entries: When a creature within 60 feet of the lacuna targets them with an attack, the lacuna teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space they can see. If the lacuna is no longer a valid target for the triggering attack, the attacker must choose a new target or the attack misses.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Utility)
headerEntries: In addition to any other spells in this stat block, Avalla can cast the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}):

trait.name: Exploit Opening (3/Day)
entries: When Avalla makes an attack, she has advantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Supernatural Resistance
entries: Avalla has advantage on saving throws against powers, spells, and other supernatural effects.

action.name: Lightning Lash (Cantrip)
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one creature. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) lightning damage, and Avalla can move the target up to 15 feet horizontally.

action.name: Iron Terror (1/Day; 4th-Level Spell)
entries: Avalla projects a terrifying illusion of the High Command to each enemy in a 30-foot cone. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or take 21 ({@damage 6d6}) psychic damage and be {@condition frightened} of each member of the High Command for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

action.name: Iron Shackles (1/Day; 3rd-Level Spell; Concentration)
entries: Avalla conjures animated iron chains at a point she can see on the ground within 60 feet of her. The chains fill a 15-foot- square on the ground centered on that point and last for 1 minute. When a creature enters that area for the first time on a turn or starts their turn there, they must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition restrained} (save ends at start of turn). A creature {@condition restrained} in this way takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) bludgeoning damage at the end of each of their turns.

action.name: Iron Ring (2/Day)
entries: If not in the Cyst, Avalla teleports to the Cyst. If in the Cyst, she teleports to a place she has visited.

reaction.name: Escape Ring
entries: When Avalla isn't in the Cyst and an ally she can see within 60 feet of her drops to 0 hit points, she expends a use of Iron Ring and teleports herself to the Cyst along with each willing ally within 60 feet of her who isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

reaction.name: Spellcasting Feedback
entries: When a creature Avalla can see within 60 feet of her casts a spell, she taps into the caster's mind and sabotages their magic. The creature can choose either to cast the spell then take 3 ({@damage 1d6}) psychic damage per level of the spell cast, or to let the spell fail. If the spell fails, the creature's spell slot is expended with no effect and their action is wasted.

monster.name: Lady Emer

trait.name: Stone Sacrifice (3/Day)
entries: When Emer fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead by ending the effects of her Stone Gaze on a creature of her choice within 300 feet of her.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Emer uses Pinning Shot or makes three attacks using Snake Bite, Longbow, or both. She also uses Stone Gaze or Envenomed Stone, if available.

action.name: Snake Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}17 ({@damage 5d6}) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the end of Emer's next turn. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the target can't take reactions.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 11} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d8 + 7}) piercing damage plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Pinning Shot
entries: Emer makes three Longbow attacks against a creature touching the ground within 150 feet of her. If at least two of those attacks hit, the target is {@condition restrained} by arrows pinning their limbs to the ground. A creature {@condition restrained} in this way or another creature who can reach them can use an action to pull out the arrows and end the condition.

action.name: Stone Gaze
entries: Emer fires beams of energy from her eyes at up to three creatures she can see within 60 feet of her. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or begin turning to stone (save ends at end of turn). While turning to stone, a creature's speed is reduced by 10 feet and they have disadvantage on Dexterity checks and saving throws. If a creature who is turning to stone is targeted by this action again and fails their save, their speed is reduced by another 10 feet and they are {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} until the effect ends.

If a creature who is turning to stone and {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} in this way is targeted by this action again and fails their save, they are {@condition petrified} and can no longer make saving throws to end the effects of Stone Gaze. The petrification lasts until the creature is restored by Emer's Stone Sacrifice trait, a {@psionic cure ailment|TalPsi} power of 4th order or higher, a {@spell greater restoration} spell, or a similar supernatural effect.

action.name: Envenomed Stone {@recharge 5}
entries: Emer utters an ancient hex. Each creature within 60 feet of her who is being turned to stone by her Stone Gaze must make a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw, taking 44 ({@damage 8d10}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

bonus.name: Mesmerizing Eyes
entries: The glowing eyes of Emer's snakes gaze at one creature Emer can see within 60 feet of her. If the target can see Emer, they must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} until the start of the target's next turn. A target {@condition charmed} in this way must immediately use their reaction, if available, to move up to their speed in a direction of Emer's choice.

reaction.name: Blinding Mucus
entries: When a creature Emer can see within 5 feet of her hits her with a melee attack, Emer spits venom at their eyes. The target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage and be {@condition blinded} until the start of their next turn.

legendaryHeader: Emer has three villain actions. She can take each action once during an encounter after an enemy's turn. She can take these actions in any order but can use only one per round.

legendary.name: Action 1: I See You!
entries: Emer uses Stone Gaze against each enemy she can see within 60 feet of her.

legendary.name: Action 2: Medusa's Evolution
entries: Emer grows wings from her back, gaining a flying speed of 40 feet, then she moves up to her speed without provoking opportunity attacks. After 1 minute, the wings crumble to dust and her flying speed is lost.

legendary.name: Action 3: Stone Puppets
entries: Emer mentally manipulates the stone in each creature who is being turned to stone by her Stone Gaze. Emer and each of those creatures move up to their speed then make a weapon attack against a creature of Emer's choice (no action required).

trait.name: Cave Apex
entries: The lamasombra's unnatural scales, padded feet, and bones allow them to avoid detection. They can't be detected with tremorsense. When the lamasombra is in darkness or dim light, they are {@condition invisible} to creatures with darkvision, but they are visible in dim light to creatures without darkvision.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The lamasombra can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lamasombra makes one Bite attack and one Tongue attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}33 ({@damage 6d8 + 6}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, they must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or contract boiling wastes disease. Until the disease is cured, the target can't regain hit points, and the lamasombra can sense the direction to the creature's location as long as they're on the same plane of existence.

action.name: Tongue
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 6d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage, or 37 ({@damage 9d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage if the target is a creature who can't see the lamasombra. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, they are pulled up to 15 feet in a straight line toward the lamasombra.

bonus.name: Nightmarish Cunning
entries: The lamasombra takes the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

hp.special: Nine times their level (number of d12 Hit Dice equal to their level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Molten Slam)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 + PB} bludgeoning damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage. A flammable object hit by this attack ignites if it isn't being worn or carried. Beginning at 7th level, the bastion can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Burning Embrace (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the bastion makes a signature attack against a creature within range. If the attack hits, the target is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 10 plus PB}). While {@condition grappled} in this way, a target is {@condition restrained} and takes {@damage PBd6} fire damage at the start of each of their turns.

action.name: 5th Level: Melting Grasp (3/Day)
entries: When the bastion hits a creature with a signature attack, the creature takes an extra {@damage PBd4} fire damage. If the target is wielding a mundane metal weapon, the bastion partially melts the target's weapon, giving it a permanent -2 penalty to attack and damage rolls. If the target is wielding a supernatural metal weapon, the penalty lasts for 1 hour instead.

action.name: 7th Level: Eruption (1/Day)
entries: As an action, the bastion erupts, shooting a 30-foot cone of earth and lava from their head. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage PBd6} bludgeoning damage plus {@damage PBd6} fire damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and is not knocked {@condition prone}. The lava spreads around corners and ignites flammable objects in that area that aren't being worn or carried.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Utility)
headerEntries: In addition to any other spells in this stat block, Lestheris can cast the following spells, using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 14}):

trait.name: Charm Resistant
entries: Lestheris has advantage on saving throws to avoid or end the {@condition charmed} condition on herself.

trait.name: Dark Calling
entries: Each other creature within 30 feet of Lestheris has disadvantage on death saving throws.

trait.name: Tome of the Ethereal
entries: Lestheris can see 120 feet into the Ethereal Plane.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Lestheris makes two Grave Grasp or two Necrotic Lance attacks.

action.name: Grave Grasp (Cantrip)
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage, and the target can't regain hit points until the start of Lestheris's next turn.

action.name: Necrotic Lance (1st-Level Spell)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 6} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage.
Lestheris can destroy a shade under her control within 30 feet of her and deal an extra 4 ({@damage 1d8}) necrotic damage to the target.

action.name: Animate Spirits (2/Day)
entries: Lestheris animates two shades.

The shades appear in unoccupied spaces Lestheris can see within 30 feet of her. The shades act immediately after Lestheris on the same initiative count and follow her verbal orders. If Lestheris dies, the shades are destroyed.

reaction.name: Ethereal Step (3/Day)
entries: When a creature Lestheris can see within 60 feet of her targets her with an attack, power, or spell while she isn't on the Ethereal Plane, she can choose one of the following effects:

items: Lestheris enters the Ethereal Plane, then returns to the plane and the space she left at the start of her next turn.

entries: If that space is occupied, she returns to the nearest unoccupied space of her choice.
• She teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space she can see.

trait.name: Supernatural Resistance
entries: The leyleech has advantage on saving throws against powers, spells, and other supernatural effects.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature who can cast spells, the leyleech chooses one of the target's spellcasting abilities. That ability score is reduced by 1 (min- imum score of 1) until the target finishes a short or long rest, and the leyleech's form becomes charged for 1 minute or until they use Magic Purge.

action.name: Magic Purge (Charged Form Only)
entries: The leyleech spews corrupted magical energy at a creature they can see within 30 feet of them. The leyleech is no longer charged, and the target must make a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw, taking 7 ({@damage 2d6}) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Bite)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 plus PB} piercing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Sparking Attack (2 Ferocity)
entries: The leyleech makes a signature attack. On a hit, the attack deals an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} damage, and if the target hits the leyleech with an attack before the start of the leyleech's next turn, the target takes PB lightning damage.

action.name: 3rd Level: Anomalous Terrain (5 Ferocity)
entries: The area within 10 feet of the leyleech becomes difficult terrain for their enemies until the start of their next turn. When an enemy enters that area for the first time on a turn or starts their turn there, they must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage PBd4} force damage.

action.name: 5th Level: Magic Purge (8 Ferocity)
entries: The leyleech spews corrupted magical energy at a creature they can see within 30 feet of them. The target must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage PBd8} force damage and is {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} until the start of the leyleech's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition dazed|FleeMortals}.

reaction.name: Absorb Magic (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: When the leyleech's caregiver is within 30 feet of them and the leyleech or their caregiver is affected by a spell of 3rd level or lower, the leyleech consumes the spell's magic, and it has no effect on the leyleech and their caregiver.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Utility)
headerEntries: In addition to any other spells in this stat block, the lich can cast the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 20}):

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If the lich is destroyed but their soulstone is intact, their soul retreats into the stone. While the lich's soul is in the stone, a creature who can see the stone at the start of their turn must succeed on a {@dc 20} Charisma saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by the stone until the end of their next turn. While {@condition charmed} in this way, the creature must do everything in their power to move toward and touch the stone, avoiding obvious hazards.

If a creature touches the stone while the lich's soul is inside, the creature must make a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature drops to 0 hit points and the lich reforms with all their hit points in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the soulstone. On a successful save, the creature loses half their hit points and the lich reforms with half their hit points in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the soulstone.
The soulstone has AC 19, 50 hit points, and immunity to all damage except force and thunder.

trait.name: Supernatural Resistance
entries: The lich has advantage on saving throws against powers, spells, and other supernatural effects.

trait.name: Turn Immunity
entries: The lich is immune to effects that turn Undead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lich uses Glare of Undeath and makes four attacks using Biting Acid, Disruptive Thunder, Pain of Ages, or a combination of them.

action.name: Biting Acid (3rd-Level Spell)
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 12} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 5d8}) acid damage, and the target can't regain hit points until the start of the lich's next turn.

action.name: Disruptive Thunder (3rd-Level Spell)
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d10}) thunder damage. If the target is Huge or smaller, the lich can move them up to 45 feet horizontally.

action.name: Pain of Ages (3rd-Level Spell)
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 90 ft., one creature. {@h}21 ({@damage 6d6}) psychic damage, and the first time the target hits a creature with an attack before the start of the lich's next turn, that attack deals half damage.

action.name: Glare of Undeath
entries: The lich's eyes flare with supernatural power at one creature they can see within 60 feet of them. The target must succeed on a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw or be compelled to hug themself tightly as protection against an unbearably cruel world. A creature hugging themself in this way is {@condition restrained} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). A creature the target can hear and understand can use an action to make a {@dc 20} Charisma ({@skill Persuasion}) check, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Horrid Woe (2/Day)
entries: The lich sends negative energy coursing through a creature they can see within 90 feet of them. The target is seared with pain and must make a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw, taking 61 ({@damage 7d8 + 30}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A target reduced to 0 hit points by this damage becomes stable but can't regain hit points, and their spirit turns into a wraith who appears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of their body. This wraith acts on the lich's turn immediately after them, and they obey the lich's verbal commands to the best of their ability. If the wraith or lich are destroyed, the wraith disappears, the target's spirit returns to their body, and the target can regain hit points.

action.name: Life Absorption (1/Day; 9th-Level Spell; Concentration)
entries: The lich unleashes a wave of life-sapping energy. Each enemy within 120 feet of them must make a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) necrotic damage at the start of each of their turns for 1 minute, and the lich gains temporary hit points equal to the total damage dealt.

bonus.name: Necrotic Form (3rd-Level Spell)
entries: The lich enters a shadow form and moves up to their speed. While in this form, the lich is immune to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage and the {@condition grappled} and {@condition restrained} conditions, and they can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. The lich reverts to their true form at the end of their turn.

reaction.name: Immortal Insight
entries: When another creature the lich can see makes an attack roll, ability check, or saving throw, the lich can cause the roll to be made with advantage or disadvantage.

trait.name: Avoidance
entries: If the lightbender is subjected to an effect that allows them to make a saving throw to take only half damage, they instead take no damage if they succeed on the saving throw, and only half damage if they fail.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the lightbender moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits them with a Claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the lightbender can make one Bite attack against them as a bonus action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lightbender makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks, or uses their Tail Whip twice.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) radiant damage.

action.name: Hypnotic Mane (1/Day)
entries: The lightbender discharges the light absorbed in their mane into a brilliant, mesmerizing display. Each creature within 15 feet of the lightbender must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by the lightbender for 1 minute. While {@condition charmed} in this way, a creature is {@condition incapacitated} and has a speed of 0. If a creature {@condition charmed} in this way takes damage or if someone else uses an action to shake the creature out of their stupor, the condition ends for that creature.

reaction.name: Afterimage
entries: When the lightbender is hit by an attack, they can reveal that the attacker is attacking a past visual imprint of the lightbender. The lightbender appears in an unoccupied space they can see within 30 feet of their imprint, the attack misses, then the imprint disappears. The lightbender can't use this reaction if the attacker relies on senses other than sight, such as blindsight, or if they can perceive illusions as false, as with truesight.

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Bite)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 plus PB} piercing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Tail Whip (2 Ferocity)
entries: The lightbender makes a signature attack. On a hit, the attack deals an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} radiant damage to the target, and a different creature the lightbender chooses within 15 feet of them takes PB radiant damage.

action.name: 3rd Level: Silent Pounce (5 Ferocity)
entries: The lightbender teleports 30 feet to an unoccupied space they can see. Before or after teleporting, the lightbender can make a signature attack. If the attack hits, the target is knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: 5th Level: Hypnotic Mane (8 Ferocity)
entries: Each creature within 10 feet of the lightbender must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by the lightbender until the end of the lightbender's next turn. While {@condition charmed} in this way, a creature is {@condition incapacitated} and has a speed of 0. If a creature {@condition charmed} in this way takes damage or if someone else uses an action to shake the creature out of their stupor, the condition ends on that creature.

reaction.name: Shared Afterimage (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: When the lightbender and their caregiver are within 30 feet of each other and one of them is hit by an attack, the lightbender reveals that both they and their caregiver are past visual imprints. The lightbender and the caregiver each appear in an unoccupied space they can see within 30 feet of their imprints, the attack misses, then the imprints disappear. The lightbender can't use this reaction if the attacker relies on senses other than sight, such as blindsight, or if they can perceive illusions as false, as with truesight.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The eel can breathe air and water. They can survive out of water for up to 8 hours.

trait.name: Slippery
entries: The eel has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to avoid or end the {@condition grappled} condition on themself.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Electric Pulse
entries: The eel channels energy toward a creature within 20 feet of them. The target must make a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw, made with disadvantage if the target is touching the eel. On a failed save, a creature takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) lightning damage and is {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} until the end of their next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition dazed|FleeMortals}.

action.name: Necrotic Drain
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) necrotic damage, or 13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) necrotic damage if the target can't see the lightthief.

action.name: Into the Light {@recharge}
entries: The lightthief teleports inside a light source they can see within 15 feet of them that is emitting bright or dim light. While inside the light source, the lightthief has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the light source. If the light source is extinguished by any means other than the lightthief's Steal Light action, the lightthief is forced out, appears in an unoccupied space of their choice within 5 feet of the light source, and is {@condition paralyzed} until the end of their next turn.

action.name: Steal Light (Inside Light Source Only)
entries: The lightthief can cause the light they are inside to erupt in a burst of brilliant radiance. Each creature within 15 feet of the light source must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) radiant damage and loses any darkvision they have for 1 minute. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and doesn't lose their darkvision. After this, the light source extinguishes and the lightthief appears in an unoccupied space of their choice within 5 feet of the light source.

trait.name: Exceptional Smell
entries: The bear has a +10 bonus to Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell, and they can smell creatures even through dirt, snow, and water.

trait.name: Natural Camouflage
entries: The bear has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made in their native terrain.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage, or maximum damage if the target is a Plant.

action.name: Swat
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing or bludgeoning damage (bear's choice), and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Agile Landing
entries: The wildcat takes no damage from falling 40 feet or less, provided they aren't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Hunter's Pounce
entries: If the wildcat hits a Small or smaller target and had advantage on the attack roll, the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}). While grappling the target in this way, the wildcat can't attack another creature.

trait.name: Natural Camouflage
entries: The wildcat has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made in their native terrain.

trait.name: Sprint (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When the wildcat moves on their turn in combat, they can triple their speed until the end of their turn.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage, plus an extra 2 ({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage if the target is {@condition grappled} or {@condition restrained}.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) slashing damage, plus an extra 2 ({@damage 1d4}) slashing damage if the wildcat had advantage on the attack roll.

bonus.name: Sneak
entries: The wildcat takes the Hide action.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The bloodeye can breathe air and water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bloodeye makes one Bite or one Bola attack and uses Bloodeye Bolt or Mesmeric Lure, if available.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Bola
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition restrained} by the bola. A creature can use their action to make a {@dc 10} Strength check, freeing themself or another creature within their reach from the bola on a success. Dealing 5 slashing damage to the bola (AC 10) destroys it and frees a creature {@condition restrained} by it without harming them.

action.name: Bloodeye Bolt (3/Day)
entries: The bloodeye shoots blood from their eyes at one creature they can see within 30 feet of them. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

action.name: Mesmeric Lure (3/Day)
entries: The bloodeye hypnotically stares at one creature they can see within 30 feet of them. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or all creatures other than the bloodeye are {@condition invisible} to them until the end of the bloodeye's next turn.

reaction.name: Reptilian Escape (1/Day)
entries: If the bloodeye fails a Strength or Dexterity saving throw, they lose their tail and succeed instead. They regrow their tail when they finish a long rest.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The grunt can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the grunt takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the grunt takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

action.name: Bite (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} by each grunt who joined the attack (escape {@dc 10} plus the number of grunts grappling; on a success, the target escapes every grunt grappling them). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the grunts who joined the attack can't bite another target.

action.name: Javelin (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage.

hp.special: Eight times their level (number of d10 Hit Dice equal to their level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Greatsword)
entries: {@atk m} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 2d6 plus PB} slashing damage. Beginning at 7th level, the hunter can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Wrenching Bite (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the hunter makes a signature attack against a Large or smaller creature. On a hit, the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 10 plus PB}). Until the grapple ends, the target takes PB piercing damage at the end of each of their turns, and the hunter can't use their Wrenching Bite against another target.

action.name: 5th Level: Thrashing Tail (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the hunter makes a signature attack against a Large or smaller creature. On a hit, the target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw or fall {@condition prone}. While the hunter is within 5 feet of this {@condition prone} target, the target can't stand up unless they use an action to make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check. On a success, the target can stand up.

action.name: 7th Level: Hypnotic Sleep (1/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the hunter drones lullingly. Each creature within 5 feet of the hunter who can hear them must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw or fall {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute. An {@condition unconscious} target wakes up if they take damage, the hunter becomes {@condition incapacitated}, the hunter moves more than 5 feet away from the target, or another creature uses an action to rouse the target.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The scaletooth can breathe air and water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The scaletooth makes one Bite attack and one Tail attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, the scaletooth can move them 5 feet in any direction or grapple them (escape {@dc 12}). Until this grapple ends, the scaletooth can't make a Tail attack against another target.

action.name: Rending Bite
entries: The scaletooth makes a Bite attack with advantage against one creature they have {@condition grappled}, dealing an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage on a hit.

reaction.name: Reptilian Escape (1/Day)
entries: If the scaletooth fails a Strength or Dexterity saving throw, they lose their tail and succeed instead. They regrow their tail when they finish a long rest.

trait.name: Aerial Agility
entries: While the terrorsaur is flying, their AC is 16.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The terrorsaur can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Running Start
entries: The terrorsaur can use only their flying speed if they first either fall 10 feet without hitting the ground or walk 10 feet in a straight line on that turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The terrorsaur makes one Bite attack and one Glaive attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Glaive
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Blowgun {@recharge}
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 30/120 ft., one creature. {@h}1 piercing damage plus 17 ({@damage 5d6}) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

reaction.name: Reptilian Escape (1/Day)
entries: If the terrorsaur fails a Strength or Dexterity saving throw, they lose their tail and succeed instead. They regrow their tail when they finish a long rest.

reaction.name: Skulking Retreat
entries: If the terrorsaur takes damage from a melee attack, they can move up to half their speed.

trait.name: Deadly Sharpshooter
entries: Attacking at long range with a ranged weapon doesn't impose disadvantage on Llyvessa's attack rolls.

trait.name: Elf Glamour (1/Day)
entries: When a creature targets Llyvessa with an attack, power, or spell, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by her until the end of her next turn (no action required).

trait.name: Mind Link
entries: Llyvessa can communicate telepathically with any Amethyst Knife boss regardless of distance, provided they are on the same plane of existence.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Llyvessa makes two Scimitar or Longbow attacks. Alternatively, she makes one Longbow attack and uses Psychic Shot, if available.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Psychic Shot {@recharge 5}
entries: Llyvessa makes a Longbow attack that ignores cover, and which can pass through mundane solid objects up to 5 feet thick that aren't being worn or carried.

bonus.name: Jaunt (1/Day; 3rd-Order Power)
entries: Llyvessa or one willing creature within 5 feet of her teleports to an unoccupied space Llyvessa can see within 30 feet of her.

reaction.name: *Control Projectiles (3/Day; 2nd-Order Power)
entries: When a creature Llyvessa can see within 60 feet of her makes a ranged weapon attack, she gives the creature advantage or disadvantage on the attack roll (her choice).

reaction.name: Shared Condition
entries: When Llyvessa is {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition dazed|FleeMortals}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition paralyzed}, or {@condition stunned}, she chooses a willing Amethyst Knife boss within 60 feet of her who doesn't already have the condition or is immune to it. The chosen creature then gains the condition for the duration, and Llyvessa loses the condition. She can use this reaction even while {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Lightning Absorption
entries: Whenever Logger is subjected to lightning damage, they take no damage and instead regain a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Logger makes two Slam attacks. If they are in a fury (see Nature's Fury), they instead make three Slam attacks.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Entangling Vines
entries: Vines lash out from Logger's body.

Each enemy within 30 feet of them must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or take 9 ({@damage 1d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and be {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}) and pulled up to 30 feet directly toward Logger.

bonus.name: Nature's Fury (1/Day)
entries: Logger enters a fury for 1 minute.

While in a fury, Logger has advantage on Strength checks and saving throws, and they can make an extra Slam attack when they use Multiattack. If Logger ends their turn without damaging another creature on that turn, the fury ends early.

trait.name: Exploit Opening (3/Day)
entries: When Erasmus makes an attack, he has advantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Master Tactician
entries: At the start of a combat encounter, Erasmus chooses when he acts in the initiative order after all other creatures have rolled initiative.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Erasmus makes two Greatsword attacks. He can replace one attack with a use of I'm Right Here.

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, they have disadvantage on attack rolls against creatures other than Erasmus until the end of their next turn.

action.name: I'm Right Here
entries: Erasmus taunts a creature he can see within 5 feet of him who can hear him. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or use their reaction, if available, to attack Erasmus. If the creature attacks, an ally within 30 feet of Erasmus who isn't {@condition incapacitated} can make a weapon attack against the creature (no action required).

action.name: Iron Ring (2/Day)
entries: If not in the Cyst, Erasmus teleports to the Cyst. If in the Cyst, he teleports to a place he has visited.

bonus.name: Mark
entries: Erasmus chooses a creature he can see within 60 feet of him and marks them until the start of his next turn. The first time one of Erasmus's allies deals damage to a marked creature on each turn, the creature takes an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage.

bonus.name: Reposition
entries: Erasmus and each ally within 60 feet of him who can hear him moves up to 5 feet without provoking opportunity attacks.

monster.name: Lord Syuul

trait.name: Draw In
entries: If Lord Syuul fails a saving throw while grappling at least one enemy, he can choose to release all {@condition grappled} creatures and succeed on the saving throw instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Lord Syuul makes two Tentacle or two Psionic Repeater attacks then manifests a power or uses Memory Transfer.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}28 ({@damage 4d10 + 6}) psychic damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, they are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 19}).

action.name: Psionic Repeater
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 11} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}22 ({@damage 3d10 + 6}) force damage.

action.name: Brain Overload (1/Day; 6th-Order Power)
entries: Lord Syuul creates a sudden surge of energy in the mind of a creature he can see within 120 feet of him. The target must make a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw, taking 77 ({@damage 14d10}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the target has a brain and is reduced to 0 hit points, their brain explodes, and if they can't survive without their brain, they die.

action.name: Flay (6th-Order Power)
entries: Lord Syuul shoots a 15-foot cone of psionic energy from his eyes. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 19} Intelligence saving throw, taking 35 ({@damage 10d6}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Memory Transfer
entries: Lord Syuul psionically plunders the mind of each creature he is grappling. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 19} Intelligence saving throw or take 44 ({@damage 8d10}) psychic damage. If a target fails their saving throw and doesn't escape the grapple by the end of their next turn, they must choose one of these effects:

items: The target's proficiency bonus drops to 0, they can't form new thoughts or speak, and they have disadvantage on all ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws. Only the {@psionic cure ailment|TalPsi} power, a {@spell lesser restoration} spell, or a similar supernatural effect can end this effect. Additionally, until Lord Syuul finishes a long rest, he gains a cumulative +5 bonus to damage rolls.

The target is {@condition charmed} by Lord Syuul for 1 hour. While the target is {@condition charmed}, Lord Syuul can issue the target telepathic commands (no action required), which the target does their best to obey. Each time the target takes damage, they can make a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Guise (3rd-Order Power)
entries: Lord Syuul projects a psionic image over his body, transforming his appearance for 1 hour into that of a Medium creature he has seen. When he manifests this power, he can also change the appearance of any equipment he carries.

The changes wrought by this power fail to hold up to physical inspection. A creature can use an action to inspect Lord Syuul's appearance and make a {@dc 19} Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check, noticing the image is a projection on a success.

bonus.name: Grappling Jaunt
entries: Lord Syuul and each creature {@condition grappled} by him teleport up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

reaction.name: Brain Drain
entries: When a creature {@condition grappled} by Lord Syuul makes a saving throw against Memory Transfer, Lord Syuul momentarily weakens the creature and the creature has disadvantage on the saving throw.

legendaryHeader: Lord Syuul has three villain actions. He can take each action once during an encounter after an enemy's turn. He can take these actions in any order but can use only one per round.

legendary.name: Action 1: Mindblind
entries: Each enemy Lord Syuul can see within 60 feet of him must make a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature can't see creatures other than Lord Syuul for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

legendary.name: Action 2: Was I Ever Here?
entries: Lord Syuul becomes {@condition invisible}, teleports 60 feet to an unoccupied space he can see, and can take the Hide action. At the same time, an illusory psionic image of Lord Syuul appears in the space he left, gesturing, speaking, and behaving as he chooses (no action required). A creature who touches the image for the first time on a turn or makes a melee attack against it must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or take 21 ({@damage 6d6}) psychic damage because things can pass through it. Lord Syuul's invisibility ends and his image disappears at the end of his next turn.

legendary.name: Action 3: Mindshatter
entries: Each enemy Lord Syuul can see within 60 feet of him must make a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 55 ({@damage 10d10}) psychic damage and is {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition dazed|FleeMortals}.

monster.name: Manticore
languages: understands any one language but speaks only through the use of their Mimicry trait

trait.name: Agile Predator
entries: When the manticore hits a creature with an attack on the manticore's turn, the manticore doesn't provoke opportunity attacks from that creature for the rest of that turn.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The manticore can mimic any words or phrases they have heard in a language they understand. A creature who hears the speech can tell it is an imitation with a successful {@dc 10} Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The manticore makes one Bite and one Claw attack, or two Tail Spike attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature who is {@condition frightened} of the manticore, they take an extra 4 ({@damage 1d8}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage, and the manticore can move the target up to 5 feet horizontally.

action.name: Tail Spike
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 60/120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the end of their next turn.

bonus.name: Trumpeting Howl (1/Day)
entries: Each enemy within 120 feet who can hear the manticore must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the manticore for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). If the initial saving throw fails by 5 or more, a creature is also {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} while {@condition frightened} in this way.

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Learning to Fly
entries: The manticore has a flying speed of 10 × PB feet.

trait.name: Mimicry
