entries: The manticore can mimic any words or phrases they have heard in a language the manticore's caregiver understands. A creature who hears the speech can tell it is an imitation with a successful {@dc 10 plus PB} Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check.

action.name: Signature Attack (Bite)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 plus PB} piercing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Tail Spike (2 Ferocity)
entries: The manticore hurls a spine from its tail. This attack uses the statistics for their signature attack, except the spine is a ranged weapon with a normal range of 30 feet and a long range of 60 feet, and on a hit, the attack deals an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} of poison damage.

action.name: 3rd Level: Trumpeting Howl (5 Ferocity)
entries: Each enemy within 30 feet of the manticore who can hear them must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of them until the end of the manticore's next turn.

action.name: 5th Level: Poisoned Sting (8 Ferocity)
entries: The manticore stings a target within 10 feet of them with their tail. The target must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage PBd10} poison damage and becomes {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} until the end of their next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition dazed|FleeMortals}.

resist.note: from mundane attacks that aren't adamantine

trait.name: Agility Rune
entries: Being within 5 feet of an enemy doesn't impose disadvantage on the giant's ranged attack rolls.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While motionless, the giant is indistinguishable from a statue.

trait.name: Stone Flesh
entries: When a creature attacks the giant with a melee weapon that isn't adamantine and rolls a 1 on the {@dice d20} for that attack, that weapon is destroyed if it is mundane. If that weapon is supernatural, it loses all supernatural properties for 1 hour.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The giant makes two Greatsling attacks.

action.name: Greatsling
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 60/240 feet, one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 4d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a creature, they must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be pushed 10 feet away from the giant.

action.name: Boulder Roll {@recharge 5}
entries: The giant bowls a boulder in a 10-foot-wide, 30-foot-long line along the ground. Each creature in this line must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 27 ({@damage 5d10}) bludgeoning damage and falls {@condition prone}. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and doesn't fall {@condition prone}. Each object in this line that isn't supernatural or worn or carried by a creature takes 27 ({@damage 5d10}) bludgeoning damage. At the end of its roll, the boulder crumbles, creating a 10-foot square of difficult terrain.

bonus.name: Siege Stance
entries: The giant digs their heels into the ground, reducing their speed to 0. While in this stance, the normal and long ranges of the giant's Greatsling attack are doubled, and when this attack hits, each other creature within 5 feet of the target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) bludgeoning damage. The giant's stance lasts until they become {@condition grappled}, {@condition incapacitated}, {@condition prone}, or {@condition restrained}, or until the giant ends it as a bonus action.

trait.name: Multiple Heads
entries: The marsh hydra has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition dazed|FleeMortals}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.

trait.name: Roll Over
entries: If the marsh hydra moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits them with an Entangling Serpents attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The marsh hydra makes two Entangling Serpents attacks. They can replace one attack with a Many Bites attack.

action.name: Entangling Serpents
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 16}).

action.name: Many Bites
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) poison damage and is {@condition poisoned} until the end of the marsh hydra's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition poisoned}.

bonus.name: Serpent Surprise
entries: The marsh hydra activates one of the following effects; if the effect targets another creature, the marsh hydra targets one creature they can see within 30 feet of them:

items.name: 1. Poison Spit
entries: The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw or take 9 ({@damage 2d8}) poison damage and be {@condition blinded} until the end of the marsh hydra's next turn.

items.name: 2. Entrancing Gaze
entries: The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by the marsh hydra for 1 minute or until the marsh hydra harms the target (save ends at end of turn).

items.name: 3. Terrifying Rattle
entries: The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} by the marsh hydra for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

items.name: 4. Reinforcements
entries: The marsh hydra shuffles which heads are on the outside of their body and regains 10 ({@dice 3d6}) hit points.

trait.name: Scent Reliance
entries: The marvorok can't use their blindsight if they can't breathe or smell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The marvorok makes three Claw attacks and one Eviscerate attack.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) slashing damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, they are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}. The marvorok can grapple up to two creatures at a time.

action.name: Eviscerate
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature {@condition grappled} by the marvorok. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) piercing damage plus 17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) slashing damage.

bonus.name: Taste the Air
entries: The marvorok makes a Wisdom (Percep- tion) check.

bonus.name: Underground Stalker
entries: The marvorok teleports, along with any creatures they are grappling, up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space they can see. If the marvorok teleports into an area of dim light or darkness, they can take the Hide action as part of this bonus action, and any creatures they are grappling can't speak or make noise until the end of the marvorok's next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The medusa uses Stone Gaze and makes two attacks using Snake Bite, Heavy Crossbow, or both.

action.name: Snake Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the end of the medusa's next turn.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Stone Gaze
entries: The medusa fires energy beams from their eyes at up to three creatures they can see within 60 feet of them. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or begin turning to stone (save ends at end of turn). While turning to stone, a creature's speed is reduced by 10 feet and they have disadvantage on Dexterity checks and saving throws.

If a creature who is turning to stone is targeted by this action again and fails their save, their speed is reduced by another 10 feet and they are {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} until the effect ends.

If a creature who is turning to stone and {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} in this way is targeted by this action again and fails their save, they are {@condition petrified} and can no longer make saving throws to end the effects of Stone Gaze. The petrification lasts until the creature is restored by a {@psionic cure ailment|TalPsi} power of 4th order or higher, a {@spell greater restoration} spell, or a similar supernatural effect.

bonus.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The medusa takes the Disengage or Hide action.

hp.special: Seven times their level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Snake Bite)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d10 plus PB} piercing damage. Beginning at 7th level, the headstrong can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Snake Spit (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the headstrong spits venom at the eyes of a creature within 5 feet of them. The target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the end of their next turn.

action.name: 5th Level: Venomous Bite (3/Day)
entries: When the headstrong hits a creature with a signature attack, the headstrong injects the target with venom. The target must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage PBd6} poison damage and is {@condition poisoned} until the start of the headstrong's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition poisoned}.

action.name: 7th Level: Stone Gaze (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the headstrong fires energy beams from their eyes at a creature they can see within 30 feet of them. The target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw or begin to turn to stone and be {@condition restrained}.

A target {@condition restrained} in this way must repeat the saving throw at the end of their next turn. On a successful save, the effect ends. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition petrified} for 1 hour or until they are restored by a {@psionic cure ailment|TalPsi} power of 4th order or higher, a {@spell greater restoration} spell, or a similar supernatural effect.

trait.name: False Appearance (Object Form Only)
entries: While the mimic remains motionless, they are indistinguishable from an ordinary object.

trait.name: Mimicry
entries: The mimic can imitate any sounds they have heard, including voices. A creature who hears the sounds can tell they are imitations with a successful {@dc 12} Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check.

action.name: Pseudopod
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, they are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}).

action.name: Gnashing Maw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) acid damage. If the target is {@condition grappled} by the mimic, they take an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) acid damage.

action.name: Shapechanger
entries: The mimic polymorphs into a Small, Medium, or Large object or back into their true amorphous form. Other than size, the mimic's statistics are the same in each form. Anything they are wearing or carrying isn't transformed. They revert to their true form if they die.

action.name: Envelop
entries: While grappling a creature, the mimic uses their Shapechanger action to polymorph into an object that is the same size or bigger than the {@condition grappled} creature (if the mimic isn't already in such a form). The creature is then enveloped by the mimic. An enveloped creature is no longer {@condition grappled}, but they can't breathe, are {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, have total cover against attacks and other effects outside the mimic, and take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the mimic's turns. When the mimic moves, the enveloped creature moves with them. The mimic can envelop one creature at a time.

An enveloped creature can use their action to try to escape by making a {@dc 13} Strength check. On a successful check, the creature is no longer enveloped and is shunted to an unoccupied space of their choice within 5 feet of the mimic. The creature automatically escapes if the mimic uses Shapechanger or Panic Shift, becomes {@condition incapacitated}, or dies.

reaction.name: Panic Shift (1/Day)
entries: When the mimic takes damage, they release any {@condition grappled} or enveloped creatures and then polymorph into a Small dense object with spikes, such as an iron ball or helm. While in this form, the mimic's walking and climbing speeds are doubled, they have resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from mundane attacks, they can only take the Dash, Disengage, or Shapechanger action, and a creature who touches the mimic or hits them with a melee attack while within 5 feet of them takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) piercing damage. This effect ends when the mimic dies or uses their Shapechanger action to polymorph into another form.

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The mimic can use their action to polymorph into a Small, Medium, or Large object or back into their true amorphous form. Other than size, the mimic's statistics are the same in each form. Anything they are wearing or carrying isn't transformed. They revert to their true form if they die.

trait.name: False Appearance (Object Form Only)
entries: While the mimic remains motionless, they are indistinguishable from an ordinary object.

action.name: Signature Attack (Bite)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 plus PB} piercing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Distracting Attack (2 Ferocity)
entries: The mimic makes a signature attack. On a hit, the attack deals its normal effects, and the next attack made against the target before the start of the mimic's next turn has advantage.

action.name: 3rd Level: Adhesive Pseudopods (5 Ferocity)
entries: The mimic attempts to adhere to each creature of their choice within 5 feet of them. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 10 plus PB}).

action.name: 5th Level: I'm You (8 Ferocity)
entries: The mimic uses their Shapechanger trait to polymorph into one Large or smaller creature they can see within 5 feet of them. Other than size, the mimic's statistics do not change, and the mimic reverts to their previous form at the start of their next turn.

After transforming, the mimic can make a signature attack against the target whose form they have taken. Hit or miss, the target must then make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, attacks against the target have advantage and the target has disadvantage on attack rolls and saving throws until the start of the mimic's next turn.

bonus.name: Wearable Companion
entries: While the mimic is within 5 feet of their caregiver, the mimic can pull themself into the caregiver's space, cover the caregiver's body, and take on the appearance of clothing. While the caregiver is wearing the mimic, the mimic's space is not difficult terrain for the caregiver, the caregiver has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks, and the caregiver can change the appearance of their mimic clothing at will (no action required) as long as the caregiver and mimic aren't {@condition incapacitated}.

Any attack that hits the caregiver also hits the mimic they are wearing, and vice versa, with both taking the full damage and effect of the attack. While worn in this way, the mimic can't move, and they can't take actions other than using a bonus action to revert to their previous form. A mimic automatically reverts to their previous form if they enter a rampage. Upon reverting to their previous form, the mimic is no longer worn by their caregiver, and the mimic enters the nearest unoccupied space of their choice.

trait.name: In Your Space
entries: The mimiature can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the mimiature can move through any opening at least 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the mimiature takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the mimiature takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

action.name: Sticky Swarm (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 bludgeoning damage. Until the end of the target's next turn, they have disadvantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple, and they have advantage on ability checks made to initiate or maintain a grapple. Additionally, if three or more mimiatures joined the attack, the target's appendages become so sticky that until the end of the target's next turn, they can't cast spells with somatic components, they can't drop objects, and they can't interact with objects other the ones they are already holding.

action.name: Group Shapechanger
entries: The mimiature polymorphs into a Tiny object or back into their true amorphous form. If four mimiatures within 5 feet of each other use this action together, they can join together to become one Small object. Anything a mimiature is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. A mimiature in object form reverts to their true form if any mimiature in the group moves, takes an action, or dies.

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The mindkiller can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Psionic Immunity
entries: The mindkiller is unaffected by psionic powers manifested by voiceless talkers unless the mindkiller wishes to be.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, they are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}).

action.name: Concealing Strike
entries: {@atk rp} {@hit 5} to hit, range 30 ft., one creature. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) psychic damage, and the mindkiller is {@condition invisible} to the target until the end of the mindkiller's next turn.

action.name: Mindwipe
entries: A Humanoid {@condition grappled} by the mindkiller must succeed on a {@dc 12} Strength saving throw or the mindkiller enters the Humanoid's body. While inside a Humanoid, the mindkiller has total cover against attacks and other effects originating outside the Humanoid, and the only action the mindkiller can take is to leave the body, exiting in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the body.

When a Humanoid ends their turn with the mindkiller inside of them, they must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or take 10 necrotic damage. If the Humanoid is reduced to 0 hit points, they die and the mindkiller takes over the body, which regains hit points equal to the Humanoid's hit point maximum. The mindkiller retains their Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, their understanding of Deep Speech and Undercommon, and their telepathy. They otherwise adopt the target's statistics and can take the actions the creature could take. They know everything the creature knew, including spells, class features, traits, and languages. If the body is reduced to 0 hit points after the mindkiller takes control, the mindkiller must leave it.

A creature wielding a sharp tool or weapon within reach of a Humanoid host or body with a mindkiller inside can use an action to attempt to remove the mindkiller, making an attack roll against the Humanoid's AC if the host is unwilling. On a hit, the creature deals 11 ({@damage 2d10}) slashing damage to the host and must make a {@dc 15} Wisdom ({@skill Medicine}) check. On a successful check, the creature cuts the mindkiller out of the host. On a faiIed check, if this slashing damage reduced the host to 0 hit points, the mindkiller kills the host; otherwise, there is no effect.

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: The whelp can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the whelp takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the whelp takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

trait.name: Psionic Immunity
entries: The whelp is unaffected by psionic powers manifested by voiceless talkers unless the whelp wishes to be.

trait.name: Resistance Drain
entries: When an enemy within 5 feet of three or more whelps makes a saving throw against a power or psionic effect, the enemy takes a penalty to the save equal to the number of whelps within 5 feet of them.

action.name: Claws (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 slashing damage.

trait.name: Dizzying Gore
entries: If the minotaur moves at least 20 feet straight toward a Large or smaller creature and then hits the creature with a Goring Horns attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} until the start of the minotaur's next turn.

trait.name: Minotaur Senses
entries: The minotaur always knows which way is north and can't become lost.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The minotaur makes one Maul attack and one Goring Horns attack.

action.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Large or smaller, the minotaur can push the target 5 feet away.

action.name: Goring Horns
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Retaliatory Gore
entries: When a creature the minotaur can see within 40 feet of them deals damage to the minotaur, the minotaur can move up to their speed. If the minotaur ends this movement within 5 feet of that creature, the minotaur can make a Goring Horns attack against them.

hp.special: Eight times their level (number of d10 Hit Dice equal to their level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Goring Horns)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d10 plus PB} piercing damage. Beginning at 7th level, the devastator can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Furious Charge (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the devastator moves up to their speed. At the end of this movement, they can make a signature attack. If that attack hits a Large or smaller creature, the target is pushed up to 10 feet away from the devastator, and the devastator and their allies have advantage on attack rolls against the target until the end of the devastator's next turn.

action.name: 5th Level: Fearsome Gore (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the devastator makes a signature attack against a creature within 5 feet of them. On a hit, the attack deals an extra {@damage PBd10} piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the devastator until the end of the devastator's next turn.

action.name: 7th Level: Retaliatory Charge (1/Day)
entries: When a creature the devastator can see within 40 feet of them deals damage to the devastator, the devastator can use a reaction to move up to their speed toward the creature. If the devastator ends this movement within 5 feet of the creature, they can make two signature attacks against the creature with a +PB bonus to those attack and damage rolls.

trait.name: Goring Run
entries: If the lackey moves at least 20 feet straight toward an enemy and then ends their movement within 5 feet of the enemy, the enemy takes 1 piercing damage.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the lackey takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the lackey takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

action.name: Goring Horns (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 piercing damage. If this attack was made by more than one lackey, the target must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be moved 5 feet horizontally for each minion who joined the attack. The DC for this saving throw equals 10 plus the number of lackeys who joined the attack.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) slashing damage.

action.name: Earth Bump
entries: As the mohler burrows under a Large or smaller creature on the ground within 5 feet of them, the mohler shifts the ground. The creature above them must succeed on a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Ground Grinder
entries: The mohler burrows up to their burrowing speed. Ground within 5 feet of where the mohler burrows becomes difficult terrain.

reaction.name: Zip
entries: If the mohler fails a Dexterity saving throw while burrowing, they succeed instead.

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Claw)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 plus PB} slashing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Earth Bump (2 Ferocity)
entries: The mohler burrows up to their speed and chooses one Large or smaller creature they come within 5 feet of during the move. The target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: 3rd Level: Sinkhole (5 Ferocity)
entries: The mohler burrows up to their speed and targets a creature they can sense on the surface within 10 feet of them. The target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength saving throw or be {@condition restrained} by the ground until the start of the mohler's next turn.

action.name: 5th Level: Terranova (8 Ferocity)
entries: Each creature on the ground within 10 feet of the mohler must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength saving throw or take {@damage 1d6 plus PB} bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. A creature who fails this saving throw by 5 or more is {@condition restrained} by the ground (save ends at end of turn). A creature can use their action to free themself or another creature within their reach, ending the effect.

reaction.name: Quick Pit (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: If the mohler's caregiver fails a Dexterity saving throw while they are within 10 feet of the mohler and the mohler isn't {@condition incapacitated} or {@condition restrained}, the mohler pulls the caregiver out of danger. The caregiver succeeds on the saving throw instead.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The bodyguard is immune to any power, spell, or effect that would alter their form.

trait.name: Supernatural Resistance
entries: The bodyguard has advantage on saving throws against powers, spells, and other supernatural effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bodyguard makes three attacks using Axe Arm, Repeating Crossbow, or both.

action.name: Axe Arm
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d12 + 5}) slashing damage. If the target is wielding at least one weapon, they must make a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target drops one weapon they wield of the bodyguard's choice, and the bodyguard kicks it up to 15 feet away.

action.name: Repeating Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d10}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Magnetic Pull
entries: Each enemy wearing metal armor or made of metal within 30 feet of the bodyguard must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 15 feet toward the bodyguard.

reaction.name: Valiar Cloak
entries: When an attack hits a Medium or smaller ally the bodyguard can see within 5 feet of them, the bodyguard forces the attacker to reroll the attack against the bodyguard instead.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The chief is immune to any power, spell, or effect that would alter their form.

trait.name: Supernatural Resistance
entries: The chief has advantage on saving throws against powers, spells, and other supernatural effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The chief makes three attacks using Pneumatic Fist, Targeting Beam, or both.

action.name: Pneumatic Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, the chief can push them up to 10 feet away.

action.name: Targeting Beam
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 10} to hit, range 150 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 4d12}) force damage, and the target is marked by a beam of red light until the end of the chief's next turn. While the target is marked, attack rolls against them have advantage.

bonus.name: Chief's Command
entries: The chief shouts a command to an ally within 60 feet of them who can hear them. The ally can either move up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks or make a melee attack (no action required).

monster.name: Mummy
languages: the languages they knew in life

trait.name: Flammable
entries: Whenever the mummy takes fire damage, they take an extra 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage.

trait.name: Mummy Dust
entries: Whenever the mummy takes piercing or slashing damage, each creature within 5 feet of them takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) poison damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mummy makes two Desiccating Slam attacks and uses Guardian Curse.

action.name: Desiccating Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage. Until the start of the mummy's next turn, the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet and the target can't regain hit points.

action.name: Guardian Curse
entries: The mummy calls down a scourge on one creature they can see within 60 feet of them. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be cursed. While cursed in this way, whenever the target takes damage, they take an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) necrotic damage that can't be reduced in any way. The curse lasts until removed by a {@psionic cure ailment|TalPsi} power, a {@spell remove curse} spell, or a similar supernatural effect. A target who succeeds on their saving throw is immune to the Guardian Curse of all mummies for the next 24 hours.

monster.name: Mummy Rotwrap
languages: the languages they knew in life

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the rotwrap takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the rotwrap takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

action.name: Words of Ancient Doom (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft., one creature. {@h}4 necrotic damage, and if three or more rotwraps joined the attack, the target can't speak or use telepathy until the end of their next turn.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Utility)
headerEntries: In addition to any other spells in this stat block, Mycete can cast the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}):

3: {@spell locate animals or plants} {@sup {@cite Casting Times|FleeMortals|A}}

trait.name: Necrotic Absorption
entries: Whenever Mycete is subjected to necrotic damage, she takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the necrotic damage dealt.

action.name: Parasitic Spores
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage, and if the target is a creature, Mycete regains 3 ({@dice 1d6}) hit points.

action.name: Fungal Growth
entries: Mycete causes fungi to proliferate from a point she can see within 60 feet of her. Solid surfaces in a 10-foot square centered on that point become difficult terrain, and a creature who enters that area for the first time on a turn or starts their turn there must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

action.name: Animate Husks (1/Day)
entries: Mycete animates three rotting zombies, who appear in unoccupied spaces Mycete can see within 30 feet of her. The zombies act immediately after Mycete on the same initiative count and follow her verbal orders. If Mycete dies, the zombies are destroyed.

bonus.name: Spore Eruption
entries: Mycete destroys a rotting zombie under her control, and the zombie violently erupts with toxic spores.
Each enemy within 5 feet of the zombie must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw, taking 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Utility)
headerEntries: In addition to any other spells in this stat block, the hag can cast the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}):

trait.name: Supernatural Resistance
entries: The hag has advantage on saving throws against powers, spells, and other supernatural effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hag makes two Dream Claw attacks.

action.name: Dream Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d10 + 4}) slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) psychic damage. If a target is hit by this attack more than once on a turn, they must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target falls {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn), until the target takes damage, or until another creature who can reach the target uses their action to wake them. Creatures who can't be supernaturally put to sleep automatically succeed on this saving throw.

action.name: Vicious Visions (1/Day; 6th-Level Spell)
entries: The hag releases magic dream dust in a 60-foot cone. Each creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} for 1 minute or until they deal damage to another creature. While {@condition charmed}, the creature sees all allies as enemies and all enemies as allies.

action.name: Tiny Time
entries: The hag magically shrinks down to a height of 1 inch, becoming Tiny along with any items they wear or carry. While Tiny, the hag has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide, and they can use a bonus action to enter the head of an {@condition unconscious} Humanoid they can reach or to grow back to the hag's normal size. The hag's game statistics otherwise remain the same.

While the hag is inside a Humanoid's head, that Humanoid is considered haunted by the hag, and the hag has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the head. The hag can speak telepathically to the haunted Humanoid, but the Humanoid is unaware of the source of this telepathic speech. The haunted Humanoid can't gain any benefit from rest unless the hag allows it, and when the Humanoid attempts to sleep, the hag can fill the Humanoid's mind with nightmarish visions.

The hag is expelled from the head and grows back to their normal size if the haunted Humanoid is affected by a {@spell dispel evil and good} spell or similar supernatural effects, or if the hag chooses to exit the head as a bonus action.

bonus.name: Sleepwalk
entries: The hag moves one {@condition unconscious} creature they can see within 60 feet of them up to 30 feet horizontally.

reaction.name: Aren't You Tired?
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of the hag hits them with an attack, the hag spits sleep dust at the attacker. The attacker must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, until the end of the hag's next turn, the attacker feels tremendously sleepy, they can't take reactions, and they have disadvantage on attack rolls and saving throws. Creatures who can't be supernaturally put to sleep are immune to this effect.

trait.name: Defiant Anger
entries: When the ogre has half their hit points or fewer, they are resistant to mundane bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ogre makes one Spiked Club attack and one Fist attack.

action.name: Spiked Club
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, they are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}). Until this grapple ends, the ogre can't use this fist to attack other targets. The ogre has two fists, one of which holds their club.

action.name: People-Bowling
entries: The ogre throws one Medium or smaller creature they are grappling up to 30 feet horizontally. Each creature in the thrown creature's path must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or take 3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. After this throw, the thrown creature takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) bludgeoning damage and falls {@condition prone}.

bonus.name: Bellow (1/Day)
entries: The ogre yells in the face of one creature within 10 feet of them. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the ogre until the end of the ogre's next turn. A creature who succeeds on their saving throw is immune to all ogres' Bellow for 24 hours.

reaction.name: Violent Focus (1/Day)
entries: If the ogre takes damage while {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition frightened}, or {@condition poisoned}, they end these conditions on themself.

hp.special: Nine times their level (number of d12 Hit Dice equal to their level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Spiked Club)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 2d4 plus PB} piercing damage. Beginning at 7th level, the basher can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Angry Denial (3/Day)
entries: When the basher takes damage from a creature the basher can see within 5 feet of them, the basher can use their reaction to instead take no damage and make a signature attack against the creature.

action.name: 5th Level: Throw Away (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the basher grabs a willing Medium or smaller creature they can see within 5 feet of them and hurls the creature to an unoccupied space within 30 feet of the basher. If the creature lands within 5 feet of an enemy, the creature can use a reaction to make a melee attack against that enemy.

action.name: 7th Level: Wide Sweep (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the basher sweeps their spiked club in an enormous circle, making a signature attack against each enemy within 10 feet of them. This attack has a +PB bonus to its attack and damage rolls, and if it hits a Large or smaller creature, the basher can push the target up to 10 feet away from them.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the goon takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the goon takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

action.name: Fist (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 bludgeoning damage, and if this attack was made by more than one goon, the target must succeed on a Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone} and moved up to 10 feet horizontally. The DC for this saving throw equals 10 plus the number of goons who joined the attack.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The olothec can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The olothec is immune to any power, spell, or effect that would alter their form.

trait.name: Supernatural Resistance
entries: The olothec has advantage on saving throws against supernatural effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The olothec makes six Devolving Tentacle attacks and uses Piscine Transformation.

action.name: Devolving Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) piercing damage. The first time a creature is hit with this attack on a turn, they must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or be injected with a degenerative psionic slime (save ends at end of turn). While slimed, each time the creature makes an attack roll or an ability check, they must roll a {@dice d4} and subtract the number rolled from the {@dice d20} roll. At the end of a slimed creature's turn, the size of the subtracted die increases by one: the {@dice d4} becomes a {@dice d6}, the {@dice d6} becomes a {@dice d8}, and so on, to a maximum of {@dice d12}. The {@psionic cure ailment|TalPsi} power or {@spell lesser restoration} spell also ends this effect.

action.name: Piscine Transformation (3rd-Order Power)
entries: The olothec targets a Humanoid they can see within 60 feet of them with a pulse of transformational energy. The target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or undergo one of the following transformations of the olothec's choice:

items: {@b Head.} The target's head transforms into the head of a fish, proportionately sized for their body. They can't speak.
{@b Legs.} The target's legs become fins. Their walking speed is reduced to 10 feet (unless their walking speed is slower), and they gain a swimming speed of 30 feet.

{@b Torso.} The target's torso becomes the body of a fish with gills. They can only breathe water and can hold their breath for 1 hour. If the target isn't underwater when this transformation takes effect, they begin suffocating.

entries: This transformation lasts until the target is affected by a {@psionic cure ailment|TalPsi} power of 4th order or higher or a {@spell greater restoration} spell. A target who suffers all three transformations at once is permanently transformed into a hybrid fishlike creature and can only be returned to their original form by a {@spell wish} spell or similar magic.

bonus.name: Jaunt (3rd-Order Power)
entries: The olothec teleports 30 feet to an unoccupied space they can see.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Utility)
headerEntries: In addition to any other spells in this stat block, the oracle can cast the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 17}):

trait.name: Turbulent Escalation
entries: When the oracle starts their turn outdoors while not {@condition incapacitated}, they can stoke a thunderstorm (no action required). For 1 minute or until the oracle uses Turbulent Escalation again, the weather in a 1-mile radius centered on the oracle changes as follows:

items: If the sky is cloudless, it becomes cloudy.
If the sky is cloudy, it begins to rain or snow (oracle's choice).
If it's raining or snowing, the weather becomes stormy.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The oracle uses Tempest Bolt twice. They can replace one use with a Cyclone Staff attack.

action.name: Cyclone Staff
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 4d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage plus 22 ({@damage 4d10}) thunder damage, and the oracle moves the target up to 10 feet in any direction.

action.name: Tempest Bolt
entries: A bolt of lightning streaks from the oracle to strike one creature they can see within 90 feet of them, or within 300 feet of them if the target is outdoors and the weather is stormy. The target must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 31 ({@damage 7d8}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. If the target is outdoors and the weather is stormy, they have disadvantage on the saving throw.

bonus.name: Convocation of Storms (2/Day)
entries: The oracle imbues the power of storm in themself or another Elemental they can see within 30 feet of them, granting one of the following effects of that Elemental's choice:

items: {@b Lightning Within.} The Elemental becomes charged with lightning. The next time the Elemental hits a target with an attack within the next minute, the attack deals an extra 33 ({@damage 6d10}) lightning damage.

{@b Thunder Burst.} A concussive shock wave erupts from the Elemental toward four creatures they can see within 60 feet of them. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or take 22 ({@damage 4d10}) thunder damage, be pushed up to 10 feet away from the Elemental, and be {@condition deafened} until the end of the target's next turn.

hp.special: Eight times their level (number of d10 Hit Dice equal to their level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Warhammer)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d10 plus PB} bludgeoning damage. Beginning at 7th level, the blacksmith can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Relentless Rush (3/Day)
entries: When the blacksmith isn't {@condition incapacitated} and they take damage but aren't killed outright, they can make an attack against an enemy (no action required) before the hit point reduction is resolved. If the attack hits, the blacksmith regains twice their PB hit points.

action.name: 5th Level: Reinforce Armor (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the blacksmith touches a piece of armor and fortifies it. For the next 10 minutes, a creature wearing the armor gains a bonus to their AC equal to half the blacksmith's PB.

action.name: 7th Level: Fortify Weapon (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the blacksmith touches a weapon and polishes it. For 1 minute, the weapon is magical and deals an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} damage.

trait.name: Gnashing Horde
entries: If an enemy the blitzer can see starts their turn within 5 feet of three or more blitzers, the enemy takes 1 piercing damage for each blitzer within 5 feet of them.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the blitzer takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the blitzer takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

trait.name: Relentless Minion
entries: When the blitzer is reduced to 0 hit points while they aren't {@condition incapacitated}, they can deal 1 piercing damage to an enemy within 5 feet of them.

action.name: Spear (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage.

trait.name: Relentless (1/Turn)
entries: When the bloodrunner isn't {@condition incapacitated} and they are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, they can make an attack against an enemy (no action required) before the hit point reduction is resolved. If the attack hits and its damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the bloodrunner drops to 1 hit point instead of 0 hit points.

trait.name: Unimpeded
entries: The bloodrunner can occupy a {@condition prone} creature's space. The first time the bloodrunner enters a {@condition prone} creature's space on the bloodrunner's turn, the {@condition prone} creature takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage. When a {@condition prone} creature in the bloodrunner's space stands up, the creature enters the nearest unoccupied space of their choice.

action.name: Spiked Shield
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage. If the bloodrunner moves at least 10 feet before hitting a Large or smaller creature with this attack, the bloodrunner can choose to knock the target {@condition prone} or push them up to 10 feet away.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Juke
entries: When the bloodrunner makes a Dexterity saving throw, they can gain advantage on the save. To do so, the bloodrunner can't be {@condition prone}, {@condition grappled}, or {@condition restrained}.

resist.special: determined by the conduit's affinity trait

trait.name: Affinity
entries: The conduit has a lifelong affinity for one of the following damage types: cold, fire, or lightning. The chosen type determines the conduit's damage resistance and the damage of their Elemental Discharge and Power Burst actions.

trait.name: Relentless (1/Turn)
entries: When the conduit isn't {@condition incapacitated} and they are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, they can make an attack against an enemy (no action required) before the hit point reduction is resolved. If the attack hits and its damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the conduit drops to 1 hit point instead of 0 hit points.

action.name: Elemental Discharge (Cantrip)
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d12 + 3}) damage of the type determined by the conduit's Affinity trait.

action.name: Power Burst (2/Day; 1st-Level Spell)
entries: The conduit unleashes explosive energy in a 15-foot cone. The ground in that area becomes difficult terrain, and each creature in that area must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) damage of the type determined by the conduit's Affinity trait, and they are pushed 10 feet away from the conduit. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed.

bonus.name: Rush
entries: The conduit takes the Dash action.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the forcecaller takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the forcecaller takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

trait.name: Relentless Minion
entries: When the forcecaller is reduced to 0 hit points while they aren't {@condition incapacitated}, they can deal 1 force damage to an enemy within 5 feet of them.

action.name: Chainspoken (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/60 ft., one target. {@h}1 force damage. If two or more forcecallers joined the attack, they can deal the same amount of force damage to another creature within 10 feet of the target.

trait.name: Relentless (1/Turn)
entries: When the fury isn't {@condition incapacitated} and they are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, they can make an attack against an enemy (no action required) before the hit point reduction is resolved. If the attack hits and its damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the fury drops to 1 hit point instead of 0 hit points.

action.name: Haymaker Greataxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d12 + 3}) slashing damage, or 12 ({@damage 1d12 + 6}) slashing damage if the target is {@condition prone}. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, they must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Healing Rally (1/Day)
entries: The fury regains 5 hit points.

trait.name: Relentless (1/Turn)
entries: When the garroter isn't {@condition incapacitated} and they are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, they can make an attack against an enemy (no action required) before the hit point reduction is resolved. If the attack hits and its damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the garroter drops to 1 hit point instead of 0 hit points.

action.name: Strangle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}). Until the grapple ends, the target can't speak intelligibly or cast spells with verbal components. If the attack was made with advantage, the target must make a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target falls {@condition unconscious} for 1 minute (save ends at start of turn) or until they take damage. A creature can use an action to shake another creature awake who falls {@condition unconscious} in this way.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage. If the attack was made with advantage, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Cloak (1/Day)
entries: The garroter magically turns {@condition invisible} for 1 minute. Any equipment the garroter wears or carries is {@condition invisible} with them. While {@condition invisible}, the garroter's movements make no sound. If the garroter hits a creature with an attack, casts a spell, or takes damage, the effect ends.

trait.name: Relentless (1/Turn)
entries: When the godcaller isn't {@condition incapacitated} and they are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, they can make an attack against an enemy (no action required) before the hit point reduction is resolved. If the attack hits and its damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the godcaller drops to 1 hit point instead of 0 hit points.

action.name: Power Chord (1st-Level Spell)
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft., one creature who can hear the godcaller. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d6 + 4}) thunder damage.

action.name: Cadenza
entries: The godcaller chooses another creature within 30 feet of them. If the target can hear the godcaller, the target can use their reaction to move up to their speed and make an attack.

action.name: Song of the Gods (2nd-Level Spell)
entries: The godcaller and each ally within 30 feet of them who can hear them has advantage on attack rolls until the start of the godcaller's next turn. This effect ends early if the godcaller takes any damage.

bonus.name: Rallying Ostinato (1/Day)
entries: The godcaller and up to three allies within 60 feet of them who can hear them regain 20 hit points, and these creatures ignore difficult terrain for 1 minute.

trait.name: Relentless (1/Turn)
entries: When the rampart isn't {@condition incapacitated} and they are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, they can make an attack against an enemy (no action required) before the hit point reduction is resolved. If the attack hits and its damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the rampart drops to 1 hit point instead of 0 hit points.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The rampart makes two Spear attacks. If the rampart targets the same creature with both attacks, the target has disadvantage on attack rolls against creatures other than the rampart until the start of the rampart's next turn.

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage, or 8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

reaction.name: No!
entries: When an enemy within 5 feet of the rampart targets another creature with an attack, the attacker must target the rampart instead.

trait.name: Relentless (1/Turn)
entries: When the terranova isn't {@condition incapacitated} and they are reduced to 0 hit points but not killed outright, they can make an attack against an enemy (no action required) before the hit point reduction is resolved. If the attack hits and its damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the terranova drops to 1 hit point instead of 0 hit points.

trait.name: Tremorspeak
entries: The terranova can sense anything a willing creature within 30 feet of them can sense with tremorsense or Tremorspeak.

trait.name: Unhindered
entries: The terranova ignores difficult terrain.

action.name: Earth Pillar (1st-Level Spell)
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft., one target touching the ground. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Quake
entries: The terranova chooses up to five creatures on the ground within 15 feet of them and stomps the ground. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Sinkhole
entries: The terranova chooses up to two creatures on the ground within 30 feet of them. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be {@condition restrained}. A creature can use their action to free themself or another creature within their reach, ending the effect on that creature.

bonus.name: Rush
entries: The terranova takes the Dash action.

bonus.name: Unearth Mohlers (1/Day)
entries: The terranova stomps, and {@dice 1d3 + 1} {@creature mohler|FleeMortals}s pop out of the ground in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of them. The mohlers are friendly to the terranova and act immediately after the terranova's turn on the same initiative count.

trait.name: Adjustable Appendages
entries: The otyugh has seven adjustable appendages, which they can convert into other appendages using their Transform bonus action. In their natural state, the otyugh has one eyestalk, three legs, and three tentacles. These appendages grant the following benefits:

items: {@b Eyestalks.} The otyugh's first eyestalk gives them darkvision out to a range of 60 feet and immunity to the {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} condition, and each additional eyestalk increases their darkvision's range by 60 feet. If the otyugh has no eyestalks, they are {@condition blinded} and lose immunity to the {@condition flanked|FleeMortals} condition.
{@b Legs.} Each leg gives the otyugh a cumulative walking speed of 15 feet.
{@b Tentacles.} The otyugh's number of tentacles determine how many attacks they can make with Multiattack and how many creatures they can grapple with Tentacle Slam.

trait.name: Limited Telepathy
entries: The otyugh can magically transmit simple messages and images to any creature within 120 feet of them that can understand a language. This form of telepathy doesn't allow the receiving creature to telepathically respond.

trait.name: Rot Leech
entries: At the start of each of the otyugh's turns, each creature {@condition grappled} by the otyugh has their hit point maximum reduced by 5 ({@damage 1d10}) for 1 hour. The otyugh regains the same number of hit points. This effect can't reduce a creature's hit point maximum below their current hit points.

trait.name: Trash Traversal
entries: The otyugh ignores difficult terrain. They also have advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in piles of refuse.

trait.name: Vile Stench
entries: A creature who starts their turn within 10 feet of the otyugh must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of the creature's next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The otyugh makes one Tentacle Slam attack for each tentacle they currently have (see Adjustable Appendages).

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d8 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or be diseased with otyuck. A creature with otyuck can't take the Dash action and their speed is halved.

action.name: Tentacle Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, they are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}) and {@condition restrained} until the grapple ends. The otyugh can grapple one target for each tentacle they currently have.

bonus.name: Transform
entries: The otyugh converts one of their Adjustable Appendages into an eyestalk, leg, or tentacle.

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Trash Traversal
entries: The otyugh ignores difficult terrain. They have advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in piles of refuse.

action.name: Signature Attack (Bite)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 plus PB} piercing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Tentacle Slam (2 Ferocity)
entries: The otyugh makes a signature attack. On a hit, the target must also succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength saving throw or be {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 10 plus PB}). The otyugh can only grapple one target at a time.

action.name: 3rd Level: Brutal Charge (5 Ferocity)
entries: The otyugh moves up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks. During or after this move, they can make a signature attack against one target.

action.name: 5th Level: Retch (8 Ferocity)
entries: The otyugh regurgitates garbage in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes {@damage PBd6} poison damage and is {@condition poisoned}. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition poisoned}.

bonus.name: Slough Rot (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: The otyugh touches their caregiver and ends one disease or one of the following conditions affecting the caregiver: {@condition blinded}, {@condition dazed|FleeMortals}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition paralyzed}, or {@condition poisoned}.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the dregsbelcher takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the dregsbelcher takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

trait.name: Trash Traversal
entries: The dregsbelcher ignores difficult terrain. They also have advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in piles of refuse.

trait.name: Whetted Appetites
entries: While within 60 feet of the dregsbelcher, each friendly non-minion otyugh gains a +1 bonus to attack rolls. This bonus increases by 1 (to a maximum of +5) for each dregsbelcher in range of that creature.

action.name: Regurgitate (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/40 ft., one target. {@h}2 bludgeoning damage plus 2 acid damage.

trait.name: Detached Eyes
entries: Six eyes float around the overmind and create their Eye Psionics effects. Each eye is an object that has AC 24, 1 hit point, and a psionic shield that makes it immune to damage. After an eye creates a psionic effect, it loses its psionic shield until the start of the overmind's next turn. If an eye is destroyed, a new eye pops out of the overmind's face to replace it at the end of their next turn.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Eye Psionics
entries: The overmind creates three of the following psionic eye effects. Unless otherwise stated, each eye targets a creature who the overmind can see within 120 feet of them. They can't use the same effect twice in a turn.

items.name: 1. Charm Beam
entries: The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by the overmind for 1 hour, or until the overmind harms the creature or one of their allies.

items.name: 2. Compulsion Beam
entries: The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 16} Intelligence saving throw or use their reaction, if available, to move up to their speed toward the closest ally they can see and make a weapon attack against them. Creatures who can't be {@condition charmed} are unaffected.

items.name: 3. Toxic Vapors
entries: The overmind chooses a point they can see within 120 feet of them. Each creature within 10 feet of the point must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

items.name: 4. Telekinetic Beam
entries: The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be moved up to 30 feet in any direction and take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) force damage at the end of the move. Alternatively, the overmind can target an object they can see within 120 feet of them that weighs 300 pounds or less and isn't being worn or carried, moving it up to 30 feet in any direction. The overmind can also exert fine control on objects with this effect, such as manipulating a simple tool or opening a door or a container.

items.name: 5. Lightning Bolt
entries: The overmind shoots a 5-foot-wide, 60-foot-long line of lightning. Each creature in the line must succeed on a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

items.name: 6. Fire Beam
entries: The targeted creature must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 36 ({@damage 8d8}) fire damage and catches fire, taking 9 ({@damage 2d8}) fire damage at the start of each of their turns for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). Any creature can use their action to douse the fire, ending the effect early.

bonus.name: The Great Eye {@recharge}
entries: The overmind's central eye turns solid black and projects a 150-foot cone of energy. If the overmind or any creature in that area is affected by a spell, the spell's effects immediately end for that creature.

reaction.name: Away with You!
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of the overmind hits them with a melee attack, the overmind can use Telekinetic Beam on the attacker.

trait.name: Deadly Leap
entries: The owlbear's long jump is up to 30 feet and their high jump is 15 feet, with or without a running start. If the owlbear leaps at least 20 feet toward a target and then hits them with a Bite or Claw attack, the target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Keen Sight and Smell
entries: The owlbear has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight or smell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The owlbear makes one Bite and one Claw attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d12 + 5}) piercing damage, and the owlbear can move the target 5 feet in any direction.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Bear Hug {@recharge 4}
entries: The owlbear attempts to grab and crush a creature they can see within 5 feet of them. The target must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) bludgeoning damage and is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and is not {@condition grappled}. Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of their turns. The grapple ends if the owlbear uses Bear Hug on another target or makes a Claw attack against another target.

reaction.name: Hulking Rush
entries: When the owlbear takes damage, they can move up to half their speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Keen Sight and Smell
entries: The owlbear has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight or smell.

action.name: Signature Attack (Claw)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 plus PB} slashing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Violent Attack (2 Ferocity)
entries: The owlbear makes a signature attack. On a hit, the attack deals an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} damage, and the owlbear can move the target 5 feet in any direction.

action.name: 3rd Level: Owlie Oop (5 Ferocity)
entries: The owlbear leaps up to half their speed without provoking opportunity attacks. When they land, each creature within 5 feet of them must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: 5th Level: Bear Hug (8 Ferocity)
entries: The owlbear attempts to grab and crush a creature they can see within 5 feet of them. The target must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage PBd10} bludgeoning damage and is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 10 plus PB}). On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and is not {@condition grappled}. Until this grapple ends, the target is also {@condition restrained}. The grapple ends if the owlbear uses Bear Hug on another target or makes a signature attack against another target.

bonus.name: Give a Hoot (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: The owlbear lets loose a unique battle hoot. If the owlbear's caregiver can hear the owlbear, the caregiver gains 5 × PB temporary hit points.

trait.name: Horrid Stench
entries: If an enemy starts their turn within 10 feet of three or more pitlings, the enemy is {@condition poisoned} until the start of their next turn.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the pitling takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the pitling takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

trait.name: Soul Feast
entries: When the pitling reduces a creature who isn't a Construct or an Undead to 0 hit points or deals damage to a dying creature, the creature must make a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the pitling consumes the creature's soul, and the pitling becomes a Category 2 demon of the GM's choice with 1 soul. A creature whose soul is consumed in this way immediately dies, and they can't be restored to life by any means short of a {@spell wish} spell. If the creature was reduced to 0 hit points by a group attack, the GM picks one pitling who joined the attack to consume the soul.

action.name: Spit (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 15/30 ft., one target. {@h}4 poison damage.

trait.name: Elf Glamour (1/Day)
entries: When a creature targets Ellan with an attack, power, or spell, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by him until the end of his next turn (no action required).

trait.name: Resolute Aura
entries: While he is conscious, Ellan and any allies within 20 feet of him who can see him can't be {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Ellan makes two Bladed Scepter attacks.

action.name: Bladed Scepter
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d8 + 7}) bludgeoning damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

action.name: Command (2nd-Level Spell)
entries: Ellan speaks a one-word command to up to two creatures he can see within 60 feet of him.

Each target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or follow the command on their next turn. The spell has no effect if the target is Undead, doesn't understand Common or Elvish, or would be directly harmed by following the command. If the target can't follow Ellan's command, the spell ends. Some typical commands and their effects follow:

items.name: Approach
entries: The target moves toward Ellan by the shortest and most direct route, ending their turn if they move within 5 feet of Ellan.

items.name: Drop
entries: The target drops whatever they are holding and then ends their turn.

items.name: Flee
entries: The target spends their turn moving away from Ellan by the fastest available means.

items.name: Grovel
entries: The target falls {@condition prone} and then ends their turn.

items.name: Halt
entries: The target doesn't move and takes no actions.

action.name: Unholy Flame (3rd-Level Spell)
entries: Ellan conjures unholy fire around one creature he can see within 60 feet of him. The target must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 27 ({@damage 6d8}) fire damage and is enveloped (save ends at end of turn). While enveloped, a creature takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage at the start of each of their turns. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't enveloped.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The principle regains 20 hit points at the start of their turn if they aren't {@condition incapacitated}. If they take fire damage, they only regain 10 hit points at the start of their next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The principle makes two Hampering Roots attacks or two Vernal Lash attacks.

action.name: Hampering Roots
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 4d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). While {@condition grappled} in this way, the target is {@condition restrained}.

action.name: Vernal Lash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 60 ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 4d10 + 5}) slashing damage, and the principle moves the target up to 15 feet horizontally.

action.name: Burst from the Earth (1/Day)
entries: The principle causes three Large trees with whipping branches to sprout from the ground in unoccupied spaces the principle can see within 60 feet of them. Each tree has AC 15, 40 hit points, and immunity to psychic damage.

An enemy who starts their turn within 15 feet of one of these trees must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 ({@damage 4d6}) slashing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

bonus.name: Convocation of Verdure (2/Day)
entries: The principle imbues the power of verdancy in themself or another Elemental they can see within 30 feet of them, granting one of the following effects of that Elemental's choice:

items: {@b Roots of the Mind.} For 1 minute, the Elemental can link with each Large or larger plant object they can see within 90 feet of them (no action required). For the duration, the Elemental can perceive, make attacks, and use actions as if they were in the space of a linked plant.

{@b Thunder Burst.} Thorny vines burst from the Elemental. Each enemy the Elemental can see within 30 feet of them must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 27 ({@damage 6d8}) piercing damage and is {@condition restrained} until the end of their next turn. On a successful save, they take half as much damage and aren't {@condition restrained}.

trait.name: Evasion
entries: If Qar is subjected to an effect that allows him to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, he instead takes no damage if he succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if he fails.

trait.name: Exploit Opening (3/Day)
entries: When Qar makes an attack, he has advantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Supernatural Resistance
entries: Qar has advantage on saving throws against powers, spells, and other supernatural effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Qar makes three Unarmed Strike attacks. If he hits the same creature with all three attacks, the target is {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} until the end of their next turn.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Iron Ring (2/Day)
entries: If not in the Cyst, Qar teleports to the Cyst. If in the Cyst, he teleports to a place he has visited.

reaction.name: No Survivors
entries: When an enemy Qar can see within 40 feet of him drops to 0 hit points, Qar moves up to his speed. If he ends that movement within 5 feet of an enemy, he can make an Unarmed Strike against them.

reaction.name: Voice Stealer (3/Day)
entries: When an enemy Qar can hear within 30 feet of him finishes casting a spell with a verbal component, Qar attempts to steal their voice. The enemy must succeed on a {@dc 15} Intelligence saving throw or be unable to speak for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

monster.name: Qazyldrath

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: Qazyldrath can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Consume Shadow (3/Day)
entries: When Qazyldrath fails a saving throw, they can succeed instead. When they do, any areas of magical darkness in the lair are dispelled, and they can't use Enshroud or Thwart Healing until the end of their next turn.

trait.name: Shadow Strength
entries: Acid and necrotic damage dealt by Qazyldrath ignore damage resistance.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Qazyldrath makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 2d10 + 8}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage. If the target is a light source or is wearing or holding a light source, that light is extinguished.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d6 + 8}) slashing damage, and Qazyldrath can move the target up to 15 feet horizontally.

action.name: Vacuous Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: Qazyldrath exhales dark energy in a line that is 90 feet long and 20 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 22} Dexterity saving throw, taking 24 ({@damage 7d6}) acid damage plus 24 ({@damage 7d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

Additionally, that area is filled with magical darkness for 1 minute. A creature with darkvision can't see through this darkness, and no light except a {@spell daylight} spell or a light-creating spell of 5th level or higher can illuminate it.

bonus.name: Enshroud
entries: Shadows cling to one creature Qazyldrath can see within 120 feet of them. The target must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition blinded} and vulnerable to necrotic damage until the start of Qazyldrath's next turn.

reaction.name: Thwart Healing
entries: When a creature within 60 feet of Qazyldrath regains hit points, Qazyldrath forces them to make a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature regains half the number of hit points instead.

legendaryHeader: Qazyldrath has three villain actions. They can take each action once during an encounter after an enemy's turn. They can take these actions in any order but can use only one per round.

legendary.name: Action 1: Burning Globs
entries: Qazyldrath spits acid globules at each enemy they can see within 90 feet of them. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or have a globule attached to their body.
