A creature attached to a globule takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) acid damage at the start of their turns. A creature can use an action to remove a globule from themself or a creature they can reach.

legendary.name: Action 2: Shadow Form
entries: Qazyldrath becomes semiincorporeal, gaining resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage until the end of their next turn. Qazyldrath then teleports up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space that they can see.

legendary.name: Action 3: Sinking Gloom
entries: Qazyldrath summons sticky black acid centered on a point they can see on the ground within 120 feet of them, creating a 5-foot-deep, 20-foot-radius pool. The pool is difficult terrain and lasts for 1 minute. An enemy who starts their turn in the pool takes 24 ({@damage 7d6}) acid damage and must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength saving throw or be {@condition restrained} until the start of their next turn. An enemy who starts their turn flying within 30 feet of the pool must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or be pulled down by living acid, landing in the nearest unoccupied space of their choice within the pool, take 24 ({@damage 7d6}) acid damage, and be {@condition restrained} until the start of their next turn.

monster.name: Queen Bargnot

trait.name: Crafty
entries: Queen Bargnot doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when she moves out of an enemy's reach.

trait.name: Take My Pain (3/Day)
entries: When Queen Bargnot fails a saving throw against a spell or other supernatural effect, she can choose a willing creature within 30 feet of her. Queen Bargnot succeeds on the saving throw, the creature is targeted with the same spell or effect as if they were in her space, and they fail their saving throw automatically.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Queen Bargnot makes three Shortsword attacks or two Shortbow attacks.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Shortbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

bonus.name: Get In Here
entries: Queen Bargnot shouts for aid and {@dice 1d4} {@creature goblin lackey|FleeMortals}s appear in unoccupied spaces within 60 feet of her.

reaction.name: No Dying!
entries: When an ally Queen Bargnot can see within 30 feet of her is reduced to 0 hit points, they are reduced to 1 hit point instead.

legendaryHeader: Queen Bargnot has three villain actions. She can take each action once during an encounter after an enemy's turn.
She can take these actions in any order but can use only one per round.

legendary.name: Action 1: What Are You Waiting For?!
entries: Each ally within 60 feet of Queen Bargnot who can hear her can move up to their speed or make a melee weapon attack (no action required).

legendary.name: Action 2: Focus Fire
entries: Queen Bargnot chooses an enemy she can see with 60 feet of her. Queen Bargnot and each ally within 60 feet of her who can hear her can move up to their speed toward the target.

legendary.name: Action 3: Kill!
entries: Each ally within 60 feet of Queen Bargnot who can hear her can make a weapon attack with advantage (no action required). If the attack hits, it deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage.

trait.name: Exploit Opening (3/Day)
entries: When Radlee makes an attack, she has advantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Sure-Footed
entries: Radlee has advantage on saving throws against being moved against her will or knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Tactical Vigilance
entries: Radlee has advantage on initiative checks.
While she isn't {@condition incapacitated}, Radlee and each ally within 30 feet of her who can see or hear her can't be surprised.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Radlee makes three Halberd or three Longbow attacks. Alternatively, she makes one Halberd attack and uses Backswipe.

action.name: Halberd
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 1d10 + 7}) slashing damage.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Backswipe
entries: Radlee swings her halberd's shaft at a creature within 5 feet of her. The target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw or take 16 ({@damage 3d10}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Protector
entries: When a creature Radlee can see within 10 feet of her attacks one of her allies, Radlee can make a Halberd attack against the attacker.

monster.name: Rot Angel
languages: understands Celestial but can't speak it

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The angel doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when they fly out of an enemy's reach.

action.name: Decaying Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 4d8}) necrotic damage, or if the target is a corpse or Undead, the damage increases to 36 ({@dice 8d8}).

Additionally, for the next 24 hours, the target is marked for death. A creature who drops to 0 hit points while marked for death immediately fails one death saving throw. This effect isn't cumulative.

bonus.name: Hypnotic Beam
entries: One of the angel's eyes shoots a magic ray at a creature the angel can see within 60 feet of them. The target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or use their reaction, if available, to move as far as their speed allows toward the angel, avoiding obviously dangerous ground.

reaction.name: Radiant Puff
entries: When the angel is hit with an attack, they release a cloud of spores. Each creature within 10 feet of the angel must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the end of the rot angel's next turn.

trait.name: Forest Rot
entries: When the rotbeast dies, they release a burst of infectious air. Each non-Fungus creature within 5 feet of them must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or gain a level of {@condition exhaustion} and become infected with forest rot disease. An infected creature regains half the normal number of hit points when they spend Hit Dice or finish a long rest, and they can't reduce their {@condition exhaustion} level by finishing a long rest.

Each time a creature with forest rot finishes a long rest, they must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the creature gains another level of {@condition exhaustion}. On a successful save, the creature loses a level of {@condition exhaustion}.
If a successful saving throw reduces the infected creature's level of {@condition exhaustion} below 1, the creature recovers from the disease.

trait.name: Rotwake
entries: When the rotbeast leaves a space, it becomes difficult terrain for creatures other than rotbeasts for 24 hours. When a non-Fungus creature enters that space for the first time on a turn or starts their turn there, they must make a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw, taking 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The rotbeast makes two attacks using Weakening Horns, Rotting Hooves, or both.

action.name: Weakening Horns
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage, and the target has disadvantage on Constitution saving throws until the end of their next turn.

action.name: Rotting Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d4 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or contract forest rot.

bonus.name: Healing Rot (1/Day)
entries: The rotbeast regains 3 ({@dice 1d6}) hit points for each creature within 60 feet of them infected with forest rot.

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Rotted Path
entries: The rotbeast and their caregiver ignore mundane difficult terrain.

action.name: Signature Attack (Horns)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 plus PB} piercing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Tainting Attack (2 Ferocity)
entries: The rotbeast makes a signature attack. On a hit, the attack deals an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} piercing damage, and the area within 5 feet of the target becomes difficult terrain for the rotbeast's enemies until the start of the rotbeast's next turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Rotting Hooves (5 Ferocity)
entries: The rotbeast moves up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks, then makes a signature attack. On a hit, the attack deals an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} bludgeoning damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of the rotbeast's next turn.

action.name: 5th Level: Rotwake Charge (8 Ferocity)
entries: The rotbeast moves up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks, tainting the ground beneath their hooves and making it mundane difficult terrain for their enemies until the start of the rotbeast's next turn. During this move, the rotbeast can move through the space of Large or smaller creatures as if they were difficult terrain. When a creature enters tainted ground for the first time on a turn or starts their turn there, they must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw, taking {@damage PBd8} poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.name: Rotting Zombie
languages: understands the languages they knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the zombie takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the zombie takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

trait.name: Overwhelm
entries: If an enemy starts their turn within 5 feet of three or more rotting zombies who can see them, the enemy's speed is reduced by 5 feet for each rotting zombie within 5 feet of them until the start of their next turn. If this reduces the enemy's walking speed to 0, they are {@condition restrained} for the duration.

trait.name: Rise Again
entries: The first time a zombie is reduced to 0 hit points by damage other than radiant damage but their body isn't destroyed, they regain hit points equal to their hit point maximum, and they fall {@condition prone} and are {@condition incapacitated} until the start of their next turn.

action.name: Slam (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Lethe
entries: When the ruinant's soul count is 0, they have advantage on attack rolls, disadvantage on saving throws, and their Intelligence score becomes 3 (-4). Additionally, the ruinant must use their movement on each of their turns to move as close as possible to the nearest creature they can sense with their soulsight, and then if they are able, they must use their action to attack and attempt to kill that creature. The ruinant can't act with any other purpose until they add 1 to their soul count.

trait.name: Soul Devourer
entries: When the ruinant reduces a creature who isn't a Construct or an Undead to 0 hit points or deals damage to a dying creature, the creature must make a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the ruinant consumes the creature's soul and adds 1 to the ruinant's soul count. A creature whose soul is consumed in this way immediately dies, and they can't be restored to life by any means short of a {@spell wish} spell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ruinant makes three Bloodletting Claws attacks.

action.name: Bloodletting Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage, and the target can't take reactions this turn.

action.name: Salt Wounds (Costs 1 Soul)
entries: The ruinant chooses up to three creatures they can see within 60 feet of them who don't have all their hit points. Each target must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 16 ({@damage 3d10}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Corrupt Healing (Costs 1 Soul)
entries: When a creature within 60 feet of the ruinant regains hit points from a power, a spell, or a similar supernatural effect, the ruinant corrupts the effect. The target regains no hit points, and the target and each of the ruinant's enemies within 5 feet of the ruinant must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or take necrotic damage equal to half the number of hit points the effect would have restored.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: Sair doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when they fly out of an enemy's reach.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Psionic Bolt (1st-Order Power)
entries: {@atk rp} {@hit 6} to hit, range 120 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage. If the target is Large or smaller, they are pushed 5 feet away from Sair.

action.name: *Mind Scream (1/Day; 3rd-Order Power)
entries: Sair psionically pierces the mind of each enemy within 30 feet of them. Each target must make a {@dc 14} Intelligence saving throw, taking 17 ({@damage 5d6}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this damage is automatically stabilized.

trait.name: Assassinate
entries: During his first turn, Scarlet has advantage on attack rolls against any creature who hasn't taken a turn.
The first hit Scarlet scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

trait.name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
entries: Scarlet deals an extra 14 ({@damage 4d6}) damage when he hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of Scarlet who isn't incapacitated and Scarlet doesn't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Scarlet makes three Shadow Blade or three Shortbow attacks.

action.name: Shadow Blade
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d6 + 7}) necrotic damage. If a target is hit by two or more Shadow Blade attacks on a turn, they must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the end of their next turn.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d8 + 7}) piercing damage.

action.name: Razor Garrote
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d8 + 7}) slashing damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, they are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, they take 22 ({@damage 5d8}) slashing damage at the start of each of their turns, and Scarlet can't attack another target.

action.name: Umbral Breath {@recharge}
entries: Scarlet exhales dark flame in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 28 ({@damage 8d6}) necrotic damage and is {@condition frightened} of Scarlet for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition frightened}.

bonus.name: Cunning Action
entries: Scarlet takes the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The scyza deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: War Harness
entries: While wearing a war harness, the scyza can carry up to thirty-six Medium or smaller creatures.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The scyza makes two Claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage, and the target is knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Tail Whip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 20 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is on top of the scyza, the target falls off and lands {@condition prone}.

action.name: Head Crest
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 4d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a creature who can hear, they are {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} until the end of their next turn by the crest's deep ringing.

action.name: Claw Twister {@recharge}
entries: The scyza claws at the ground in a flurry. Each creature of the scyza's choice within 5 feet of them must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 13 ({@damage 3d8}) slashing damage, is knocked {@condition prone}, and is {@condition blinded} by a cloud of dust until the start of the scyza's next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone} or {@condition blinded}.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Utility)
headerEntries: In addition to any other spells in this stat block, the hag can cast the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}):
will: {@spell create or destroy water}{@sup {@cite Casting Times|FleeMortals|A}}

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The hag can breathe both air and water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The hag makes one Lightning Strike attack and uses Dry Drowning.

action.name: Lightning Strike
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 120 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) lightning damage.

action.name: Dry Drowning
entries: The hag chooses a creature they can see within 120 feet of them, making the target feel as though their lungs are filling with water. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} until the start of the hag's next turn. A creature who can breathe water or who doesn't need air automatically succeeds on this saving throw.

bonus.name: Sea Storm (1/Day; 3rd-Level Spell; Concentration)
entries: The hag creates a roiling storm with a 60-foot radius centered on themself that moves with them and lasts for 1 minute. The hag has advantage on Lightning Strike attacks against targets in that area, and those attacks deal an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) lightning damage.

reaction.name: Fearsome Glare
entries: When a creature the hag can see within 30 feet of them hits the hag with an attack, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the hag until the end of the hag's next turn.

hp.special: Six times their level (number of d6 Hit Dice equal to their level)

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The apprentice can breathe air and water.

action.name: Signature Attack (Zap)
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) lightning damage. This spell's damage increases by {@dice 1d8} when the apprentice reaches 5th level ({@dice 2d8}), 11th level ({@dice 3d8}), and 17th level ({@dice 4d8}).

action.name: 3rd Level: Wash Away (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the apprentice rides a crashing wave. They make a signature attack against an enemy within 5 feet of them and move up to their walking speed without provoking opportunity attacks. If the attack hits, it deals an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} bludgeoning damage.

action.name: 5th Level: Ride the Lightning (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the apprentice supercharges their foe's nervous system. The apprentice makes a signature attack, and if it deals damage to a creature, the target must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target is {@condition incapacitated} and their speed is halved until the end of their next turn.

action.name: 7th Level: Drown (1/Day)
entries: As an action, the apprentice chooses three creatures the apprentice can see within 60 feet of them. Each target feels as though their lungs are filling with water and must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw. A creature who can breathe water or who doesn't need air automatically succeeds on this saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage PBd8} force damage, and for 1 minute, they can't speak, their speed is halved, and they are {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} (save ends at end of turn). On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and suffers no other effect. Another creature within 5 feet of a target can use their action to make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength ({@skill Athletics}) or Intelligence ({@skill Medicine}) check, ending the effect on a success.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The builder is immune to any power, spell, or effect that would alter their form.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The builder deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Supernatural Resistance
entries: The builder has advantage on saving throws against powers, spells, and other supernatural effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The builder makes two attacks using Wrecking Ball, Stone, or both, and can use Lay the Foundation, if available.

action.name: Wrecking Ball
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}26 ({@damage 3d12 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.
Each enemy within 5 feet of the target must succeed on a {@dc 19} Dexterity saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 2d12}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Stone
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 3d10 + 7}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a Medium or smaller creature, they are knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Lay the Foundation {@recharge}
entries: The builder pours wet concrete on the ground in a 20-foot square starting from a point within 5 feet of the builder. Until the foundation dries in 1 hour, that area is difficult terrain, and when a creature with a Strength score of 20 or less starts their turn in that area, they must succeed on a {@dc 19} Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check or be {@condition restrained} until the start of their next turn.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The miner is immune to any power, spell, or effect that would alter their form.

trait.name: Supernatural Resistance
entries: The miner has advantage on saving throws against powers, spells, and other supernatural effects.

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The miner can burrow through solid rock at half their burrowing speed and leaves a 5-foot-diameter tunnel in their wake.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The miner makes two attacks using Drill Press, Pneumatic Pick, or both.

action.name: Drill Press
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) piercing damage. If the target is touching the ground, they are knocked {@condition prone} and {@condition restrained} by the miner's drill. While {@condition restrained} in this way, the target takes 15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) piercing damage at the start of each of their turns, and the miner can't make Drill Press attacks. The {@condition restrained} condition ends if the miner moves, makes a Drill Press attack, or is destroyed. The target or a creature who can reach them can use an action to pull the target away from the drill, ending the {@condition restrained} condition and dealing 15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) piercing damage to the target in the process.

action.name: Pneumatic Pick
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) piercing damage. If the target is wearing mundane armor, their armor takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers.
Armor reduced to an AC of 10 is destroyed.

action.name: Unload Rocks {@recharge}
entries: The miner hurls rocks and dirt in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 44 ({@damage 8d10}) bludgeoning damage and is {@condition blinded} until the end of their next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and is not {@condition blinded}.

bonus.name: Break Ground {@recharge}
entries: The miner strikes the ground and creates a fissure extending from them in a 30-foot-long, 5-foot-wide, 30-foot-deep line. Each Medium or smaller creature in that area must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature falls into the fissure, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) bludgeoning damage from the fall and landing {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a creature is shunted 5 feet into an unoccupied space and does not fall into the fissure. If a creature doesn't have an unoccupied space within 5 feet of them, they fall into the fissure.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The engine is immune to any power, spell, or effect that would alter their form.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The engine deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Supernatural Resistance
entries: The engine has advantage on saving throws against powers, spells, and other supernatural effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The engine makes two attacks using Blade Rake, Force Cannon, or both.

action.name: Blade Rake
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 14} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}35 ({@damage 4d12 + 9}) slashing damage. If the target is Large or smaller, they are pulled up to 15 feet toward the engine.

action.name: Force Cannon
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 12} to hit, range 400 ft., one target. {@h}33 ({@damage 6d10}) force damage, and the target is {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} until the end of their next turn.

action.name: Burning Oil {@recharge}
entries: The engine shoots burning oil in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 52 ({@damage 15d6}) fire damage and is covered in scalding oil. A creature covered in scalding oil takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) fire damage at the start of each of their turns. A creature can use an action to remove the oil from themself or a creature they can reach, ending the effect. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and is not covered in scalding oil.

bonus.name: Destructive Rollout
entries: The engine moves up to their speed in a straight line, destroying mundane walls in their path that are less than 10 feet thick. Medium or smaller mundane objects in the engine's path are destroyed if the objects aren't being worn or carried by a creature. The engine can move through the spaces of other creatures during this movement as if they were difficult terrain, and if the engine does so, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw or take 11 ({@damage 2d10}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

monster.name: Shade
languages: the languages they knew in life

trait.name: Incorporeal Movement
entries: The shade can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. The shade is destroyed if they end their turn inside an object.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the shade takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the shade takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

trait.name: Terrifying
entries: If an enemy starts their turn within 5 feet of three or more shades, the enemy must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the shades until the start of their next turn. The DC for this saving throw equals 10 plus the number of shades within 5 feet of the enemy. On a successful save, the enemy is immune to the Terrifying trait of all shades for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Life Drain (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}1 necrotic damage.

monster.name: Shadow
languages: the languages they knew in life

trait.name: Chilling Phasing
entries: The shadow can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. The shadow takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if they end their turn inside an object. A creature takes 1 cold damage the first time a shadow passes through them on a turn.

trait.name: Dark Stalker
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the shadow has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks.

action.name: Chilling Grasp
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) cold damage, and the target's Dexterity score is reduced by 2. The target dies if this reduces its Dexterity to 0. Otherwise, the reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest.

action.name: Freezing Dark (1/Day)
entries: The shadow pours magical darkness out of their hand in a 15-foot cone. A creature with darkvision who isn't an incorporeal Undead can't see through this darkness, and light can't illuminate it. Each creature in this darkness when it first appears must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) cold damage. The darkness remains in that area for 1 minute or until the shadow is destroyed.

bonus.name: Shadow Bind
entries: The shadow targets one creature they can see within 15 feet of them who is in bright or dim light. The target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Strength saving throw or be {@condition grappled} by their own shadow (escape {@dc 12}). The grapple ends if the target is no longer in bright or dim light, or if the shadow who used this bonus action is destroyed.

trait.name: Engulfing Sack
entries: The mound has a vegetative sack on their body where they carry engulfed creatures. The sack can be attacked (AC 15; 50 hit points; immunity to poison and psychic damage), which deals no damage to the mound. Destroying the sack frees creatures trapped by the mound's Engulf action. The mound regrows the sack at the beginning of their next turn.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the mound remains motionless, they are indistinguishable from an ordinary mass of vegetation.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The mound makes two Vine Lash attacks. They can replace one attack with a use of Engulf, if available.

action.name: Vine Lash
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) piercing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, the mound can pull the target up to 30 feet toward them.

action.name: Engulf {@recharge 5}
entries: The mound reaches out with writhing vines and attempts to pull in up to two Medium or smaller creatures within 30 feet of them. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be engulfed in the mound's engulfing sack. An engulfed creature is {@condition restrained}, has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the mound, and takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage at the start of each of the mound's turns. When the mound moves, the engulfed creature moves with them. If the mound dies or their engulfing sack is destroyed, each engulfed creature is freed and shunted to an unoccupied space of their choice within 5 feet of the mound.

reaction.name: Poison Froth
entries: When the mound takes damage, the inside of their engulfing sack churns with poison. Each creature engulfed by the mound takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage, and the mound regains a number of hit points equal to the total damage dealt by this reaction to creatures in their sack.

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the mound remains motionless, they are indistinguishable from an ordinary mass of vegetation. If the mound's caregiver is Large or smaller, they can use the Hide action to attempt to hide in the same space as their motionless mound.

action.name: Signature Attack (Vine Lash)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 plus PB} piercing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Long-Range Lash (2 Ferocity)
entries: The mound makes a signature attack with a reach of 30 feet instead of 5 feet.
If this attack hits a Medium or smaller creature, the mound can pull the target up to 10 feet toward the mound.

action.name: 3rd Level: Verdant Roundup (5 Ferocity)
entries: The mound targets up to PB creatures within 30 feet of them who are Large or smaller. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw or be pulled up to 15 feet toward the mound and take {@damage PBd4} poison damage.

action.name: 5th Level: Engulf (8 Ferocity)
entries: The mound attempts to pull a Large or smaller creature within 5 feet of them into their body. The target must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength saving throw. On a failure, the target is pulled into the mound's space, takes {@damage PBd8} poison damage, and is engulfed. On a success, a creature takes half as much damage, doesn't move, and isn't engulfed.

An engulfed creature is {@condition restrained}, has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the mound, and takes {@damage PBd8} poison damage at the start of each of the mound's turns. When the mound moves, the engulfed creature moves with them. An engulfed creature can try to escape by taking an action to make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength check. On a success, that creature is freed and shunted to an unoccupied space of their choice within 5 feet of the mound.
The mound can have one Large or up to four Medium or smaller creatures engulfed at a time.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the pile remains motionless, they are indistinguishable from an ordinary mass of vegetation.

trait.name: Hungry Grab
entries: If an enemy starts their turn within 5 feet of three or more piles, the creature must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition grappled}. While {@condition grappled} in this way, the target is {@condition restrained}, and at the start of each of the target's turns, they take poison damage equal to the number of piles within 5 feet of them. The saving throw and escape DC equal 10 plus the number of piles within 5 feet of the creature. The grapple ends if fewer than three piles are within 5 feet of the creature.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the pile takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the pile takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

action.name: Vine Lash (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 piercing damage.

trait.name: Tunneler
entries: The drangolin can burrow through solid rock at half their burrow speed and leaves behind a 3-foot-diameter tunnel when they burrow. Tiny and Small creatures can move through it normally, and Medium and Large creatures can squeeze through it. This tunnel collapses after 10 minutes.

action.name: Fiery Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Erupt (1/Day)
entries: If the drangolin is burrowing within 10 feet of the surface, they can erupt from the ground (without spending movement) into a space that contains one or more creatures. When they do, each creature within 10 feet of the drangolin must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw. A creature directly above the drangolin when they emerge has disadvantage on this saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) bludgeoning damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a creature takes only half as much damage and is pushed 5 feet to an unoccupied space of their choice instead of being knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Wrecking Ball (1/Day)
entries: The drangolin moves up to twice their walking speed in a straight line without provoking opportunity attacks. While doing so, they can enter Large or smaller creatures' spaces. If the drangolin enters another creature's space during this move, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage. If the drangolin enters the space of a structure or object that isn't being worn or carried, it takes twice as much damage.

reaction.name: Ash Shot
entries: When a creature the drangolin can sense moves within 5 feet of them, the drangolin sprays them with a cloud of ash. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the start of their next turn.

monster.name: Shtriga Nonna

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Utility)
headerEntries: In addition to any other spells in this stat block, Shtriga Nonna can cast the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}):

trait.name: Feline Resilience (3/Day)
entries: When Shtriga Nonna fails a saving throw, she can immediately turn into a cat of her size (Medium in her normal form, Large while under the effect of Grow) and succeed instead. While in cat form, Shtriga Nonna retains her game statistics and ability to speak, except she can't cast spells or use Soul Steal. She reverts to her previous form at the end of her next turn.

trait.name: Supernatural Resistance
entries: Shtriga Nonna has advantage on saving throws against powers, spells, and other supernatural effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Shtriga Nonna makes two Corrosive Claw attacks. She can replace one attack with a use of Soul Steal, if available.

action.name: Corrosive Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. (10 ft. with Grow), one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage, or 14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) slashing damage while under the effect of Grow. If the target is wearing mundane metal armor, they must succeed on a {@dc 15} Dexterity throw or their armor takes a permanent and cumulative -1 penalty to the AC it offers. If the armor is reduced to an AC of 10, it is destroyed.

action.name: Soul Steal {@recharge 5}
entries: Shtriga Nonna inhales deeply in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 16 ({@damage 3d10}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Shtriga Nonna regains 10 hit points for each creature who fails this saving throw.

bonus.name: Grow (2/Day; 3rd-Level Spell)
entries: For 1 minute, Shtriga Nonna magically increases in size, along with anything she is wearing or carrying. While enlarged, she is Large, her reach becomes 10 feet, she deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) damage on Strength-based weapon attacks (included in the attacks), and she makes Strength checks and Strength saving throws with advantage. If Shtriga Nonna lacks the room to become Large, she attains the maximum size possible in the space available.

bonus.name: Gobble You Up
entries: Shtriga Nonna feeds on the body of an {@condition unconscious} creature within 5 feet of her. The target takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) piercing damage, and Shtriga Nonna recharges her Soul Steal action.

reaction.name: Turned Upside Down
entries: When a creature hits Shtriga Nonna with a melee attack, she magically reverses gravity around her. Each creature within 5 feet of her must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or rise vertically 10 feet into the air. A creature levitating in this way remains suspended until the end of their next turn, then falls unless they have an ability that keeps them aloft.

legendaryHeader: Shtriga Nonna has three villain actions. She can take each action once during an encounter after an enemy's turn. She can take these actions in any order but can use only one per round.

legendary.name: Action 1: Snackies for Sweeties
entries: The air within 30 feet of Shtriga Nonna magically fills with the scent of rotten food. Each other creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). Creatures are affected even if they hold their breath or don't need to breathe.

legendary.name: Action 2: Feline Felicity
entries: Shtriga Nonna grows four cat legs in a burst of magical energy. Each creature within 5 feet of her must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 10 ({@damage 4d4}) force damage and is pushed 10 feet away from her. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed. Shtriga Nonna can then move up to twice her speed, after which the extra cat legs disappear.

legendary.name: Action 3: Open the Oven
entries: Shtriga Nonna opens a portal to her massive oven in the palms of her hands, creating a blast of heat and noise in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 13 ({@damage 3d8}) fire damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.name: Skeleton
languages: the languages they knew in life

trait.name: Bone Weapons
entries: The skeleton's weapon attacks are magical. They use their bones as ammunition for their bone bow, regrowing used bones every dusk.

trait.name: Hail of Bones
entries: If the skeleton is reduced to 0 hit points by bludgeoning, force, or thunder damage, the skeleton is destroyed in an explosion of bone. Each creature within 5 feet of them takes 4 piercing damage.

action.name: Bone Bow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing, and if the target regains hit points before the start of the skeleton's next turn, the number of hit points the target regains is halved.

action.name: Bone Knife
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, they have disadvantage on attack rolls until the end of this turn.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The skitterling doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when they fly out of an enemy's reach.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 slashing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the start of their next turn. Creatures who are immune to poison damage or the {@condition poisoned} condition succeed on this saving throw automatically.

hp.special: 6 + six times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Claws)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 plus PB} slashing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Destabilizing Attack (2 Ferocity)
entries: The skitterling makes a signature attack. On a hit, the target also has disadvantage on the next attack roll they make before the start of the skitterling's next turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Ankle Biter (5 Ferocity)
entries: The skitterling moves up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks and makes a signature attack. On a hit, if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, they are also knocked {@condition prone} and {@condition grappled} by the skitterling (escape {@dc 10 plus PB}).

action.name: 5th Level: In All Your Faces! (8 Ferocity)
entries: The skitterling chaotically bounces around, smearing toxin on each enemy within 5 feet of them.

Each target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Constitution saving throw or take {@damage 1d6 plus PB} poison damage and be {@condition blinded} until the end of the skitterling's next turn. A creature within 5 feet of a target {@condition blinded} in this way can use their action to wipe the toxin off them, ending the condition for that target.

bonus.name: Crafty Distraction (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: The skitterling flutters and screeches distractingly, allowing their caregiver an opportunity to reposition. The caregiver can use a reaction to move up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

trait.name: Lethe
entries: When the demon's soul count is 0, they have advantage on attack rolls, disadvantage on saving throws, and their Intelligence score becomes 3 (-4). Additionally, the demon must use their movement on each of their turns to move as close as possible to the nearest creature they can sense with their soulsight, and then if they are able, they must use their action to attack and attempt to kill that creature. The demon can't act with any other purpose until they add 1 to their soul count.

trait.name: Soul Devourer
entries: When the demon reduces a creature who isn't a Construct or an Undead to 0 hit points or deals damage to a dying creature, the creature must make a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the demon consumes the creature's soul and adds 1 to the demon's soul count. A creature whose soul is consumed in this way immediately dies, and they can't be restored to life by any means short of a {@spell wish} spell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The demon makes four attacks using Pincer, Sword, Javelin, or a combination of them. They can replace one of these attacks with a Tail Spike attack. The demon can burn 1 soul to make a fifth attack using Pincer, Sword, or Javelin.

action.name: Pincer
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}). While {@condition grappled}, the target is {@condition restrained}. The demon has six pincers, each of which can grapple a target or wield a weapon.

action.name: Sword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Tail Spike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d10 + 6}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

bonus.name: Dive Deep (Costs 1 Soul)
entries: The demon takes the Disengage action and gains a burrowing speed equal to their walking speed until the end of their next turn.

trait.name: Natural Camouflage
entries: The snowfox has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made in snowy terrain or cloudy skies.

trait.name: Nimble Escape
entries: The snowfox doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when they leave an enemy's reach.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 piercing damage, and the snowfox attaches to the target. While attached, the snowfox's Claw attacks against that target are made with advantage, and the snowfox can't attack another target. The target or a creature who can reach them can detach the snowfox as an action with a successful {@dc 13} Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check. The snowfox can detach by spending 5 feet of their movement.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 slashing damage.

bonus.name: Burrow
entries: The snowfox burrows up to 5 feet in snow.

bonus.name: Listen
entries: The snowfox makes a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.

monster.name: Specter
languages: the languages they knew in life

trait.name: Corrupting Phasing
entries: The specter can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. The specter takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if they end their turn inside an object. A creature takes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) necrotic damage the first time a specter passes through them on a turn.

action.name: Decaying Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or spend 1 Hit Die without any benefit. If the target has no Hit Dice to spend, they drop to 0 hit points instead.
If a Humanoid dies within 1 minute of being hit by this attack, their spirit rises as a specter under the GM's control in an unoccupied space nearest to where that Humanoid died.

bonus.name: Hidden Movement {@recharge 5}
entries: The specter turns {@condition invisible} and then moves up to their speed. At the end of this movement, the invisibility ends.

trait.name: Chorus of Death
entries: If the starving harpy hears a harpy's Alluring Song, they can start harmonizing (no action required). The starving harpy continues harmonizing until the song ends, until they choose to stop harmonizing, or until they become {@condition deafened} or {@condition incapacitated}. For each starving harpy harmonizing, the range of the song increases by 50 feet, and the save DCs for the singing harpy's Alluring Song action and Beckon bonus action both increase by 1 (maximum DC increase of 5).

trait.name: Echolocation
entries: The harpy can't use their blindsight while {@condition deafened}.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the harpy takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the harpy takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

action.name: Grasping Talons (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage, and if the target is a creature, the harpies can move them 5 feet in any direction. If the attack was made by three or more harpies, they can move the target 10 feet instead of 5.

trait.name: Tiny Target
entries: If the stirge is reduced to 0 hit points by any damage other than psychic while attached to another creature, that creature takes damage equal to half that dealt to the stirge.

action.name: Proboscis
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}3 piercing damage, and the stirge can attach to the target and enter their space. While attached, the stirge moves with the target and can't make Proboscis attacks. A creature who can reach the stirge can use an action to detach the stirge, shunting them into the nearest unoccupied space of the stirge's choice. The stirge also detaches if they become {@condition grappled}, {@condition incapacitated}, {@condition prone}, or {@condition restrained}.

action.name: Drain Essence
entries: The stirge sips the life essence of a creature they are attached to who isn't a Construct or an Undead. The creature loses 3 hit points and must succeed on a {@dc 12} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the end of the stirge's next turn. If the creature is already {@condition poisoned}, they also become {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} until the end of the stirge's next turn.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the broodling takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the broodling takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

trait.name: Tiny Target
entries: If the broodling is reduced to 0 hit points by any damage other than psychic while attached to another creature, that creature takes 1 damage of the same type.

action.name: Proboscis (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}1 piercing damage, and each broodling who joined the attack can attach to the target and enter their space. While attached, a broodling moves with the target and can't make Proboscis attacks. The target or a creature who can reach them can use an action or bonus action to detach all broodlings, shunting them into the nearest unoccupied space of each broodling's choice. The broodling also detaches if they become {@condition grappled}, {@condition incapacitated}, {@condition prone}, or {@condition restrained}.

action.name: Drain Essence
entries: The broodling sips the life essence of a creature they're attached to who isn't a Construct or an Undead. The creature loses 1 hit point.

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Proboscis)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 plus PB} piercing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Destabilizing Attack (2 Ferocity)
entries: The stirge makes a signature attack. On a hit, the target also has disadvantage on the next attack they make before the end of their next turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Quick Drink (5 Ferocity)
entries: The stirge makes a signature attack. On a hit, the target takes an extra {@damage PBd4} piercing damage and is {@condition poisoned} until the end of their next turn.

action.name: 5th Level: Attach (8 Ferocity)
entries: The stirge makes a signature attack against a creature. On a hit, the target takes an extra {@damage PBd6} piercing damage and the stirge attaches to the target and enters their space. While attached, the stirge moves with the target and can't attack any creature other than the target. If the stirge hits the target with an attack while attached, the target takes an extra {@damage PBd6} piercing damage. The stirge can use an action or bonus action to detach and move 5 feet into an unoccupied space without provoking opportunity attacks. The stirge also detaches if they become {@condition grappled}, {@condition incapacitated}, {@condition prone}, or {@condition restrained}, or if they take more than PB × 5 damage in a turn.

bonus.name: Essence Shared (2/Long Rest)
entries: If the stirge's caregiver is within 5 feet of them and the stirge isn't attached to another creature, the stirge pumps life essence into the caregiver's veins. The caregiver regains {@damage 1d6 plus PB} hit points.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The isopod can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The isopod has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks to hide in rocky terrain.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage.

action.name: Seize
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}). Until this grapple ends, the isopod can't make a Seize attack against another target.

reaction.name: Curl
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of the isopod hits them with an attack, the isopod defensively rolls up inside their rocky carapace. The isopod gains a +2 bonus to AC against the triggering attack, and the attacker must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or take 4 ({@damage 1d8}) bludgeoning damage and be pushed 5 feet into an unoccupied space of the isopod's choice.

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The isopod can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Stone Camouflage
entries: The isopod has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in rocky terrain.

action.name: Signature Attack (Bite)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 plus PB} piercing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Mangling Attack (2 Ferocity)
entries: The isopod makes a signature attack. On a hit, the target's speed is also reduced by 10 feet until the end of the isopod's next turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Push Through (5 Ferocity)
entries: The isopod moves up to their walking speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

While doing so, they can move through the spaces of Large or smaller creatures as if they were difficult terrain. If the isopod enters another creature's space during this move, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: 5th Level: Tackle (8 Ferocity)
entries: The isopod moves up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks and makes a signature attack. On a hit, the target is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 10 plus PB}). While {@condition grappled} in this way, the target is {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} and {@condition restrained}.

reaction.name: Emergency Hug (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: When the isopod's caregiver is hit with an attack while within 5 feet of the isopod, the isopod curls around the caregiver, giving the caregiver a +PB bonus to their AC against the attack.

trait.name: Corona
entries: The nexus sheds bright sunlight in a 120-foot radius and dim light for another 120 feet.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The nexus makes three Solar Arc attacks. They can replace one attack with a use of Heavenly Collapse or Rejuvenating Flare, if available.

action.name: Solar Arc
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 2d12 + 5}) radiant damage.

action.name: Heavenly Collapse (2/Day)
entries: The nexus shines harsh light on an enemy they can see within 60 feet of them. Each ally of the nexus within 5 feet of the target regains 20 hit points, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or lose any damage resistances they have and be {@condition blinded} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

action.name: Rejuvenating Flare (1/Day)
entries: One ally the nexus can see within 30 feet of them is bathed in rejuvenating light. The ally regains 27 ({@damage 5d10}) hit points, and if they are {@condition charmed}, {@condition dazed|FleeMortals}, {@condition frightened}, or {@condition poisoned}, those conditions end for them.

bonus.name: Convocation of Sunlight (2/Day)
entries: The nexus imbues the power of sunlight in themself or another Elemental they can see within 30 feet of them, granting one of the following effects of that Elemental's choice:

items: {@b Healing Radiance.} The Elemental regains 30 hit points. Until the end of the nexus's next turn, the Elemental refracts shimmering light, and creatures within 10 feet of them who aren't Elementals are {@condition blinded}.

{@b Protective Light.} Four brilliant motes orbit the Elemental for 1 minute. When the Elemental deals damage to a creature with an attack, the Elemental can extinguish one mote (no action required) to deal an extra 14 ({@damage 4d6}) radiant damage to that creature.

monster.name: Swamp Dryad
languages: any languages the dryad spoke before their binding

trait.name: Supernatural Resistance
entries: The dryad has advantage on saving throws against supernatural effects.

trait.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
entries: The dryad can communicate with Beasts and Plants as if they shared a language.

trait.name: Tree Stride (1/Turn)
entries: The dryad can use 10 feet of movement to step into one living tree within their reach and emerge from a second living tree within 60 feet of the first tree, appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the second tree. Both trees must be Large or larger.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dryad makes two Slam attacks and uses Entangling Roots, if available.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage, and the target must make a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) poison damage and is {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition poisoned}.

action.name: Entangling Roots {@recharge 5}
entries: The dryad chooses a point they can see within 60 feet of them, causing tree roots to pull free of the ground and attack in a 15-foot radius centered on that point. If the dryad is within 5 feet of their tree, the radius of this effect doubles to 30 feet. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw or take 22 ({@damage 4d10}) bludgeoning damage and be {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}).
While {@condition grappled} in this way, a creature is {@condition restrained} and their flesh begins to harden and turn to wood.

At the end of a creature's third consecutive turn being {@condition grappled} in this way, they become {@condition petrified} and turn into a hardwood statue. The {@condition petrified} condition ends for that creature if the dryad uses an action to end it, or if the dryad dies.

action.name: Fey Intimidation
entries: The dryad targets up to five creatures they can see within 30 feet of them. Each target who can see the dryad must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the dryad (save ends at end of turn). If a target succeeds on their saving throw or the effect ends for them, the target is immune to the swamp dryad's Fey Intimidation for the next 24 hours.

bonus.name: Swamp Medicine (3/Day)
entries: The dryad touches a creature, who regains 18 ({@dice 3d8 + 5}) hit points. Alternatively, the creature removes one disease or neutralizes one poison afflicting them.

trait.name: Multitudinous
entries: The swarm has advantage on opportunity attacks, and creatures provoke opportunity attacks from the swarm even if they take the Disengage action before leaving the swarm's reach.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny insect. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. {@h}10 ({@damage 4d4}) piercing damage, or 5 ({@damage 2d4}) piercing damage if the swarm has half their hit points or fewer.

action.name: Distracting Buzz
entries: If the swarm has at least half their hit points remaining, they emit an annoying drone, buzz, or skittering sound. Until the start of the swarm's next turn, creatures within 15 feet of the swarm who can hear them have disadvantage on attack rolls against creatures other than the swarm.

trait.name: In Your Face
entries: While the swarm occupies an enemy's space, that creature has disadvantage on attack rolls made against any target other than the swarm and takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) slashing damage if they attack a creature other than the swarm.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny skitterling. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) slashing damage, or 7 ({@damage 2d6}) slashing damage if the swarm has half of their hit points or fewer. The target must succeed on a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the start of their next turn. Creatures who are immune to poison damage or the {@condition poisoned} condition succeed on this saving throw automatically.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The swarm can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny spider. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The swarm ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the swarm's space. {@h}5 ({@damage 2d4}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) poison damage, or 2 ({@damage 1d4}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage if the swarm has half their hit points or fewer.

action.name: Too Many Legs
entries: The swarm mobs a creature in their space and attaches to them. When the swarm takes damage other than psychic damage, the attached creature also takes half as much damage. The attached creature has disadvantage on attacks against creatures other than the swarm, and attacks against the attached creature have advantage.

While attached, the swarm can't attack another target. The attached creature or another creature who can reach them can shake off the swarm and detach them as an action. The swarm can detach by spending 5 feet of their movement.

trait.name: Fey Countenance (1/Turn)
entries: When a creature who can see Sylphise targets her with an attack, power, or spell, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 16} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition blinded} until the start of their next turn (no action required).

trait.name: Speak with Beasts and Plants
entries: Sylphise can communicate with Beasts and Plants as if they shared a language.

trait.name: Supernatural Resistance
entries: Sylphise has advantage on saving throws against powers, spells, and other supernatural effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Sylphise makes three Claw attacks or uses Sibilant Whispers twice.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) psychic damage.

action.name: Sibilant Whispers
entries: One creature Sylphise can see within 60 feet of her must succeed on a {@dc 16} Charisma saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage.

action.name: Etherealness
entries: Sylphise magically enters the Ethereal Plane from the Mundane World, or vice versa.

reaction.name: Too Slow!
entries: If a creature misses Sylphise with an attack, she can move up to her speed without provoking opportunity attacks from that creature.

trait.name: Dying Gasp
entries: When the Horror dies, they begin to rupture in a vile explosion of viscera and necrotic energy. The creature who reduced the Horror to 0 hit points can make a {@dc 15} Charisma ({@skill Persuasion}) check to appeal to Elyas's departing soul (no action required). On a successful check, his soul transforms the explosion and each enemy of the Grave Order within 30 feet of the Horror gains 7 ({@dice 2d6}) temporary hit points. On a failed check (or if no check is made), each creature within 15 feet of the Horror must make a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw, taking 4 ({@damage 1d8}) acid damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Spine Cleaver
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4}) slashing damage, or 13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) slashing damage against a {@condition grappled} target.

action.name: Bone Hook
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 15 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, they are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 14}) and the Horror can pull the target up to 15 feet toward them.
Until this grapple ends, the Horror can't make a Bone Hook attack against another target.

bonus.name: Valor's Death
entries: Each enemy within 10 feet of the Horror who can hear the Horror must succeed on a {@dc 13} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the Horror for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for them, the creature is immune to the Horror's Valor's Death for 24 hours.

trait.name: Corpse Retreat (1/Day)
entries: The thornblood is a mass of thick, thorny vines that grow from a Medium humanoid corpse. When the thornblood is reduced to 0 hit points, they are reduced to 1 hit point instead and retreat into the corpse that grew them.

The thornblood becomes immune to all damage until the end of their next turn. Additionally, until the thornblood finishes a long rest, their size becomes Medium, their walking and climbing speeds become 60 feet, and they can't make Throttle attacks or benefit from the Overgrowth trait.

trait.name: Overgrowth
entries: The thornblood can move their vines through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. The thornblood can occupy another creature's space and vice versa.

trait.name: Supernatural Resistance
entries: The thornblood has advantage on saving throws against powers, spells, and other supernatural effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The thornblood makes four attacks using Vinerip, Throttle, or both.

action.name: Vinerip
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) piercing damage, and the target is pulled up to 30 feet toward the thornblood.

action.name: Throttle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 0 ft., one target in the thornblood's space. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) piercing damage, and the tar get is entangled in thorny vines. While entangled, the target is {@condition restrained} and moves with the thornblood, can't see outside their space, and takes 20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) piercing damage at the start of each of their turns. The target or another creature within 5 feet of them can use their action to take 20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) slashing damage and make a {@dc 20} Strength check, freeing the target on a success.

action.name: From Life, Lightning (2/Day)
entries: The thornblood must have at least one creature entangled to use this action. Each creature entangled by the thornblood must make a {@dc 20} Constitution saving throw, taking 55 ({@damage 10d10}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Then the thornblood shoots a bolt of lightning at each enemy within 60 feet of them who isn't entangled by them. Each target must make a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw, taking 55 ({@damage 10d10}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

bonus.name: You're Mine
entries: The thornblood moves an entangled creature to a space occupied by the thornblood that isn't also occupied by another creature or object.

reaction.name: Hostile Roots
entries: When an enemy ends their turn in the thornblood's space, the thornblood attempts to pull them down. The target must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or fall {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the archon takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the archon takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

trait.name: Psychic Scar
entries: The archon is immune to any effect that would sense their emotions, read their thoughts, reveal they are lying, or reveal their alignment or location.

action.name: Brutal Flail (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 bludgeoning damage. If two or more archons joined the attack, the target must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or be {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} until the end of their next turn. The DC for this saving throw equals 10 plus the number of archons who joined the attack.

action.name: Blaster (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. {@h}3 radiant damage.

trait.name: Psychic Scar
entries: The armiger is immune to any effect that would sense their emotions, read their thoughts, reveal they are lying, or reveal their alignment or location.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The armiger makes two attacks using Blaster, Serrated Saber, or both.

action.name: Serrated Saber
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, and the target has disadvantage on their next attack roll made before the start of the armiger's next turn.

action.name: Blaster
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/90 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) radiant damage.

action.name: Concussive Slam (1st-Order Power)
entries: The armiger rains down telekinetic force on a creature they can see within 30 feet of them. The target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 3d4}) force damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.

reaction.name: Sickening Sympathy (2nd-Order Power)
entries: When another creature the armiger can see within 30 feet of them is hit with an attack, the armiger floods the attacker's mind with the nauseous pain of their target. The attacker must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the end of their next turn.

hp.special: Seven times their level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Cutlass)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d10 plus PB} slashing damage. Beginning at 7th level, the freebooter can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 7th Level: Wraithstep (1/Day)
entries: As an action, the freebooter becomes {@condition invisible} for 1 minute. While {@condition invisible}, the freebooter has resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage from mundane attacks, and the freebooter can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. The freebooter takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if they end their turn inside an object.

bonus.name: 3rd Level: Blip Strike (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the freebooter teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space they can see. If this space is within 5 feet of an enemy the freebooter can see, the freebooter can make a signature attack against them with advantage as part of this bonus action.

bonus.name: 5th Level: Kinetic Clamp (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the freebooter tries to telekinetically grip one creature they can see within 60 feet of them. The target must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage PBd6} force damage and is {@condition restrained} until the start of the freebooter's next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and is not {@condition restrained}.

trait.name: Precog Reflexes
entries: The nemesis adds their Intelligence modifier (+4) to initiative rolls and to their AC (included in Armor Class).

trait.name: Psychic Scar
entries: The nemesis is immune to any effect that would sense their emotions, read their thoughts, reveal they are lying, or reveal their alignment or location.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The nemesis makes two Golden Scythe attacks. They can replace one attack with a use of Kinetic Crush or Phase, if available.

action.name: Golden Scythe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) necrotic damage. If this attack reduces a creature who is in an astral body (as with the {@spell astral projection} spell) to 0 hit points, that creature's soul returns to their material body, and then their material body is also reduced to 0 hit points.

action.name: Kinetic Crush (4th-Order Power)
entries: The nemesis attempts to telekinetically grip one creature they can see within 60 feet of them. The target must make a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 27 ({@damage 6d8}) force damage, and their speed becomes 0 until the start of the nemesis's next turn. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and their speed isn't reduced.

action.name: Phase (1/Day; 4th-Order Power; Concentration)
entries: For 1 minute, the nemesis can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. The nemesis takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if they end their turn inside an object. If this power ends while the nemesis is inside an object, they are shunted out of the object into the nearest unoccupied space of their choice.

bonus.name: Jaunt (3/Day; 3rd-Order Power)
entries: The nemesis teleports up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space they can see.

trait.name: Psychic Scar
entries: The vertex is immune to any effect that would sense their emotions, read their thoughts, reveal they are lying, or reveal their alignment or location.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The vertex makes two Psionic Slam attacks.

action.name: Psionic Slam
entries: {@atk mp} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) psychic damage, and the next attack roll against the target made before the start of the vertex's next turn has advantage.

action.name: Split Space (2/Day)
entries: The vertex chooses a point in a precise location they have seen (in person or otherwise) on any plane of existence. A shimmering 10-foot-diameter portal leading to that location appears in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the vertex. Each creature who touches the portal is instantly teleported to the nearest unoccupied space at the chosen location. The portal lasts until the vertex dies, uses this action again, dismisses the portal as an action, or is transported by the portal.

bonus.name: Invigorated March (3rd-Order Power)
entries: The vertex emits invigorating psionic energy. Each time raider within 60 feet of the vertex can use their reaction to move up to half their speed.

reaction.name: Kinetic Defense Field
entries: When another Medium or smaller creature the vertex can see within 120 feet of them takes damage, that damage is reduced by 15.

trait.name: Lethe
entries: When the tormenauk's soul count is 0, they have advantage on attack rolls, disadvantage on saving throws, and their Intelligence score becomes 3 (-4). Additionally, the tormenauk must use their movement on each of their turns to move as close as possible to the nearest creature they can sense with their soulsight, and then if they are able, they must use their action to attack and attempt to kill that creature. The tormenauk can't act with any other purpose until they add 1 to their soul count.

trait.name: Soul Devourer
entries: When the tormenauk reduces a creature who isn't a Construct or an Undead to 0 hit points or deals damage to a dying creature, the creature must make a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the tormenauk consumes the creature's soul and adds 1 to the tormenauk's soul count. A creature whose soul is consumed in this way immediately dies, and they can't be restored to life by any means short of a {@spell wish} spell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tormenauk makes two Slam attacks and one Many Maws attack.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Large or smaller, they are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}), and they are {@condition restrained} until the grapple ends. The tormenauk can grapple up to two targets at a time.

action.name: Many Maws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target {@condition grappled} by the tormenauk. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Agony Wail (Costs 1 Soul)
entries: The tormenauk screeches, broadcasting a consumed soul's lifelong pain. Each creature within 30 feet of the tormenauk who can hear them must make a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw, taking 35 ({@damage 10d6}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Creatures who knew the owner of the burned soul have disadvantage on the saving throw.

reaction.name: Share Agony (Costs 1 Soul)
entries: When the tormenauk takes damage, they choose a creature they can see within 30 feet of them to share the pain.
