The target must make a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw, taking psychic damage equal to the triggering damage taken by the tormenauk on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Utility)
headerEntries: In addition to any other spells in this stat block, the treant can cast the following spells, using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 16}):

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the treant remains motionless, they are indistinguishable from a normal tree.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The treant makes two Thorned Tendril attacks.

action.name: Thorned Tendril
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 4d6 + 5}) piercing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). While {@condition grappled} in this way, a target is {@condition restrained} and takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage at the start of each of their turns.

action.name: Swinging Tendrils {@recharge}
entries: The treant swings the creatures they are grappling in violent circles. Each creature {@condition grappled} by the treant takes 26 ({@damage 4d12}) bludgeoning damage, and the treant can move them into an unoccupied space the treant can see within 15 feet of the treant.

All other creatures within 15 feet of the treant must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 26 ({@damage 4d12}) bludgeoning damage per creature {@condition grappled} by the treant. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage.

bonus.name: Healing Growth (1/Day)
entries: Each creature of the treant's choice within 30 feet of them regains 17 ({@damage 3d8 + 4}) hit points.

bonus.name: Reel and Wrap
entries: The treant wraps one creature they have {@condition grappled} in thick vines, pulling the target up to 10 feet toward them. The target can't speak until the grapple ends.

hp.special: Nine times their level (number of d12 Hit Dice equal to their level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Claw)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 2d6 plus PB} slashing damage. Beginning at 7th level, the immobilizer can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Lash Out (3/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the immobilizer whips a vine toward a creature they can see within 30 feet of them. The target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 10 feet toward the immobilizer and {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 10 plus PB}). Until this grapple ends, the immobilizer's attacks against the target deal an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} bludgeoning damage.

action.name: 5th Level: Ground Stomp (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the im - mobilizer stomps the ground. Each creature within 10 feet of the immobilizer must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. Then the immobilizer can make a signature attack with a reach of 10 feet against one {@condition prone} creature.

action.name: 7th Level: Entomb (1/Day)
entries: As a bonus action, the immobilizer calls spiky vines to surround a creature they can see within 60 feet of them. The target must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage PBd10} piercing damage and is {@condition restrained}. While {@condition restrained} in this way, the target is {@condition blinded}. On a successful save, the target takes only half damage and isn't {@condition restrained}.
A creature can use their action to make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength ({@skill Athletics}) or Dexterity ({@skill Acrobatics}) check, freeing themself or another creature within reach on a success.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the sapling remains motionless, they are indistinguishable from a normal tree.

trait.name: Grove Strength
entries: When a non-minion ally hits a target with an attack, the target takes an extra 2 slashing damage for each sapling within 5 feet of the target.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the sapling takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the sapling takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

action.name: Claws (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 slashing damage.

trait.name: Charm Resistant
entries: Treyvan has advantage on saving throws he makes to avoid or end the {@condition charmed} condition on himself.

trait.name: Mind Link
entries: Treyvan can communicate telepathically with any Amethyst Knife boss regardless of distance, provided they are on the same plane of existence.

trait.name: Telekinetic Bastion
entries: Each ally within 20 feet of Treyvan has a +2 bonus to AC and Dexterity saving throws. Enemies treat the area within 20 feet of Treyvan as difficult terrain.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Treyvan makes two Maul attacks. He can replace one attack with a use of Telekinetic Throw or Choke, if available.

action.name: Maul
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, Treyvan can choose to either knock them {@condition prone} or push them up to 10 feet away from him.

action.name: Telekinetic Throw
entries: Treyvan throws his maul with telekinetic force, making a Maul attack with a range of 30 feet. After making this attack, the maul immediately returns to Treyvan's hands.

action.name: Choke (2/Day; 5th-Order Power; Concentration)
entries: Treyvan telekinetically crushes one Large or smaller creature he can see within 30 feet of him. The target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition restrained} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). While {@condition restrained} in this way, the target takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) force damage at the start of each of their turns. If the target is ever more than 30 feet away from Treyvan or has total cover from him, the power ends early.

reaction.name: Shared Condition
entries: When Treyvan is {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition dazed|FleeMortals}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition paralyzed}, or {@condition stunned}, he chooses a willing Amethyst Knife boss within 60 feet of him who doesn't already have the condition or is immune to it. The chosen creature then gains the condition for the duration, and Treyvan loses the condition. He can use this reaction even while {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Relentless Hunger
entries: When the troll is reduced to 0 hit points by any damage other than acid or fire damage, they don't die or fall {@condition unconscious}, and can continue moving and taking actions as usual. The troll only dies if they end their turn with 0 hit points, if acid or fire damage reduces them to 0 hit points, or if they take acid or fire damage while they have 0 hit points.

trait.name: Sluggish
entries: For 1 hour after sleep or another period of unconsciousness, the troll's speed is halved and they can't use Multiattack.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The troll makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}14 ({@damage 3d6 + 4}) piercing damage. If the target is not a Construct, an Elemental, or a Plant, the troll regains hit points equal to the damage dealt. If this attack reduces the target to 0 hit points, the troll regains twice as many hit points as they otherwise would with this attack.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Crash Through
entries: The troll moves up to their speed in a straight line, smashing through mundane obstacles in their path. The troll can enter the spaces of Large or smaller creatures during this movement, forcing those creatures to make a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) bludgeoning damage and falls {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and doesn't fall {@condition prone}.

During this move, mundane objects that aren't worn or carried by a creature take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) damage when the troll enters their space. If the troll moves into the space of a Large or larger object and this damage doesn't destroy it, the troll's movement stops and they are {@condition stunned} until the end of their next turn.

reaction.name: Spiteful Retort
entries: When the troll is reduced to 0 hit points and doesn't die, they can make a Bite attack against a creature within 5 feet of them.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the limbjumble takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the limbjumble takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

action.name: Arm and a Leg (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 bludgeoning damage. If the target is Medium or smaller and if three or more limbjumbles joined the attack, the target is knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the whelp takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the whelp takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

trait.name: Relentless Hunger
entries: When the whelp is reduced to 0 hit points by any damage other than acid or fire damage, they don't die or fall {@condition unconscious}, and can continue moving and taking actions as usual. The whelp only dies if they end their turn with 0 hit points, if acid or fire damage reduces them to 0 hit points, or if they take acid or fire damage while they have 0 hit points.

trait.name: Ripping Claws
entries: Spaces within reach of one or more whelps are difficult terrain for Medium or smaller enemies. When an enemy leaves the reach of one or more whelps who can see them, the enemy takes 2 slashing damage.

action.name: Bite (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 4} piercing damage, and if the target is not a Construct, an Elemental, or a Plant, each whelp who joined this attack regains all lost hit points.

trait.name: Lethe
entries: When the demon's soul count is 0, they have advantage on attack rolls, disadvantage on saving throws, and their Intelligence score becomes 3 (-4). Additionally, the demon must use their movement on each of their turns to move as close as possible to the nearest creature they can sense with their soulsight, and then if they are able, they must use their action to attack and attempt to kill that creature. The demon can't act with any other purpose until they add 1 to their soul count.

trait.name: Soul Devourer
entries: When the demon reduces a creature who isn't a Construct or an Undead to 0 hit points or deals damage to a dying creature, the creature must make a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the demon consumes the creature's soul and adds 1 to the demon's soul count. A creature whose soul is consumed in this way immediately dies, and they can't be restored to life by any means short of a {@spell wish} spell.

trait.name: Trample
entries: The demon can move through the spaces of Large or smaller creatures as if they were difficult terrain. When the demon enters a creature's space for the first time on the demon's turn, the demon can make a Stomp attack against that creature (no action required). Additionally, the demon can end their turn in the space of a {@condition prone} creature who is Medium or smaller, and that creature can't stand up while in the demon's space.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6}) piercing damage. The demon can burn 1 soul to push the target up to 40 feet directly away from the demon.

action.name: Stomp
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, they must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Tongue
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) slashing damage, and if the target is a creature, they must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be pulled up to 10 feet toward the demon.

reaction.name: Vengeful Charge (Costs 1 Soul)
entries: When an enemy within 40 feet of the demon deals damage to the demon, the demon can move up to their speed straight toward them. If the demon ends this movement within 10 feet of the enemy, the demon can make a Gore attack against them.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Utility)
headerEntries: In addition to any other spells in this stat block, Tuval-Uthriar can cast the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 15}):

trait.name: Elf Glamour (1/Day)
entries: When a creature targets Tuval-Uthriar with an attack, power, or spell, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by him until the end of his next turn (no action required).

trait.name: Supernatural Resistance
entries: Tuval-Uthriar has advantage on saving throws against powers, spells, and other supernatural effects.

trait.name: Wheel of Ire
entries: Each enemy within 30 feet of Tuval-Uthriar has disadvantage on attacks against creatures other than him.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Tuval-Uthriar makes three Longsword attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) slashing damage, or 10 ({@damage 1d10 + 5}) slashing damage if used with two hands.

action.name: Call Lightning (3/Day; 3rd-Level Spell)
entries: A magical bolt of lightning flashes down from the sky to a point Tuval-Uthriar can see within 120 feet of him. Each creature within 5 feet of that point must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 16 ({@damage 3d10}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Eye of Sunrise (1/Day)
entries: Tuval-Uthriar's gauntlet emits a fiery explosion in a 30-foot cone. The explosion can be heard 300 feet away. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 ({@damage 5d6}) fire damage plus 17 ({@damage 5d6}) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. Each structure and mundane object in the area that isn't being worn or carried takes 35 ({@damage 10d6}) fire damage plus 35 ({@damage 10d6}) force damage.

bonus.name: Healing Word (2nd-Level Spell)
entries: Tuval-Uthriar targets one creature who isn't a Construct or an Undead who he can see within 60 feet of him. The target regains 8 ({@dice 2d4 + 3}) hit points.

trait.name: Cloak and Dagger
entries: While Vali is hidden, he doesn't give away his location if he makes a weapon attack and misses.

trait.name: Deft-Footed
entries: Vali leaves no tracks or other traces of his presence unless he wants to.

trait.name: Elf Glamour (1/Day)
entries: When a creature targets Vali with an attack, power, or spell, the creature must succeed on a {@dc 15} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by him until the end of his next turn (no action required).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Vali makes two Shortsword attacks, or he makes two Waning Moon attacks and uses Waning Moon Fade, if available.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Waning Moon
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 1d8 + 5}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature who can't see Vali, the target takes an extra 7 ({@damage 2d6}) force damage.

action.name: Waning Moon Fade (1/Day)
entries: Vali becomes {@condition invisible} for 1 minute and takes the Hide action. This invisibility ends if Vali makes an attack, casts a spell, or manifests a power.

bonus.name: Nimble Escape
entries: Vali takes the Disengage or Hide action.

trait.name: Acid Absorption
entries: Whenever the valochera is subjected to acid damage, they take no damage and instead regain a number of hit points equal to the acid damage dealt.

trait.name: Unbearable Stench
entries: Any creature who starts their turn within 5 feet of the valochera must succeed on a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The valochera makes two Mycelium attacks.

action.name: Mycelium
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is Large or smaller, they are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}).
Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}.

action.name: Chow Time
entries: The valochera douses a creature they have {@condition grappled} with acid and then takes a bite. The target must make a {@dc 16} Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) acid damage plus 14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Poison Glob {@recharge 5}
entries: The valochera spits a glob of noxious sludge at a point they can see within 30 feet of them.

Each creature in a 5-foot-radius sphere centered on that point must make a {@dc 16} Constitution saving throw, taking 33 ({@damage 6d10}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.name: Vampire
languages: the languages they knew in life

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Utility)
headerEntries: In addition to any other spells in this stat block, the vampire can cast the following spells, using Charisma as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 18}):

trait.name: Radiant Aversion
entries: Each time the vampire takes radiant damage, they take an extra 10 radiant damage.

trait.name: Resting Place
entries: When the vampire drops to 0 hit points and is not in sunlight, running water, or their resting place, the vampire teleports to their resting place. While in their resting place, the vampire is stable. After spending 1 hour in their resting place with 0 hit points, they regain 1 hit point.

trait.name: Turn Resistance
entries: The vampire has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The vampire makes two Claw attacks and, if possible, a Bite attack.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) slashing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage. If the target is Large or smaller, they are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 18}). While {@condition grappled} in this way, the target is {@condition restrained}. Moving while grappling a Medium or smaller creature doesn't halve the vampire's speed. A vampire can have only one target {@condition grappled} in this way at a time.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature who is {@condition grappled} by the vampire, {@condition incapacitated}, or {@condition restrained}. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d6 + 5}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by a number equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the vampire regains hit points equal to that number. The reduction lasts until reversed by a {@psionic cure ailment|TalPsi} power of 4th order or higher, a {@spell greater restoration} spell, or a similar supernatural effect. The target dies if this attack reduces their hit point maximum to 0. A Humanoid slain in this way rises the following midnight as a vampire spawn under the vampire's control.

action.name: Exsanguinating Mist {@recharge}
entries: The vampire, along with anything they are wearing or carrying, turns into a cloud of blood-sucking mist. When they do, they release any creature they were grappling, and if the vampire was {@condition grappled} or {@condition restrained}, that effect ends for them. Then the vampire flies up to twice their speed to an unoccupied space. During this move, the vampire ignores difficult terrain, doesn't provoke opportunity attacks, and can move through creatures and objects. Each creature the vampire passes through must make a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw, taking 35 ({@damage 10d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. At the end of this movement, the vampire transforms back into their previous form.

bonus.name: Beguile
entries: The vampire targets one creature they can see within 30 feet of them and who can see them. The target must make a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the target uses their reaction, if available, to move up to their speed to a location chosen by the vampire, then either makes a melee attack against a target of the vampire's choice or falls {@condition prone} (vampire's choice).

Creatures who can't be {@condition charmed} automatically succeed on this saving throw, and creatures who have advantage on saving throws against being {@condition charmed} make this saving throw with advantage.

bonus.name: Inhuman Agility
entries: The vampire moves up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

reaction.name: Run, My Child
entries: When an ally the vampire can see takes damage, the vampire can command the ally to move up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks.

monster.name: Vampire Neophyte

hp.special: Eight times their level (number of d10 Hit Dice equal to their level)

languages: any two languages they knew in life

action.name: Signature Attack (Claws)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d8 plus PB} slashing damage. Beginning at 7th level, the neophyte can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Take Away (3/Day)
entries: When the neophyte hits a creature with a signature attack, the neophyte grabs the target. The target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 10 plus PB}), and the neophyte moves up to their speed without provoking attacks of opportunity (no action required). If the {@condition grappled} creature is Medium or smaller, they don't cost the neophyte extra movement.

action.name: 5th Level: Blood Seeker (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the neophyte moves up to their speed toward a creature they can see within 60 feet of them. If the neophyte ends their movement within 5 feet of the creature, the target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 10 plus PB}) and take {@damage 1d4} piercing damage plus {@damage PBd8} necrotic damage. The neophyte regains hit points equal to half the necrotic damage dealt.

action.name: 7th Level: Child of the Night (3/Day)
entries: As a reaction to taking damage, the neophyte disappears in a cloud of bats and insects. Every enemy within 10 feet of the neophyte must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes {@damage PBd4} piercing damage plus {@damage PBd4} slashing damage. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage. At the end of the turn, the neophyte reforms in an unoccupied space within 30 feet of where they disappeared.

monster.name: Vampire Spawn
languages: the languages they knew in life

trait.name: Radiant Aversion
entries: Each time the spawn takes radiant damage, they take an extra 10 radiant damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The spawn makes two Claw attacks. They can replace one attack with a Bite attack.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, they are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). Moving while grappling a Medium or smaller creature doesn't halve the spawn's speed. The spawn can have only one target {@condition grappled} in this way at a time.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature who is {@condition grappled} by the spawn, {@condition incapacitated}, or {@condition restrained}. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage. The target's hit point maximum is reduced by a number equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the spawn regains hit points equal to that number. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest or is targeted by a {@psionic cure ailment|TalPsi} power of 4th order or higher, a {@spell greater restoration} spell, or a similar supernatural effect. The target dies if this attack reduces their hit point maximum to 0.

bonus.name: Inhuman Speed
entries: The spawn moves up to their speed.

trait.name: Exploit Opening (3/Day)
entries: When Victory makes an attack, she has advantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Mind Link
entries: Victory can communicate telepathically with any Amethyst Knife boss regardless of distance, provided they are on the same plane of existence.

trait.name: Kinetic Buildup
entries: When Victory hits a creature with a melee weapon attack, her speed increases by a cumulative 5 feet and she gains one additional reaction until the start of her next turn.

trait.name: Psionic Wound (3/Day)
entries: When Victory hits a creature with a Mindrazor attack, she can attempt to inflict a psionic wound (no action required). The target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Intelligence saving throw or become vulnerable to psychic damage for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Victory makes three Mindrazor attacks and one Cheap Shot attack.

action.name: Mindrazor
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 1d8 + 7}) piercing damage.

action.name: Cheap Shot
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d4 + 6}) bludgeoning damage, and the target must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, Victory can choose for the target to either be knocked {@condition prone} or gain one of the following conditions until the end of the target's next turn: {@condition blinded}, {@condition dazed|FleeMortals}, or {@condition deafened}.

reaction.name: Shared Condition
entries: When Victory is {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition dazed|FleeMortals}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition paralyzed}, or {@condition stunned}, she chooses a willing Amethyst Knife boss within 60 feet of her who doesn't already have the condition or is immune to it. The chosen creature then gains the condition for the duration, and Victory loses the condition. She can use this reaction even while {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Exploit Opening (3/Day)
entries: When Vivienn makes an attack, she has advantage on the attack roll.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of her turn, Vivienn can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls made during her turn, but attack rolls made against her have advantage until the start of her next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Vivienn makes three Godslayer Axe attacks.

action.name: Godslayer Axe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 1d12 + 8}) slashing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) necrotic damage. If the target is a Celestial, they take an extra 18 ({@damage 4d8}) necrotic damage.

bonus.name: Draconic Rage (3/Day)
entries: Vivienn roars with the might of dragons, entering a rage that lasts for 1 minute or until she is {@condition incapacitated}. While raging, she gains the following benefits:

items: Her size becomes Large.
She has a +2 bonus to weapon damage rolls.
She has advantage on Strength ability checks and saving throws.
She has resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

bonus.name: Ravenous Bite (Draconic Rage Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 1d12 + 8}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of Vivienn for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The voiceless talker manifests a power and makes one Tentacle or Psionic Pistol attack.

action.name: Tentacle
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) psychic damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, they are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}).

action.name: Psionic Pistol
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 7} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) force damage.

action.name: Memory Thief (4th-Order Power)
entries: The voiceless talker psionically plunders the mind of a creature they can see within 30 feet of them. The target must make a {@dc 15} Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) psychic damage, and until they finish a long rest or die, their proficiency bonus is cumulatively lowered by 1 and the voiceless talker gains a cumulative +2 bonus to damage rolls. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and doesn't have their proficiency bonus reduced.
A creature whose proficiency bonus drops to 0 can't form new thoughts or speak, and they have disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws.

action.name: Flay (3/Day; 5th-Order Power)
entries: The voiceless talker shoots forth a 15-foot cone of pure psionic energy. Each creature in the area must make a {@dc 15} Intelligence saving throw, taking 28 ({@damage 8d6}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Guise (3rd-Order Power)
entries: The voiceless talker projects a psionic image over their body, transforming their appearance for 1 hour into that of a Medium creature they have seen. When they manifest this power, they can also change the appearance of any equipment they carry for the duration.

The changes wrought by this power fail to hold up to physical inspection. A creature can use an action to inspect the voiceless talker's appearance and make a {@dc 15} Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check, noticing the image is a projection on a success.

reaction.name: Brain Drain
entries: When a creature {@condition grappled} by the voiceless talker makes a saving throw against one of the voiceless talker's powers, the voiceless talker momentarily weakens the creature and the creature has disadvantage on the saving throw.

trait.name: Phasing Rifle (1/Turn)
entries: When the artillerist hits a target with their Psionic Rifle attack, the artillerist can attempt to teleport the target (no action required). The target must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or be teleported to an unoccupied space the artillerist can see within 60 feet of the artillerist.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The artillerist makes two Psionic Rifle attacks, or they manifest a power and make one Phasing Tentacles attack.

action.name: Psionic Rifle
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 9} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) force damage.

action.name: Phasing Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) psychic damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, the artillerist can choose one of the following effects: the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 17}) or teleported up to 15 feet to an unoccupied space the artillerist can see.

action.name: *Memory Thief (5th-Order Power)
entries: The artillerist psionically plunders the mind of a creature they can see within 30 feet of them. The target must make a {@dc 17} Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 33 ({@damage 6d10}) psychic damage, and until they finish a long rest or die, their proficiency bonus is lowered by 1 and the artillerist gains a cumulative +2 bonus to damage rolls. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and doesn't have their proficiency bonus reduced.
A creature whose proficiency bonus drops to 0 can't form new thoughts or speak, and they have disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws.

action.name: Guise (3rd-Order Power)
entries: The artillerist projects a psionic image over their body, transforming their appearance for 1 hour into that of a Medium creature they have seen. When they manifest this power, they can also change the appearance of any equipment they carry for the duration.

The changes wrought by this power fail to hold up to physical inspection. A creature can use an action to inspect the artillerist's appearance and make a {@dc 17} Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check, noticing the image is a projection on a success.

bonus.name: *Vanish for One (3/Day; 3rd-Order Power; Concentration)
entries: The artillerist cloaks themself from the sight of a creature the artillerist can see within 60 feet of them. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or the artillerist becomes {@condition invisible} to the creature for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). This effect ends early if the artillerist attacks the creature, deals damage to them, or creates an effect that forces them to make a saving throw.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the graywarper takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the graywarper takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

trait.name: Psionic Nexus
entries: When a non-minion voiceless talker within 30 feet of the graywarper uses telepathy or manifests a psionic power, they can do so as if they were in the graywarper's space.

action.name: Phase Chant (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mp,rp} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 60 ft., one target. {@h}4 psychic damage. If the target is a creature and if three or more graywarpers joined the attack, the target must make a Charisma saving throw. The DC for this saving throw is 11 plus the number of graywarpers who joined the attack. On a failed save, the target becomes phased until the end of their next turn. While phased, the creature is translucent and immaterial, and they deal half damage with weapon attacks and unarmed strikes.

hp.special: Seven times their level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their level)

action.name: Signature Attack (Psionic Pistol)
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d10 plus PB} force damage. Beginning at 7th level, the operative can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Phasing Charge (3/Day)
entries: When the operative hits a creature with a signature attack, they can attempt to teleport the target. The target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Wisdom saving throw or be teleported up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space on the ground that the operative can see.

action.name: 5th Level: Telekinetic Repulsion (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the operative releases a powerful pulse of energy. Each enemy within 10 feet of the operative must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes {@damage PBd6} force damage and is pushed up to 10 feet directly away from the operative. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed.

action.name: 7th Level: Memory Thief (3/Day; 4th-Order Power; Concentration)
entries: The operative psionically plunders the mind of a creature they can see within 30 feet of them. The target must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, the target takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) psychic damage, and for 1 minute, the target's proficiency bonus is cumulatively lowered by 1 and the infiltrator gains a cumulative +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls and to each feature's save DC. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and doesn't have their proficiency bonus reduced.
A creature whose proficiency bonus drops to 0 can't form new thoughts or speak, and they have disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls, and saving throws.

trait.name: Baby Burst
entries: When the spider dies, a {@creature swarm of spiders|FleeMortals} bursts forth from their remains and acts on the same initiative count as the spider did.

trait.name: Rider Launcher
entries: An allied rider who jumps off the spider has a long jump of 30 feet and a high jump of 15 feet, with or without a running start. If an allied rider jumps off the spider, the first melee weapon attack the ally makes on the same turn has advantage.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

trait.name: Wide Back
entries: Two Small or Tiny creatures can share a space while riding the spider, allowing up to eighteen Small or seventy-two Tiny creatures to ride the spider at once.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Bladed Leg
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Web Spray
entries: The spider sprays webbing from their abdomen in a 15-foot cube. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition restrained} by the webbing. A creature can use their action to make a {@dc 14} Strength or Dexterity check, freeing themself or another creature they can reach on a success.

action.name: Trample {@recharge}
entries: The spider can move up to their speed and move through the spaces of other creatures as if they were difficult terrain. The spider can make one Bladed Leg attack against each creature whose space they move into during the move. A creature hit by this attack can't take reactions until the start of their next turn.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the spark takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the spark takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

trait.name: Whirlpool Suction
entries: If an enemy starts their turn within 5 feet of three or more water sparks, the enemy must succeed on a Strength saving throw or have their speed reduced to 0. The DC for this saving throw equals 14 plus the number of water sparks within 5 feet of the enemy.

action.name: Whelming Wave (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk ms,rs} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30 ft., one target. {@h}10 bludgeoning damage, and if the attack was made by more than one spark, the target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone} and be unable to stand up until the end of the sparks' next turn. The DC for this saving throw equals 14 plus the number of sparks who joined the attack.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the willow remains motionless, they are indistinguishable from a normal willow tree.

trait.name: Flammable
entries: If the willow takes fire damage, they catch fire and take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage at the start of each of their turns for 1 minute. The effect ends early if the willow takes cold damage or a creature uses an action to extinguish the flames.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The willow makes two Frenzied Branch attacks.

action.name: Frenzied Branch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 30 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. If the willow is on fire, this attack deals an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Tugging Roots
entries: Roots erupt from a point on the ground the willow can see within 60 feet of them. Each creature in a 10-foot sphere centered on that point must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone} and moved up to 30 feet toward the willow, taking 4 ({@damage 1d8}) bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet moved.

action.name: Willow's Tears
entries: The willow showers salty droplets on their bower. Each creature within 15 feet of the willow must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by the willow (save ends at end of turn). While {@condition charmed} in this way, a creature can't willingly move more than 15 feet away from the willow. If a creature {@condition charmed} in this way takes damage, the effect ends for them.

reaction.name: Tree Transformation
entries: When a creature within 5 feet of the willow deals slashing damage to the willow, the willow attempts to turn the creature into a tree. The target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or their feet begin to transform into tree roots and they are {@condition restrained}. A creature {@condition restrained} in this way must repeat the saving throw at the end of their next turn. On a successful save, the effect ends. On a failed save, they are transformed into a wooden tree and are {@condition petrified}. A creature {@condition petrified} in this way resembles a normal tree of the same size as that creature, except the creature's face appears carved into the trunk. If the willow dies, the petrification ends and the creature reverts to their true form. A {@psionic cure ailment|TalPsi} power or {@spell lesser restoration} spell also ends this effect.

monster.name: Wight
languages: the languages they knew in life

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The wight makes one Longsword attack and one Vitality Theft attack, or they make two Heavy Crossbow attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Heavy Crossbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 100/400 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Vitality Theft
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d8}) necrotic damage, and the wight regains a number of hit points equal to half the damage dealt. Until the start of the wight's next turn, the target has disadvantage on attack rolls made against creatures other than the wight.

reaction.name: Decaying Guard
entries: When an ally the wight can see within 5 feet of them is hit by an attack, the wight forces the attacker to reroll the attack and to instead target the wight or a willing ally within 5 feet of the original target.

monster.name: Wight Deathguard

hp.special: Eight times their level (number of d10 Hit Dice equal to their level)

languages: the languages they knew in life

action.name: Signature Attack (Longsword)
entries: {@atk m} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d8 plus PB} slashing damage. Beginning at 7th level, the deathguard can make this attack twice, instead of once, when they take the Attack action on their turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Blood for Blood (3/Day)
entries: As a reaction to an ally the deathguard can see within 5 feet of them being hit with an attack, the deathguard redirects the attack to themself, potentially causing the attack to miss. If the attacker is within 5 feet of the deathguard, the deathguard can make a signature attack against the attacker.

action.name: 5th Level: Soul Thief (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the deathguard shrouds themself in dark energy. The deathguard regains {@damage PBd6} hit points, and each enemy within 5 feet of the deathguard must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes {@damage PBd6} necrotic damage. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage.

action.name: 7th Level: This Way! (3/Day)
entries: As an action, the deathguard moves up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks. Each ally the deathguard passes within 5 feet of during the move can use a reaction to move up to their speed in the same direction as the deathguard without provoking opportunity attacks. Until the start of the deathguard's next turn, attacks against these allies have disadvantage.

monster.name: Wight Siphoner
languages: the languages they knew in life

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the siphoner takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the siphoner takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

action.name: Grasping Resurrection (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 necrotic damage. If three or more siphoners joined the attack, they can restore the remains of a destroyed Undead minion within 15 feet of the target. That Undead minion returns to life with all their hit points. If five or more siphoners joined the group attack, they can either choose to increase the range of this effect from 15 to 30 feet or to restore two Undead minions instead of one.

trait.name: Hunter's Pounce
entries: If the wildcat hits a Large or smaller target and had advantage on the attack roll, the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}). While grappling the target in this way, the wildcat can't attack another creature.

trait.name: Natural Camouflage
entries: The wildcat has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made in their native terrain.

trait.name: Sprint (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When the wildcat moves on their turn in combat, they can triple their speed until the end of their turn.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage, plus an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) piercing damage if the target is {@condition grappled} or {@condition restrained}.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage, plus an extra 3 ({@damage 1d6}) slashing damage if the wildcat had advantage on the attack roll.

bonus.name: Sneak
entries: The wildcat takes the Hide action.

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Familiar Territory
entries: The wildcat has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) and Wisdom ({@skill Survival}) checks made in their native terrain (as determined by you and the GM).

trait.name: Predator's Grab (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When the wildcat hits a creature with an opportunity attack, the creature is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 10 plus PB}).

trait.name: Sprint (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: When the wildcat moves on their turn in combat, they can triple their speed until the end of their turn.

action.name: Signature Attack (Bite or Claw)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 plus PB} piercing damage (Bite) or slashing damage (Claw).

action.name: 1st Level: Crushing Jaws (2 Ferocity)
entries: The wildcat makes a signature Bite attack, dealing an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} bludgeoning damage on a hit, or an extra 2 × PB bludgeoning damage to a target they are grappling.

action.name: 3rd Level: Pounce (5 Ferocity)
entries: The wildcat moves up to their speed and makes a signature attack against one target, dealing an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} damage on a hit. If the target is Large or smaller, they are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 10 plus PB}), and the wildcat can't attack another creature until the grapple ends.

action.name: 5th Level: Shredding Claws (8 Ferocity)
entries: The wildcat makes three signature Claw attacks against the same target. The target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Charisma saving throw or be {@condition frightened} of the wildcat for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

trait.name: Lethe
entries: When the wobalas's soul count is 0, they have advantage on attack rolls, disadvantage on saving throws, and their Intelligence score becomes 3 (-4). Additionally, the wobalas must use their movement on each of their turns to move as close as possible to the nearest creature they can sense with their soulsight, and then if they are able, they must use their action to attack and attempt to kill that creature. The wobalas can't act with any other purpose until they add 1 to their soul count.

trait.name: Soul Devourer
entries: When the wobalas reduces a creature who isn't a Construct or an Undead to 0 hit points or deals damage to a dying creature, the creature must make a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the wobalas consumes the creature's soul and adds 1 to the wobalas's soul count. A creature whose soul is consumed in this way immediately dies, and they can't be restored to life by any means short of a {@spell wish} spell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The wobalas makes three Despair Bolt attacks.

action.name: Despair Bolt
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 10} to hit, range 150/600 ft., one creature. {@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6}) piercing damage plus 10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage. The wobalas can burn 1 soul to make the target {@condition frightened} of them for 1 minute. If the target is immune to being {@condition frightened}, the wobalas regains the burned soul.

action.name: Banishing Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}22 ({@damage 4d10}) psychic damage, and the target is teleported up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space the wobalas can see.

bonus.name: Flee, Mortal (Costs 1 Soul)
entries: The wobalas chooses a creature they can see within 60 feet of them. The target must succeed on a {@dc 16} Charisma saving throw or use their reaction, if available, to move their speed away from the wobalas by the most direct route possible, with no regard for their own safety. Creatures who can't be {@condition frightened} succeed on this saving throw automatically.

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Move as One
entries: While the worg's caregiver is mounted on the worg, opportunity attacks against the worg or their caregiver are made with disadvantage. The worg's caregiver can mount or dismount the worg by spending 5 feet of movement.

action.name: Signature Attack (Bite)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 plus PB} piercing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Overwhelming Attack (2 Ferocity)
entries: The worg makes a signature attack. On a hit, the attack deals an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} damage, and the target can't take reactions until the start of the worg's next turn.

action.name: 3rd Level: Brutal Charge (5 Ferocity)
entries: The worg moves up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks. During or at the end of this move, they can make a signature attack against one target.

action.name: 5th Level: Bite Rampage (8 Ferocity)
entries: The worg makes signature attacks against PB creatures of their choice within 5 feet of them. On a hit, a target is knocked {@condition prone}.

monster.name: Wraith
languages: the languages they knew in life

trait.name: Agonizing Phasing
entries: The wraith can move through other creatures and objects as if they were difficult terrain. The wraith takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) force damage if they end their turn inside an object. A creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) psychic damage the first time a wraith passes through them on a turn.

trait.name: Throes of Oblivion
entries: When the wraith dies, they collapse inward, creating a burst of painful psychic energy. Each creature within 20 feet of the wraith must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

action.name: Agonizing Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) psychic damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} (save ends at end of turn).

Each time a target {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} in this way fails a saving throw to end the condition, their hit point maximum is halved. This effect is cumulative, and the reduction lasts until the target finishes a short or long rest.
If a Humanoid dies within 1 minute of being hit by this attack, their spirit rises as a specter under the wraith's control in an unoccupied space nearest to where that Humanoid died.

action.name: Psychic Enervation
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 6} to hit, range 60 ft., one creature. {@h}10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or fall {@condition prone} and be {@condition frightened} of the wraith for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). While {@condition frightened} in this way, the target can't stand up.

reaction.name: Denied Vitality
entries: When a creature who the wraith can see within 30 feet of them regains hit points, the wraith can attempt to sap the life energy restoring the creature. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or only regain half the number of hit points they otherwise would regain.

trait.name: Stubborn Rage
entries: The wyvern is immune to the {@condition frightened} and {@condition stunned} conditions while they have fewer than half their hit points or are within 60 feet of another wyvern they can hear or see.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The wyvern makes one Stinger attack and one Bite attack. They can replace one attack with a use of Tail Sweep.

action.name: Stinger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d6 + 3}) piercing damage. The target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage at the start of each of their turns for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn). A {@psionic cure ailment|TalPsi} power or a {@spell lesser restoration} spell ends this effect on a target.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d12 + 3}) piercing damage. If the target is Large or smaller, they are {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and the wyvern can't bite another target.

action.name: Tail Sweep
entries: The wyvern swipes their tail in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a {@dc 14} Strength saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) bludgeoning damage and be pushed up to 10 feet away from the wyvern.

bonus.name: Seek
entries: The wyvern takes the Search action.

hp.special: 7 + seven times caregiver's level (number of d8 Hit Dice equal to their caregiver's level)

trait.name: Learning to Fly
entries: The wyvern has a flying speed of 10 × PB feet.

action.name: Signature Attack (Stinger)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3 plus PB} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}{@damage 1d6 plus PB} piercing damage.

action.name: 1st Level: Acidic Sting (2 Ferocity)
entries: The wyvern makes a signature attack with a reach of 15 feet. On a hit, the attack deals an extra {@damage 0d1 + PB|PB} acid damage.

action.name: 3rd Level: Liquefied Meal (5 Ferocity)
entries: The wyvern pounces on a Large or smaller creature within 5 feet of them, attempting to melt their prey's flesh with acid and drink it. The target must succeed on a {@dc 10 plus PB} Dexterity saving throw or fall {@condition prone} and take {@damage 1d4 plus PB} acid damage. The wyvern gains temporary hit points equal to the acid damage dealt.

action.name: 5th Level: Tail Sweep (8 Ferocity)
entries: The wyvern sweeps their tail in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 10 plus PB} Strength saving throw or take {@damage PBd6} bludgeoning damage and be pushed up to 10 feet away from the wyvern.

reaction.name: Enraged Protector
entries: When a creature the wyvern can see within 30 feet of them reduces the wyvern's caregiver to 0 hit points or scores a critical hit against the caregiver, the wyvern can move up to their speed. If the wyvern ends this movement within 5 feet of the attacker, the wyvern can make a signature attack against them.

monster.name: Xaantikorijek

trait.name: Static Shield (3/Day)
entries: When Xaantikorijek fails a saving throw, he can succeed instead. When he does, his sight, blindsight, and truesight are reduced to a range of 30 feet until the start of his next turn.

trait.name: Storm of the Gods
entries: Lightning and thunder damage dealt by Xaantikorijek ignore damage resistance.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Xaantikorijek makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 2d10 + 9}) piercing damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) lightning damage, and Xaantikorijek can move the target up to 20 feet in any direction.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) slashing damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) thunder damage, and the target is knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Fulminating Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: Xaantikorijek exhales lightning in a line that is 120 feet long and 30 feet wide. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 23} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 66 ({@damage 12d10}) lightning damage and has disadvantage on saving throws until the end of Xaantikorijek's next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and suffers no other effect.

bonus.name: Lightning Discharge
entries: Xaantikorijek makes one Bite attack. On a hit, Xaantikorijek's teeth spark with energy, dealing an extra 11 ({@damage 2d10}) lightning damage to the target and to one other enemy within 60 feet of the target.

reaction.name: Voice of Negation
entries: When a creature Xaantikorijek can see within 60 feet of him uses an action or bonus action to cast a spell, Xaantikorijek speaks an arcane word, forcing the creature to make a {@dc 23} saving throw using their spellcasting ability. On a failed save, the target takes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) thunder damage and is unable to cast spells until the end of their turn, but the spell slot is not expended and the creature's action is not lost.

legendaryHeader: Xaantikorijek has three villain actions. He can take each action once during an encounter after an enemy's turn. He can take these actions in any order but can use only one per round.

legendary.name: Action 1: Voice of Reverence
entries: Xaantikorijek speaks an ancient word of authority into the mind of each creature of his choice within 60 feet of him. Each target must succeed on a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw or fall {@condition prone}. A creature who falls {@condition prone} in this way takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) thunder damage if they stand up before the end of Xaantikorijek's next turn.

legendary.name: Action 2: Fulguration
entries: Xaantikorijek sheds his physical form to become a being of lightning until the end of his next turn. While in this form, Xaantikorijek gains the following benefits:

items: He is resistant to all damage.
He can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.
His movement doesn't provoke opportunity attacks.
He can move through any creature's space, and when he moves into a creature's space for the first time on a turn, that creature takes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) lightning damage.

legendary.name: Action 3: Voice of the Ages
entries: Xaantikorijek recites an ancient lament that reverberates in nearby souls. Each enemy within 60 feet of Xaantikorijek who can hear him must make a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 44 ({@damage 8d10}) psychic damage, falls {@condition prone}, and is unable to stand up for 1 minute as they weep uncontrollably (save ends at end of turn). On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and suffers no other effect.

monster.name: Xogomoc
languages: understands all languages but can't speak

trait.name: Amorphous
entries: Xogomoc can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Discorporation
entries: When Xogomoc drops to 0 hit points or dies, all conditions and other effects end for him. He teleports back to the place where he slumbers, transforms into {@creature Goxomoc|FleeMortals} with all his hit points, and falls {@condition unconscious}.

trait.name: Disruptive Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If Xogomoc fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead, and his Lightning Aura doesn't function until the end of his next turn.

trait.name: Lightning Aura
entries: A creature who starts their turn within 60 feet of Xogomoc must make a {@dc 25} Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Power of the Storm
entries: Lightning and thunder damage dealt by Xogomoc ignore damage resistance.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: Xogomoc deals double damage to objects and structures.

trait.name: Supernatural Resistance
entries: Xogomoc has advantage on saving throws against powers, spells, and other supernatural effects.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Xogomoc makes two Lightning Strike attacks.

action.name: Lightning Strike
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 19} to hit, reach 15 ft. or range 600 ft., one target. {@h}29 ({@damage 3d12 + 10}) lightning damage, and another target within 30 feet of the first must succeed on a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage.

action.name: Energy Flow
entries: Xogomoc moves up to his speed without provoking opportunity attacks. During this move, he can move through the spaces of other creatures, and it doesn't count as difficult terrain. The first time he moves through each creature's space, that creature takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) lightning damage.

action.name: Lightning Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: Xogomoc breathes lightning in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 27} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 71 ({@damage 11d12}) lightning damage and can't take reactions until the end of their next turn. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and suffers no other effect.

bonus.name: Gone in a Flash
entries: Xogomoc teleports, along with any creatures inside him (see Into the Storm), up to 30 feet to an unoccupied space he can see. Each creature within 10 feet of the space he left must make a {@dc 25} Constitution saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

reaction.name: Shock Cage
entries: When a creature Xogomoc can see within 30 feet of him hits him with an attack, he encircles the attacker in bands of lightning. The creature takes 22 ({@damage 4d10}) lightning damage and is {@condition restrained} until the end of their next turn.

legendaryHeader: Xogomoc has three villain actions. He can take each action once during an encounter after an enemy's turn. He can take these actions in any order but can use only one per round.

legendary.name: Action 1: Thunderstruck
entries: Xogomoc summons an aweinspiring clap of thunder. Each creature within 120 feet of him who can hear him must succeed on a {@dc 25} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

legendary.name: Action 2: Into the Storm
entries: Xogomoc summons tempest winds that buffet each enemy he can see within 30 feet of him. Each target must make a {@dc 25} Strength saving throw. On a successful save, a creature takes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) lightning damage. On a failed save, a creature is drawn inside

legendary.name: Xogomoc
entries: While inside Xogomoc, a creature is {@condition restrained}, moves with Xogomoc, has total cover against attacks and other effects outside Xogomoc, and takes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) lightning damage plus 16 ({@damage 3d10}) thunder damage at the start of each of their turns.

A creature inside Xogomoc can use an action to make a {@dc 20} Strength ({@skill Athletics}) or Dexterity ({@skill Acrobatics}) check to move out of Xogomoc, entering an unoccupied space of their choice within 5 feet of Xogomoc on a success. If Xogomoc takes 60 or more damage on a single turn or is reduced to 0 hit points, each creature inside of Xogomoc is shunted out of him into an unoccupied space of their choice within 5 feet of Xogomoc.

legendary.name: Action 3: Behold True Power
entries: Xogomoc unleashes lighting and wind in a chaotic storm. Each enemy within 120 feet of him must make a {@dc 25} Strength saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 44 ({@damage 8d10}) lightning damage and is moved up to 60 feet in any direction. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't moved.

monster.name: Xorannox

trait.name: Painful Resistance (3/Day)
entries: Eight eyes float around Xorannox and create his Eye Psionics. If Xorannox fails a saving throw, he can destroy a random floating eye (chosen by rolling a {@dice d8}) and succeed instead. If an eye is destroyed, a new eye pops of out of Xorannox's face to replace it 24 hours later.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) piercing damage.

action.name: Eye Psionics
entries: Xorannox creates three of the following psionic eye effects. Unless otherwise stated, each eye targets a creature who he can see within 120 feet of him. He can't use the same effect twice on a turn.

items.name: 1. Charm Beam
entries: The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition charmed} by Xorannox for 1 hour, or until he harms the creature or one of their allies.

items.name: 2. Compulsion Beam
entries: The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 17} Intelligence saving throw or use their reaction, if available, to move up to their speed toward the closest ally they can see and make one weapon attack against them. Creatures who can't be {@condition charmed} are unaffected.

items.name: 3. Memory Beam
entries: The targeted creature must make a {@dc 17} Intelligence saving throw. On a failed save, if the creature has unexpended spell slots, they expend a spell slot of their highest remaining level, with no effect. If they don't have unexpended spell slots, they instead lose proficiency with a weapon they're holding or carrying for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

items.name: 4. Toxic Vapors
entries: Xorannox chooses a point he can see within 120 feet of him. Each creature within 10 feet of the point must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

items.name: 5. Telekinetic Field
entries: Xorannox chooses a point he can see within 120 feet of him. Each enemy within 10 feet of the point must succeed on a {@dc 17} Strength saving throw or be moved up to 30 feet in any direction and take 7 ({@damage 2d6}) force damage at the end of the move. Additionally, Xorannox can target any object within 10 feet of the point that weighs 300 pounds or less and isn't being worn or carried, moving it up to 30 feet in any direction. Xorannox can also exert fine control on objects with this effect, such as manipulating a simple tool or opening a door or a container.

items.name: 6. Lightning Bolt
entries: Xorannox shoots a 5-foot-wide, 60-foot-long line of lightning. Each creature in the line must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 36 ({@damage 8d8}) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

items.name: 7. Explosion
entries: Xorannox chooses a point he can see within 120 feet of him. Each creature within 10 feet of the point must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw, taking 36 ({@damage 8d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

items.name: 8. Necrosis Beam
entries: The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 17} Constitution saving throw or immediately take 55 ({@damage 10d10}) necrotic damage and lose 7 ({@damage 2d6}) hit points at the start of each of their turns. If this effect reduces a target's hit points to 0, they die. The effect ends if Xorannox dies or can't see the target. This psionic effect can't be used again while this effect persists.

bonus.name: The Great Eye {@recharge}
entries: Xorannox's central eye turns solid black and projects a 150-foot cone of energy. If Xorannox or any creature in that area is affected by a spell, the spell's effects immediately end for that creature.

reaction.name: Cower!
entries: When a creature hits Xorannox with an attack, he shoots a psionic fear beam at them. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or take 21 ({@damage 6d6}) psychic damage and be {@condition frightened} of Xorannox for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

legendaryHeader: Xorannox has three villain actions. He can take each action once during an encounter after an enemy's turn. He can take these actions in any order but can use only one per round.

legendary.name: Action 1: Disruption Beams
entries: Xorannox shoots a psionic disruption beam at three creatures he can see within 120 feet of him. Each target must make a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, whenever the target makes more than one weapon attack on a turn or casts a spell that isn't a cantrip, they take 14 ({@damage 4d6}) psychic damage. This effect lasts for 1 minute (save ends at end of turn).

legendary.name: Action 2: Disappearing Act
entries: Xorannox turns {@condition invisible} until the end of his next turn and teleports up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space he can see.

legendary.name: Action 3: Megabeam
entries: Xorannox unleashes the effects of all of his remaining psionic eyes at once in a 20-foot-wide, 120-foot-long line. Each creature in that area must make a save against two random eye effects from Xorannox's Eye

legendary.name: Psionics (reroll duplicates for each target)
entries: If the effect usually affects an area, it instead only affects individual creatures.

monster.name: Yserthrax

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: Yserthrax can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Corruption
entries: Poison damage dealt by Yserthrax ignores damage resistance and treats damage immunity as damage resistance. Whenever Yserthrax deals poison damage to a creature who isn't a Construct or an Undead, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or be corrupted (save ends at end of turn). The corruption lasts until cured by a {@psionic cure ailment|TalPsi} power, {@spell lesser restoration} spell, or similar supernatural effect.

While corrupted, a creature takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) psychic damage at the start of each of their turns as their mind and body are ravaged by reality-warping anomalies. If a creature dies while corrupted, their body melts into a gruesome puddle, becoming a {@creature gibbering mouther|FleeMortals} under Yserthrax's control.

trait.name: Withering Resistance (3/Day)
entries: When Yserthrax fails a saving throw, she can take 16 ({@damage 3d10}) necrotic damage and succeed instead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Yserthrax makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 2d10 + 9}) piercing damage plus 11 ({@damage 2d10}) poison damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 16} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d6 + 9}) slashing damage, and Yserthrax can move the target up to 15 feet horizontally.

action.name: Corrupting Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: Yserthrax exhales poison in a 90-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 22} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a target takes 56 ({@damage 16d6}) poison damage and is {@condition poisoned} until the end of their next turn. On a successful save, a target takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition poisoned}.

bonus.name: Ulcerate
entries: Yserthrax magically aggravates a creature she can see within 60 feet of her who is corrupted by her Corruption trait. The target must succeed on a {@dc 19} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition dazed|FleeMortals} until the end of their next turn.

reaction.name: Eldritch Disruption
entries: When a creature Yserthrax can see within 60 feet of her hits her with an attack or succeeds on a saving throw, Yserthrax conjures a reality-warping anomaly around them. The creature must choose to either take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) psychic damage or to reroll the attack or a saving throw and use the new result.

legendaryHeader: Yserthrax has three villain actions. She can take each action once during an encounter after an enemy's turn. She can take these actions in any order but can use only one per round.

legendary.name: Action 1: Summon Monoliths
entries: Yserthrax conjures three monoliths of otherworldly green crystal, which grow out of the ground centered on three points she can see within 500 feet of her. Each monolith is a 10-foot-radius, 60-foot-high cylinder with AC 19, 100 hit points, and immunity to poison and psychic damage. The monoliths don't block Yserthrax's vision. Each creature within 10 feet of a monolith other than Yserthrax is vulnerable to psychic damage. When a monolith is destroyed, each creature within 30 feet of it must make a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: Action 2: Spatial Alteration
entries: Yserthrax bats her wings erratically, releasing foul energy that warps space around her. Each creature within 60 feet of her must succeed on a {@dc 19} Charisma saving throw or be teleported up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space Yserthrax can see.

legendary.name: Action 3: Elder Scream
entries: Yserthrax unleashes an eldritch scream, piercing the mind of each enemy she can see within 120 feet of her. Each target must make a {@dc 19} Wisdom saving throw, taking 77 ({@damage 14d10}) psychic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Death Wail
entries: When the yumgrub dies, they let out a distressing screech. Each creature within 15 feet who can hear the yumgrub takes 1 psychic damage. Yumgrubs and creatures who have eaten a yumgrub within the last minute are immune to this damage.

trait.name: Minion
entries: If the yumgrub takes damage from an attack or as the result of a failed saving throw, their hit points are reduced to 0. If the yumgrub takes damage from another effect, they die if the damage equals or exceeds their hit point maximum; otherwise they take no damage.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The yumgrub can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Yum
entries: A Small or larger creature can use an action to consume a living yumgrub within 5 feet of them. The yumgrub dies, and for 1 minute, the consuming creature's speed is doubled and they gain a +4 bonus to their Strength score and a +2 bonus to AC. When the effect ends, the creature gains two levels of {@condition exhaustion}.

action.name: Bite (Group Attack)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit -1} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}1 piercing damage.

monster.name: Zenith Aastrika

trait.name: Battle Tranquility (3/Day)
entries: When Aastrika fails a saving throw, she can choose to succeed instead. When she does so, she can't use Sweltering Heat until the end of her next turn.

trait.name: Molten Flesh
entries: The first time a creature other than a fire giant touches Aastrika or hits her with a melee attack on a turn, that creature takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: Aastrika takes the Disengage action and makes up to three attacks using Unarmed Strike, Hurl Flame, or both.

action.name: Unarmed Strike
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 11} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 4d6 + 7}) bludgeoning damage plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage. If the target is a creature, they are outlined in red light until the start of Aastrika's next turn, and for the duration, attack rolls against them have advantage.

action.name: Hurl Flame
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 10} to hit, range 180 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 4d6 + 6}) fire damage.

action.name: Lava Pillar {@recharge 5}
entries: Aastrika causes a 20-foot-radius, 60-foot-high cylinder of lava to erupt from the ground at a point she can see within 120 feet of her. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 38 ({@damage 11d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

bonus.name: Sweltering Heat
entries: Aastrika's inner flame pulses harshly. Each creature within 20 feet of her who doesn't have resistance or immunity to fire damage must succeed on a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw or gain a level of {@condition exhaustion}.

reaction.name: Power of Flame
entries: When another fire giant Aastrika can see within 60 feet of her misses with a weapon attack, Aastrika causes flame to trail from the attacker. The attacker rolls damage for the attack as if they had hit, and the target takes half that amount as fire damage instead of taking the full amount of normal damage.

legendaryHeader: Aastrika has three villain actions. She can take each action once during an encounter after an enemy's turn. She can take these actions in any order but can use only one per round.

legendary.name: Action 1: Forward!
entries: Aastrika and up to three creatures she can see can move up to their speed without provoking opportunity attacks and make one melee attack each.

legendary.name: Action 2: The Manifold Self
entries: Aastrika disappears in a flash of light and teleports, reappearing in an unoccupied space she can see within 30 feet of her. At the same time, five {@creature fire giant trooper|FleeMortals}s appear in unoccupied spaces within 30 feet of the space she teleported from. The troopers act immediately after this villain action is taken and on the same initiative count in subsequent rounds.

legendary.name: Action 3: This. Ends. Now
entries: Aastrika and each willing fire giant within 60 feet of her unleashes a burst of heat. Each creature within 10 feet of Aastrika or one of these fire giants must make a {@dc 18} Dexterity saving throw, taking 55 ({@damage 10d10}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

monster.name: Zombie
languages: understands the languages they knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Negative Nerves
entries: Whenever a creature deals 5 damage or less to the zombie, the zombie takes no damage instead.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

reaction.name: Delayed Reflex
entries: When the zombie's Negative Nerves trait allows them to ignore damage dealt by a creature the zombie can see within 5 feet of them, the zombie makes a Slam attack with disadvantage against the creature.

legendaryGroup.name: Cave
